sentences.english: Through chattering teeth, she told her that she was cold, that she wanted a sheet for her gurney.

sentences.chinese: 你的新地址是什么？

sentences.english: The little kitten is adorable.

sentences.chinese: 成年人口

sentences.english: Younger workers tend to be at an advantage (=  have an advantage  ) when applying for jobs.
sentences.chinese: 年轻点的工人申请工作时往往处于优势地位。

detailed_translations.chinese: 优点， 好处， 优势

sentences.chinese: 一大奇遇

sentences.english: We saw many advertisements for new cars on television.
sentences.chinese: 我们在电视上看到了很多关于新汽车的广告。

sentences.english: This product features in the latest advertisement.
sentences.chinese: 这个产品在最新的广告中有所展示。

sentences.english: She decided to respond to the job advertisement.
sentences.chinese: 她决定回应招聘广告。

detailed_translations.english: a notice designed to attract attention and persuade people to buy something or do something
an advertisement, especially one printed in a newspaper or magazine

sentences.english: You should have followed my advice.
sentences.chinese: 你真该听我的建议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 劝告， 忠告， 意见， 建议
detailed_translations.english: an opinion you give someone about what they should do

sentences.english: She needed someone to advise her.
sentences.chinese: 她需要有个人给她出主意。

sentences.english: ‘Make sure that you keep the documents in a safe place,’ Otley advised him.
sentences.chinese: “一定要把文件放在安全的地方。”奥特利向他建议道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 建议；劝告，忠告；通知；警告
detailed_translations.english: to tell someone what you think they should do, especially when you know more than they do about something

sentences.english: Extremists were openly advocating violence.
sentences.chinese: 极端主义者公开鼓吹使用暴力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拥护， 提倡， 主张
detailed_translations.english: to publicly support a particular way of doing something

detailed_translations.chinese: 拥护者， 提倡者； 辩护者， 律师
detailed_translations.english: someone who publicly supports someone or something

sentences.english: Are you interested in world affairs?
sentences.chinese: 你对世界大事感兴趣吗？

sentences.english: the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
sentences.chinese: 外交部

sentences.english: Women had little role in public affairs.
sentences.chinese: 女性过去几乎不参与公共事务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 事情；事务；私事；(尤指关系不长久的)风流韵事
detailed_translations.english: public or political events and activities

sentences.english: the areas affected by the hurricane
sentences.chinese: 受飓风影响的地区

sentences.english: a disease that affects the central nervous system
sentences.chinese: 影响中枢神经系统的疾病

sentences.english: decisions which affect our lives
sentences.chinese: 影响我们生活的决定

sentences.english: Trading has been adversely affected by the downturn in consumer spending.
sentences.chinese: 贸易受到消费支出回落的不利影响。

detailed_translations.english: to do something that produces an effect or change in something or in someone’s situation

sentences.english: The room affords a beautiful view over the city.
sentences.chinese: 这房间可以俯瞰城市美景。

sentences.english: The new law will afford protection to employees.
sentences.chinese: 新法律将为雇员提供保障。

detailed_translations.chinese: 买得起， 负担得起； 提供， 给予
detailed_translations.english: to provide something or allow something to happen

sentences.english: There’s no need to be afraid.
sentences.chinese: 没有必要害怕。

detailed_translations.chinese: 害怕的， 恐惧的； 犯愁的
detailed_translations.english: frightened because you think that you may get hurt or that something bad may happen

sentences.english: After the war many soldiers stayed in France.
sentences.chinese: 战后，许多士兵留在法国。

sentences.english: I go swimming every day after work.
sentences.chinese: 我每天下班后都去游泳。

sentences.english: Do you believe in life after death?
sentences.chinese: 你相信人死后还有来生吗？

sentences.english: The first attack started just after midnight.
sentences.chinese: 刚过午夜，第一波进攻开始了。

sentences.english: David went to bed straight after (=  immediately after  ) supper.
sentences.chinese: 戴维一吃完晚饭就去睡觉了。

sentences.english: After you’d called the police, what did you do?
sentences.chinese: 报警之后，你做了些什么？

sentences.english: Zimmerman changed his name after he left Germany.
sentences.chinese: 齐默尔曼离开德国后改了名字。

sentences.english: People still remember the 1958 revolution and what came after (=  happened after it  ) .
sentences.chinese: 人们依然记得1958年的那场革命和之后发生的事。

detailed_translations.english: when a particular event or time has happened, or when someone has done something

sentences.english: There’s a meeting on Thursday afternoon .
sentences.chinese: 星期四下午有个会议。

sentences.english: It was very hot in the afternoon .
sentences.chinese: 下午很热。

sentences.english: See you tomorrow afternoon .
sentences.chinese: 明天下午见。

sentences.english: Are you going into town this afternoon ?
sentences.chinese: 今天下午你进城去吗？

sentences.english: We met in the early afternoon .
sentences.chinese: 下午较早的时候我们见了面。

sentences.english: By late afternoon , Micky had changed his mind.
sentences.chinese: 到了傍晚，米基已改变了主意。

sentences.english: He was having his afternoon nap .
sentences.chinese: 他在睡午觉。

detailed_translations.english: the part of the day after the morning and before the evening

sentences.english: Afterwards, we went to the park for a picnic.
sentences.chinese: 后来，我们去公园野餐了。

sentences.english: He finished his work and then did some reading afterwards.
sentences.chinese: 他完成工作后，然后读了一会儿书。

detailed_translations.english: following something in time or order

sentences.english: Can you say that again? I didn’t hear.
sentences.chinese: 你能再说一遍吗？ 我没听见。

sentences.english: I’ll never go there again.
sentences.chinese: 我再也不会去那儿了。

sentences.english: Mr Khan’s busy. Can you try again later?
sentences.chinese: 卡恩先生正忙着。 你能不能过一会儿再打来？

sentences.english: In 1997, the family moved house yet again.
sentences.chinese: 1997年，全家人再一次搬家。

sentences.english: Once again, Drew was under arrest.
sentences.chinese: 德鲁再一次被拘捕。

detailed_translations.chinese: 再一次， 又一次； 回到原处， 复原； 再则， 而且
detailed_translations.english: one more time – used when something has happened or been done before

sentences.english: Gambotti was injured in last Saturday’s game against the Lions.
sentences.chinese: 甘博蒂在上周六与雄狮队的比赛中受了伤。

sentences.english: We’ll be competing against the best companies in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 我们要和欧洲一些顶级的公司竞争。

detailed_translations.chinese: 逆， 反， 违反； 对…不利； 倚在， 紧靠着， 紧贴着； 和…比， 和…对照
detailed_translations.english: used to say who someone is competing with or trying to defeat in a game, battle etc

sentences.english: Francis is the same age as me.
sentences.chinese: 弗朗西斯和我同年岁。

sentences.english: Experts disagree over the age of the drawings.
sentences.chinese: 专家对这些画作的年代意见不统一。

sentences.english: Dad retired at the age of 56.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸是在56岁时退休的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 年龄； 老年； 时代， 时期； 很长的一段时间
detailed_translations.english: the number of years someone has lived or something has existed

sentences.english: The Republicans have stuck to their conservative agenda.
sentences.chinese: 共和党人坚持自己的保守议题。

detailed_translations.english: a list of problems or subjects that a government, organization etc is planning to deal with

sentences.english: Our agent in Rio deals with all our Brazilian business.
sentences.chinese: 我们在里约热内卢的业务代表处理我们在巴西的全部业务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 代理人， 代理商， 经纪人
detailed_translations.english: a person or company that represents another person or company, especially in business

sentences.english: They moved to a new house some time ago (=  a fairly long time ago  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们搬进新居已有些日子了。

sentences.english: We had our bicentenary celebrations not that long ago.
sentences.chinese: 不久前，我们举行了200周年庆典活动。

detailed_translations.english: used to show how far back in the past something happened

sentences.english: Teenagers and their parents rarely agree.
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的孩子跟父母意见很少一致。

detailed_translations.chinese: 同意， 赞同； 相符， 一致
detailed_translations.english: to have or express the same opinion about something as someone else

sentences.english: More than 75% of the land is used for agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 75%以上的土地用于农耕。

detailed_translations.english: the practice or science of farming

sentences.english: He kept his gaze fixed on the car ahead.
sentences.chinese: 他的目光一直盯着前面的那辆汽车。

sentences.english: We could see the lights of Las Vegas up ahead .
sentences.chinese: 我们能看到前方拉斯维加斯的灯光。

sentences.english: Henry hurried on ahead (=  went in front of the others  ) .
sentences.chinese: 亨利赶紧跑到前面。

detailed_translations.chinese: 向前地；领先地；在(某人或某事物的)前面；预先；在将来，为未来
detailed_translations.english: a short distance in front of someone or something

sentences.english: Artificial Intelligence can analyze large amounts of data much faster than humans.
sentences.chinese: 人工智能可以比人类更快地分析大量数据。

sentences.english: Many companies are investing in AI to improve their products and services.
sentences.chinese: 许多公司正在投资人工智能以改进他们的产品和服务。

sentences.english: AI has the potential to revolutionize various industries, including healthcare and transportation.
sentences.chinese: 人工智能有可能彻底改变各个行业，包括医疗保健和交通。

detailed_translations.english: the theory and development of computer systems able to perform tasks normally requiring human intelligence

sentences.english: an index to aid the reader
sentences.chinese: 方便读者的索引

detailed_translations.english: to help someone do something

detailed_translations.chinese: 帮助，救助；助手；辅助手段
detailed_translations.english: help that you need to do a particular thing

sentences.english: a program that’s aimed at teenagers
sentences.chinese: 对象为青少年的节目

detailed_translations.chinese: 瞄准， 对准； 目的是， 旨在； 针对； 力争做到
detailed_translations.english: to try or intend to achieve something
something you hope to achieve by doing something

sentences.english: Let’s go outside and get some fresh air.
sentences.chinese: 我们出去呼吸些新鲜空气吧。

sentences.english: You need to put some air in the tyres.
sentences.chinese: 你得给轮胎充气了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 天空； 空气， 大气； 样子， 神态
detailed_translations.english: the mixture of gases around the Earth, that we breathe

sentences.english: an airline pilot
sentences.chinese: 航空公司飞行员

detailed_translations.english: a company that takes passengers and goods to different places by plane

sentences.english: The plane landed at Heathrow Airport.
sentences.chinese: 飞机降落在希思罗机场。

sentences.english: Her family went to see her off at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 她的家人去机场送她。

detailed_translations.english: a place where planes take off and land, with buildings for passengers to wait in

sentences.english: Would you like a window seat or an aisle seat (=  seat next to the aisle  ) ?
sentences.chinese: 您想要靠窗的座位还是靠过道的座位？

detailed_translations.english: a long passage between rows of seats in a church, plane, theatre etc, or between rows of shelves in a shop

sentences.english: I forgot to set the burglar alarm.
sentences.chinese: 我忘记打开防盗警报器了。

sentences.english: Car alarms are always going off in the street.
sentences.chinese: 街上总有汽车警报器在响。

sentences.english: a sophisticated alarm system
sentences.chinese: 精密的警报系统

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that makes a loud noise to warn you of danger
to make someone feel worried or frightened

sentences.english: The band plan to release their new album next week.
sentences.chinese: 该乐队计划下周发行他们的新专辑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 粘贴簿； 集邮簿； 相册； 音乐专辑
detailed_translations.english: a group of songs or pieces of music on a  CD  , tape etc

sentences.english: I don’t drink alcohol anymore.
sentences.chinese: 我不再喝酒了。

sentences.english: {"GLOSS":["when someone drinks too much"],"COLLOINEXA":["alcohol abuse"]}
sentences.chinese: 酗酒

sentences.english: people with alcohol problems
sentences.chinese: 有酗酒问题的人

detailed_translations.english: drinks such as beer or wine that contain a substance which can make you drunk

sentences.english: The animal raised its head, suddenly alert.
sentences.chinese: 那只动物突然警觉地抬起头来。

sentences.english: Taking notes is one of the best ways to stay alert in lectures.
sentences.chinese: 记笔记是听课时集中注意力的最佳方法之一。

detailed_translations.english: giving all your attention to what is happening, being said etc
to make someone realize something important or dangerous

detailed_translations.chinese: 警戒， 戒备； 警报
detailed_translations.english: a warning to be ready for possible danger

sentences.english: The twins were dressed alike.
sentences.chinese: 这对双胞胎穿着相似。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一样地， 相似地； 同样程度地
detailed_translations.english: in a similar way
very similar

sentences.chinese: 这是一宗严重事故——他们能活着实属幸运。

sentences.english: My grandparents are still alive .
sentences.chinese: 我的祖父母和外祖父母都还健在。

sentences.english: We stayed alive by eating berries.
sentences.chinese: 我们靠吃浆果活命。

sentences.english: He was kept alive on a life-support machine.
sentences.chinese: 他靠生命维持装置活着。

sentences.english: Apparently he’s alive and well and living in Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 看来他还健在，住在巴西。

detailed_translations.chinese: 活着的， 在世的； 存在的， 在起作用的； 有活力的， 活跃的， 有生
detailed_translations.english: still living and not dead

sentences.chinese: 你不应该一个人孤零零地坐在这儿。

sentences.chinese: 一袭黑衣的奇怪女子

sentences.english: If people want more freedom of choice, then I’m all for it (=  I strongly support it  ) .
sentences.chinese: 如果民众想要更多选择的自由，我完全支持。

sentences.english: ‘It was a dreadful experience.’ ‘Never mind, it’s all over (=  completely finished  ) now.’
sentences.chinese: “真是一段可怕的经历。”“没关系，现在都过去了。”

detailed_translations.chinese: 完全地； 十分， 很
detailed_translations.english: completely

detailed_translations.chinese: 一切的，所有的；全部的，总的，整个的

sentences.english: We don’t allow diving in the pool.
sentences.chinese: 泳池内禁止跳水。

detailed_translations.chinese: 允许， 准许， 容许； 允许…进入； 同意给； 承认
detailed_translations.english: to let someone do or have something, or let something happen

sentences.english: Have you almost finished?
sentences.chinese: 你差不多完成了吗？

sentences.english: Supper’s almost ready.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭就要做好了。

sentences.english: It was almost midnight.
sentences.chinese: 午夜将至。

sentences.english: Almost nothing was done to improve the situation.
sentences.chinese: 几乎没有采取什么措施来改善这个情况。

sentences.english: The story is almost certainly true.
sentences.chinese: 这故事几乎肯定是真实的。

sentences.english: He’s almost as old as I am.
sentences.chinese: 他差不多跟我一样大。

detailed_translations.english: nearly, but not completely or not quite

sentences.english: She lives alone .
sentences.chinese: 她一个人生活。

sentences.english: You shouldn’t leave a child alone in the house.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该把小孩独自留在家里。

sentences.english: My wife and I like to spend time alone together away from the kids.
sentences.chinese: 我和妻子喜欢没有孩子打扰，过二人世界。

detailed_translations.chinese: 单独的， 孤独的； 单单， 仅； 独一无二的， 唯一的
detailed_translations.english: if you are alone in a place, there is no one with you

sentences.english: I was driving along, thinking about Chris.
sentences.chinese: 我一边开车，一边想着克里斯。

sentences.english: a group of children walking along in a line
sentences.chinese: 排着队向前走的一群孩子

detailed_translations.english: going forward
from one place on something such as a line, road, or edge towards the other end of it

sentences.english: A car drew up alongside .
sentences.chinese: 一辆车在旁边停了下来。

sentences.english: Children’s prices are shown alongside adult prices.
sentences.chinese: 儿童票价标在成人票价旁边。

detailed_translations.english: next to the side of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 在…旁边， 沿着…的边； 和…在一起

sentences.english: When we were children, our father read aloud to us.
sentences.chinese: 当我们是孩子时，我们的父亲大声地朗读给我们听。

detailed_translations.english: if you read, laugh, say something etc aloud, you read etc so that people can hear you

sentences.english: The design of the new house is similar to those that have already been built.
sentences.chinese: 新房的设计与那些已建好的房子相似。

sentences.english: The performance had already started when we arrived.
sentences.chinese: 我们到达时表演已经开始了。

detailed_translations.english: before now, or before a particular time

sentences.english: Information is also available on women’s health care.
sentences.chinese: 还可以获得有关女性保健方面的资料。

sentences.english: She sings beautifully and also plays the flute and piano.
sentences.chinese: 她歌唱得好，而且还会吹长笛和弹钢琴。

sentences.english: The system was not only complicated but also ineffective.
sentences.chinese: 这套系统不仅复杂而且效率低。

detailed_translations.chinese: 而且， 也， 此外； 同样
detailed_translations.english: in addition to something else that you have mentioned

sentences.english: An alternative route is along the Via Unione.
sentences.chinese: 另一条路线是沿着联合路走。

detailed_translations.chinese: 两者选一的， 供选择的； 另类的
detailed_translations.english: an alternative idea, plan etc is different from the one you have and can be used instead

detailed_translations.chinese: 替换物，选择；选择的自由
detailed_translations.english: something you can choose to do or use instead of something else

sentences.english: Although in poor health, she continued to carry out her duties.
sentences.chinese: 尽管身体不好，她仍继续执行任务。

sentences.english: We decided to take rooms in Longwood House, although we knew we could not really afford the rent.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我们知道自己其实付不起租金，但还是决定住朗伍德庄园的房间。

sentences.english: Although I can’t help admiring the man’s courage, I do not approve of his methods.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我不得不佩服那个男子的勇气，却并不赞成他的方法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 虽然， 尽管； 然而
detailed_translations.english: used to introduce a statement that makes your main statement seem surprising or unlikely

sentences.english: an old custom that has vanished altogether
sentences.chinese: 一个彻底消亡的古老习俗

sentences.english: Congress could ban the procession altogether.
sentences.chinese: 国会可以完全禁止这次游行。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that something has been done completely or has finished completely
not wearing any clothes – used humorously

sentences.english: Always lock your bicycle to something secure.
sentences.chinese: 每次都要把自行车锁在牢固的物体上。

sentences.english: She’d always assumed that Gabriel was a girl’s name.
sentences.chinese: 她一直认为加布里埃尔是个女孩名字。

sentences.english: He hadn’t always been a butler.
sentences.chinese: 他并不是一直当管家。

detailed_translations.chinese: 总是， 无例外地； 永远， 始终， 一直
detailed_translations.english: all the time, at all times, or every time

sentences.english: The meeting is scheduled for 9 a.m.
sentences.chinese: 会议安排在上午9点。

sentences.english: I usually wake up at 6 a.m.
sentences.chinese: 我通常在早上6点起床。

detailed_translations.english: short for 'ante meridiem', referring to the time period from 12:00 midnight to 11:59 a.m.

sentences.english: ...professional athletes and amateur runners.
sentences.chinese: …专业运动员和业余赛跑运动员。

detailed_translations.chinese: 业余爱好的， 业余的； 外行的
detailed_translations.english: Amateur sports or activities are done by people as a hobby and not as a job
someone who does an activity just for pleasure, not as their job

sentences.english: He’s an amazing player to watch.
sentences.chinese: 看他比赛那才叫精彩呢。

sentences.english: an amazing bargain
sentences.chinese: 令人惊喜的便宜货

detailed_translations.english: very good, especially in an unexpected way

sentences.english: He was young and full of ambition.
sentences.chinese: 他年轻，而且雄心勃勃。

detailed_translations.chinese: 雄心， 抱负； 野心； 期望得到的东西
detailed_translations.english: determination to be successful, rich, powerful etc

sentences.english: the ambulance service
sentences.chinese: 救护车服务

sentences.english: the ambulance service
sentences.chinese: 你觉得我们需要叫救护车吗？

detailed_translations.english: a special vehicle that is used to take people who are ill or injured to hospital

sentences.english: Numerical method used in this paper is a amendment of the influx split method which is always used for compressible flow.
sentences.chinese: 本文对传统的可压缩流动中的通量分裂方法进行了修正，使其可以用于扰动方程的计算。

detailed_translations.english: a small change or improvement that is made to a law or a document; the process of changing a law or a document

sentences.english: The girl quickly disappeared among the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 女孩转眼消失在人群中。

sentences.english: I could hear voices coming from somewhere among the bushes.
sentences.chinese: 我能听到灌木丛中某个地方传来说话的声音。

sentences.english: We walked among the chestnut woods on the mountain slopes.
sentences.chinese: 我们走在山坡上的栗树林中。

sentences.english: She began rummaging among the books on her desk.
sentences.chinese: 她开始在桌子上的一堆书中乱翻起来。

detailed_translations.english: in or through the middle of a group of people or things

sentences.english: Consumer spending on sports-related items amounted to $9.75 billion.
sentences.chinese: 消费者在体育相关用品上的消费总共达到了97.5亿美元。

detailed_translations.english: If something amounts to a particular total, all the parts of it add up to that total
a quantity of something such as time, money, or a substance

sentences.english: Doing jigsaws would amuse Amy for hours on end.
sentences.chinese: 拼图能让埃米连续玩上几个小时。

sentences.english: The kids amused themselves playing hide-and-seek.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们玩捉迷藏玩。

detailed_translations.english: to make time pass in an enjoyable way, so that you do not get bored

sentences.english: She still needs to analyse the data.
sentences.chinese: 她仍需要分析这些数据。

sentences.english: You need to sit down and analyse why you feel so upset.
sentences.chinese: 你得坐下来想一想自己为什么会那么生气。

sentences.english: Joe had never tried to analyze their relationship.
sentences.chinese: 乔从未试图去理清他们的关系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 分析； 分解； 解析
detailed_translations.english: to examine or think about something carefully, in order to understand it

sentences.english: My ancestors were French.
sentences.chinese: 我的祖先是法国人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 祖宗， 祖先； 原型； 先驱
detailed_translations.english: a member of your family who lived a long time ago

sentences.english: the ancient civilizations of Asia
sentences.chinese: 亚洲的古代文明

detailed_translations.chinese: 古代的， 古老的； 年老的， 看上去很老的
detailed_translations.english: belonging to a time long ago in history, especially thousands of years ago

sentences.english: He’s gone to get some fish and chips.
sentences.chinese: 他去买炸鱼薯条了。

sentences.english: The film starred Jack Lemmon and Shirley Maclaine.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影由杰克·莱蒙和雪莉·麦克莱恩主演。

sentences.english: We’ve dealt with items one, two, and eleven.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经处理了第一项、第二项和第十一项。

sentences.english: He was tall, dark, and handsome.
sentences.chinese: 他身材高大、皮肤黝黑，相貌英俊。

sentences.english: He plays the guitar and sings folk songs.
sentences.chinese: 他弹吉他唱民歌。

sentences.english: She didn’t speak to anyone and nobody spoke to her.
sentences.chinese: 她不跟别人说话，也没人跟她说话。

detailed_translations.chinese: 和， 与， 及； 那么， 则； 然后， 接着； 而且， 还
detailed_translations.english: used to join two words, phrases etc referring to things that are related in some way

sentences.english: You didn’t measure the angle accurately.
sentences.chinese: 你没有量准角度。

detailed_translations.chinese: 角， 角度； 观点， 立场
detailed_translations.english: the space between two straight lines or surfaces that join each other, measured in degrees

sentences.english: I was angry because he hadn’t told me his plans.
sentences.chinese: 我很生气，因为他没有告诉我他的计划。

sentences.english: He was beginning to get angry .
sentences.chinese: 他开始发脾气了。

sentences.english: His comments brought an angry response from opposition politicians.
sentences.chinese: 他的话激起反对派政客愤怒的回应。

sentences.english: ‘Calm down,’ she said, looking at his angry face.
sentences.chinese: “冷静一下。”她看着他那张生气的脸说道。

sentences.english: Jesse laughed, which made me even angrier .
sentences.chinese: 杰西笑了起来，这令我更加恼火。

detailed_translations.chinese: 生气的， 发怒的， 愤怒的
detailed_translations.english: feeling strong emotions which make you want to shout at someone or hurt them because they have behaved in an unfair, cruel, offensive etc way, or because you think that a situation is unfair, unacceptable etc

sentences.english: a diet rich in red meat and animal fats
sentences.chinese: 摄入大量红肉和动物脂肪的饮食

detailed_translations.english: human feelings, desires etc that are connected with sex, food, and other basic needs
a living creature such as a dog or cat, that is not an insect, plant, bird, fish, or person

sentences.english: slender ankles
sentences.chinese: 纤细的脚踝

detailed_translations.english: the joint between your foot and your leg

sentences.english: They announced their engagement in ‘The Times’.
sentences.chinese: 他们在《泰晤士报》上宣布了订婚的消息。

sentences.english: At the end of their meeting, it was announced that an agreement had been reached.
sentences.chinese: 会议最后宣布已达成一项协议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 宣布， 声称； 预告
detailed_translations.english: to officially tell people about something, especially about a plan or a decision

sentences.english: What annoyed him most was that he had received no apology.
sentences.chinese: 最令他生气的是没人向他道歉。

sentences.english: It really annoys me when I see people dropping litter.
sentences.chinese: 看到别人乱丢垃圾我非常生气。

sentences.english: She annoyed him with her stupid questions.
sentences.chinese: 她那些愚蠢的问题令他很恼火。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel slightly angry and unhappy about something

sentences.english: The school trip has become an annual event.
sentences.chinese: 学校组织的旅行成了一年一度的活动。

detailed_translations.english: happening once a year

detailed_translations.chinese: 年报， 年鉴； 一年生的植物
detailed_translations.english: a plant that lives for one year or season

sentences.english: But I concluded that no one ruin is like another.
sentences.chinese: 但我断定没有一个废墟与另外的是相像的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 又一的， 再一个的； 另一的， 别的； 不同的

sentences.english: She thought for a moment before answering.
sentences.chinese: 她想了一会儿才回答。

sentences.english: He still hadn’t answered my question .
sentences.chinese: 他仍然没有回答我的问题。

sentences.english: ‘Why don’t you just leave?’ ‘I’d like to,’ she answered, ‘but I have nowhere else to go.’
sentences.chinese: “你为什么不一走了之？”“我倒是想走，”她回答说，“但是我没有其他地方可去。”

sentences.english: How much was it? Come on, answer me.
sentences.chinese: 多少钱？ 快点告诉我吧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 回答， 答复； 解答， 解决； 作
detailed_translations.english: to say something to someone as a reply when they have asked you a question, made a suggestion etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 回答，答复；答案，解决办法
detailed_translations.english: something you say when you reply to a question that someone has asked you

sentences.english: Ants swarmed up out of the ground and covered her shoes and legs.
sentences.chinese: 蚂蚁从地里成群地爬出来，爬满了她的鞋和腿。

detailed_translations.english: a small insect that lives in large groups

sentences.english: Sales are better than anticipated.
sentences.chinese: 销量比预期要好。

sentences.english: A good speaker is able to anticipate an audience’s needs and concerns.
sentences.chinese: 好的演讲者能够预先考虑到听众需要什么、关注什么。

detailed_translations.chinese: 预料， 预期， 期望； 先于…行动； 提前使用
detailed_translations.english: to expect that something will happen and be ready for it

sentences.english: an antique rosewood desk
sentences.chinese: 古董红木书桌

detailed_translations.english: antique furniture, jewellery etc is old and often valuable
a piece of furniture, jewellery etc that was made a very long time ago and is therefore valuable

sentences.english: She gave me an anxious look.
sentences.chinese: 她焦急地看了我一眼。

detailed_translations.chinese: 焦虑的， 发愁的， 令人焦急的； 渴望的， 急
detailed_translations.english: worried about something

sentences.english: We should be prepared for any contingency.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该对任何应急情况有所准备。

sentences.english: We could not reason out which way the robbers escaped, because we were unable to find any trace of them.
sentences.chinese: 我们推断不出这些强盗是从哪个方向逃走的，因为我们找不到他们的任何踪迹。

detailed_translations.chinese: 任一的， 任何的； 什么， 一些； 丝毫的

sentences.english: Anybody can learn to play the guitar if they practice enough.
sentences.chinese: 只要练习足够，任何人都可以学会弹吉他。

sentences.english: If anyone needs help, please let me know.
sentences.chinese: 如果任何人需要帮助，请告诉我。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to any person without specifying who

sentences.english: The cupboard would hardly close, with all the shoes thrown in anyhow.
sentences.chinese: 柜子乱塞了许多鞋，都快关不上了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无论如何， 不管怎么说； 随随便便地， 杂乱无章地
detailed_translations.english: in a careless or untidy way

sentences.english: Nick doesn’t live here anymore.
sentences.chinese: 尼克不再住在这里了。

sentences.english: She told me not to phone her anymore.
sentences.chinese: 她叫我不要再给她打电话。

detailed_translations.chinese: 再， 更， 还； 目前， 现在， 今后
detailed_translations.english: not any longer

sentences.english: You can buy anything you want.
sentences.chinese: 你想要什么都可以买。

sentences.english: He was prepared to do anything to make a bit of money.
sentences.chinese: 只要能赚一点钱，他什么都愿意做。

sentences.english: Anything would be better than staying at home!
sentences.chinese: 做什么都比待在家里好！

sentences.english: You can write about swimming, skiing, or anything else you enjoy doing.
sentences.chinese: 你可以写游泳、写滑雪或者其他任何你喜欢的活动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无论什么东西， 随便什么事情； 任何东西， 任何事情
detailed_translations.english: any thing, event, situation etc, when it is not important to say exactly which

sentences.english: Catherine wasn’t sure the book was the right one, but she bought it anyway.
sentences.chinese: 凯瑟琳不能确定就是这本书，但她还是买了。

sentences.english: This idea probably won’t work, but let’s try it anyway.
sentences.chinese: 这个办法可能行不通，不过我们还是试试吧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不管怎么说， 无论如何； 不论以何种方式， 无论从什么角度
detailed_translations.english: in spite of the fact that you have just mentioned

sentences.english: Sit anywhere you like.
sentences.chinese: 你随便坐吧。

sentences.english: You can buy clothes like these anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 这样的衣服到处都可以买到。

sentences.english: I don’t want to live in London, but I’d be happy living anywhere else .
sentences.chinese: 我不想住在伦敦，但是住在其他什么地方我都很乐意。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在什么地方， 在任何地方； 随便什么地方
detailed_translations.english: in or to any place

sentences.english: They have offices in countries as far apart as India and Peru.
sentences.chinese: 他们的办事处远至印度、秘鲁等国。

sentences.english: The police try to keep rival supporters apart at all matches.
sentences.chinese: 警方在所有的比赛中都设法将双方的支持者分开。

sentences.english: A couple of men started fighting and we had to pull them apart .
sentences.chinese: 几名男子打起架来，我们不得不将他们拉开。

sentences.english: Joel stood apart from the group, frowning.
sentences.chinese: 乔尔皱着眉头，独自站在一边。

sentences.english: Their concept of a performance and our concept were miles apart.
sentences.chinese: 他们对一场表演的概念和我们的概念相去甚远。

detailed_translations.chinese: 成距离，相间隔；分开，除去
detailed_translations.english: if things are apart, they are not close to each other or touching each other
If people or groups are a long way apart on a particular topic or issue, they have completely different views and disagree about it

sentences.english: She lives in a small apartment.
sentences.chinese: 她住在一套小公寓里。

detailed_translations.english: a set of rooms on one floor of a large building, where someone lives

sentences.english: I must apologize for being late to the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 我必须为开会迟到道歉。

sentences.english: He apologized for his rude behavior towards her.
sentences.chinese: 他对自己的粗鲁行为向她道歉。

sentences.english: She decided to apologize to her friend for the misunderstanding.
sentences.chinese: 她决定为误会向朋友道歉。

detailed_translations.english: to say sorry for something that you have done wrong

sentences.english: Apparently, he forgot to set his alarm clock.
sentences.chinese: 显然，他忘记设置他的闹钟了。

sentences.english: It's apparently a very difficult problem to solve.
sentences.chinese: 这显然是一个非常困难的问题来解决。

sentences.english: She didn't seem to know the answer, apparently.
sentences.chinese: 她似乎不知道答案。

detailed_translations.english: clearly; evidently; apparently; seemingly

sentences.english: She is not happy with the decision and plans to appeal.
sentences.chinese: 她不服判决，打算上诉。

detailed_translations.english: to make a serious public request for help, money, information etc
to make a formal request to a court or someone in authority asking for a decision to be changed

detailed_translations.chinese: 感染力， 吸引力； 呼吁， 上诉
detailed_translations.english: an urgent request for something important

sentences.english: Police have found what appear to be human remains.
sentences.chinese: 警方发现了疑似人体遗骸的东西。

sentences.english: He tried to make it appear that she had committed suicide.
sentences.chinese: 他试图制造她自杀的假象。

sentences.english: It may be less useful than it appears at first.
sentences.chinese: 这可能没有一开始显得那么有用。

detailed_translations.chinese: 出现， 显露， 来到； 看起来好像， 似乎； 产生， 问世； 发表
detailed_translations.english: used to say how something seems, especially from what you know about it or from what you can see

sentences.english: Her husband always had a huge appetite.
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫向来胃口极大。

sentences.english: Symptoms include tiredness and loss of appetite.
sentences.chinese: 症状包括疲倦和食欲不振。

detailed_translations.chinese: 食欲， 胃口； 欲望
detailed_translations.english: a desire for food

sentences.english: The audience applauded loudly.
sentences.chinese: 观众掌声雷动。

sentences.english: A crowd of 300 supporters warmly applauded her speech.
sentences.chinese: 300名支持者为她的演讲热烈鼓掌。

detailed_translations.english: to hit your open hands together, to show that you have enjoyed a play, concert, speaker etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 向…鼓掌， 向…喝彩； 称赞， 赞许
detailed_translations.english: to hit your open hands together, to show that you have enjoyed a play, concert, speaker etc

sentences.english: apple pie
sentences.chinese: 苹果馅饼

sentences.english: an apple tree
sentences.chinese: 苹果树

sentences.english: roast pork and apple sauce (=  a thick sauce made from cooked apples  )
sentences.chinese: 烤猪肉配苹果酱汁

detailed_translations.english: a hard round fruit that has red, light green, or yellow skin and is white inside

sentences.english: We need to apply for planning permission to build a garage.
sentences.chinese: 我们建车库需要申请规划许可。

detailed_translations.chinese: 适用； 申请， 请求； 涂， 敷， 施
detailed_translations.english: to make a formal request, usually written, for something such as a job, a place at a university, or permission to do something

detailed_translations.chinese: 应用，实施；使用；涂敷；把…施于
detailed_translations.english: to use something such as a method, idea, or law in a particular situation, activity, or process

sentences.english: All consultations are by appointment only .
sentences.chinese: 就诊必须预约。

detailed_translations.chinese: 约会； 约定； 任命， 委派； 职务， 职位
detailed_translations.english: an arrangement for a meeting at an agreed time and place, for a particular purpose

sentences.english: Thanks ever so much for your help, I really appreciate it.
sentences.chinese: 多谢你的帮助，我真的很感激。

sentences.english: I appreciate your concern , but honestly, I’m fine.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你关心，不过说真的，我很好。

sentences.english: I’d appreciate it if you let me get on with my job.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能让我继续工作，我会非常感激。

detailed_translations.chinese: 重视， 赏识； 领会， 体会； 感谢； 增值
detailed_translations.english: used to thank someone in a polite way or to say that you are grateful for something they have done

sentences.english: As I approached the house, I noticed a light on upstairs.
sentences.chinese: 我走近那幢房子的时候注意到楼上有灯光。

sentences.english: She heard footsteps approaching.
sentences.chinese: 她听到有脚步声走过来。

detailed_translations.english: to move towards or nearer to someone or something
movement towards or near to something

sentences.english: The timing of the announcement was particularly appropriate .
sentences.chinese: 通告发布的时机很合适。

sentences.english: Where appropriate , I delegate as much work as possible.
sentences.chinese: 只要合适，我就尽量把工作分派出去。

sentences.english: Mark box 1 or 2, as appropriate .
sentences.chinese: 把方框1和2中的合适者标出来。

sentences.english: I can assure you that appropriate action will be taken.
sentences.chinese: 我向你保证会采取适当的行动。

detailed_translations.english: correct or suitable for a particular time, situation, or purpose

sentences.english: The conference approved a proposal for a referendum.
sentences.chinese: 会议通过了举行全民公决的提议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 赞成， 称许； 批准
detailed_translations.english: to officially accept a plan, proposal etc

sentences.english: When she passed under the arch leading out of the park, Mira whooped with delight.
sentences.chinese: 从通向公园外的拱门下走过时，米拉高兴地喊叫起来。

detailed_translations.english: a structure with a curved top and straight sides that supports the weight of a bridge or building
to form or make something form a curved shape

sentences.english: Tinoco was one of the architects of the government’s economic reforms.
sentences.chinese: 蒂诺科是政府经济改革的设计师之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: 建筑师， 设计师； 缔造者
detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to design buildings

sentences.english: Only cheeses made in this area may be labelled ‘Roquefort.’
sentences.chinese: 只有这个地区出产的干酪才能被称作“罗克福尔干酪”。

sentences.english: Crime rates are much higher in urban areas.
sentences.chinese: 城镇地区的犯罪率要高很多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 面积； 地区， 地方； 领域， 范围
detailed_translations.english: a particular part of a country, town etc

sentences.english: We could hear the neighbours arguing.
sentences.chinese: 我们听到邻居在争吵。

detailed_translations.chinese: 争论， 争吵， 争辩； 提出理由证明， 主张； 说服， 劝说
detailed_translations.english: to disagree with someone in words, often in an angry way

sentences.english: A crisis has arisen in the Foreign Office.
sentences.chinese: 外交部出现了危机。

sentences.english: More problems like those at the nuclear power plant are certain to arise.
sentences.chinese: 核电厂肯定还会出现那样的问题。

detailed_translations.chinese: 出现； 由…引起； 起身， 起床
detailed_translations.english: if a problem or difficult situation arises, it begins to happen

sentences.english: Dave has a broken arm .
sentences.chinese: 戴夫手臂断了。

sentences.english: Tim’s mother put her arms around him.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆的母亲伸出双臂搂着他。

sentences.english: Pat was carrying a box under his arm .
sentences.chinese: 帕特腋下挟着一个盒子。

sentences.english: He had a pile of books in his arms .
sentences.chinese: 他抱着一摞书。

sentences.english: They walked along the beach arm in arm (=  with their arms bent around each other’s  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们臂挽臂走在沙滩上。

sentences.english: The old lady rushed to greet him, arms outstretched .
sentences.chinese: 老太太张开双臂，快步上前迎接他。

detailed_translations.chinese: 以装备； 提供， 配备；
detailed_translations.english: to provide all the information, skills, or equipment you need to do something
one of the two long parts of your body between your shoulders and your hands

sentences.english: The army are helping to clear up after the floods.
sentences.chinese: 陆军部队正协助洪灾后的清理工作。

sentences.english: an army officer
sentences.chinese: 陆军军官

sentences.english: Army units launched attacks on bases near Jounieh port.
sentences.chinese: 陆军部队对朱尼耶港附近的基地发动了进攻。

sentences.english: He joined the army when he was 17.
sentences.chinese: 他17岁参加了陆军。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a country’s military force that is trained to fight on land in a war

sentences.english: The whole family was sitting around the dinner table.
sentences.chinese: 全家人围坐在饭桌旁。

sentences.english: The Romans built a defensive wall around the city.
sentences.chinese: 罗马人在城市周围筑起一道防御墙。

sentences.english: She wore a beautiful silk shawl around her shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 她在肩上围了一条漂亮的真丝披肩。

sentences.english: People crowded around to see what was happening.
sentences.chinese: 人们挤在四周围观。

sentences.english: We would hear the birds singing all around us.
sentences.chinese: 我们会听见四周鸟儿在唱歌。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在周围，在附近；到处，四周；大约
detailed_translations.english: surrounding or on all sides of something or someone

sentences.chinese: 纽约现代艺术博物馆

detailed_translations.english: the use of painting, drawing,  sculpture  etc to represent things or express ideas

sentences.english: The paper’s leading article (=  the main article  ) described the government as weak.

sentences.english: Please let me know your decision as soon as possible (=  as soon as you can  ) .

detailed_translations.english: moved to one side or away from you

sentences.chinese: “你叫什么名字？”她问道 。

sentences.english: Don’t ask him – he won’t know.

detailed_translations.english: to speak or write to someone in order to get an answer, information, or a solution

sentences.english: Quiet! The baby’s asleep.
sentences.chinese: 安静！ 宝宝在睡觉。

sentences.chinese: 该测试将评估能力而不是学业成绩。

sentences.english: ...the assistant secretary of defence.
sentences.chinese: …助理国防部长。

detailed_translations.english: Assistant is used in front of titles or jobs to indicate a slightly lower rank. For example, an assistant director is one rank lower than a director in an organization.
someone who helps someone else in their work, especially by doing the less important jobs

sentences.english: the Association of Master Builders
sentences.chinese: 建筑师协会

detailed_translations.english: an organization that consists of a group of people who have the same aims, do the same kind of work etc

sentences.english: I think we can safely assume (=  it is almost certain  ) that interest rates will go up again soon.

sentences.english: You would be making an assumption that's not based on any fact that you could report.

detailed_translations.chinese: 假定， 臆断； 担任， 承担
detailed_translations.english: something that you think is true although you have no definite proof

sentences.english: It astonished him that she had changed so little.

sentences.chinese: 宇航员在失重环境中优雅地漂浮着。

sentences.chinese: 成为一名宇航员需要大量的训练和良好的身体素质。

sentences.chinese: 我的理想是当一个天文学家。

sentences.chinese: 如果有人知道你是个天文学家，他们会很快向你询问关于这件事的一切。

sentences.chinese: 任何国家、任何大学的天文学家都可以递交申请，告诉我们他们想要使用这台望远镜做什么。

sentences.chinese: 我在迪斯科舞会上认识了我的妻子。

sentences.english: The matter was discussed at a meeting of the finance committee.
sentences.chinese: 这件事在财务委员会的会议上讨论过了。

sentences.chinese: 对不起，帕姆正在吃午饭。

detailed_translations.english: someone who competes in sports competitions, especially running, jumping, and throwing

sentences.chinese: 使用自动取款机方便快捷地获取现金。

sentences.chinese: 炸弹袭击

sentences.english: an arson attack

detailed_translations.english: an act of violence that is intended to hurt a person or damage a place

sentences.chinese: 斯科特在自己的办公桌前坐下，将注意力转向面前的文件。

sentences.chinese: 现在他已经走了，我可以把全部注意力都放在你身上。

sentences.chinese: 这个游戏很有趣，一定能使年幼学生保持注意力。

sentences.chinese: 他们很认真地听演讲。

sentences.chinese: 关注细节是这份工作所必需的。

sentences.chinese: 他们一听说我是医生，态度就完全改变了。

sentences.chinese: 我一般不喜欢金发女子。

sentences.chinese: 观众开始鼓掌欢呼。

sentences.chinese: 有一名观众说这出歌剧“乏味”。

detailed_translations.chinese: 听众， 观众， 读者
detailed_translations.english: a group of people who come to watch and listen to someone speaking or performing in public

sentences.chinese: 玛丽姑妈

sentences.english: Nothomb is a Belgian author.
sentences.chinese: 诺东是位比利时作家。

sentences.english: It’s clear that the author is a woman.
sentences.chinese: 显然，这位作者是女性。

detailed_translations.chinese: 作家， 作者； 创始人， 发起者
detailed_translations.english: someone who has written a book

sentences.chinese: 美国和哥伦比亚当局的一份协议

detailed_translations.english: the power you have because of your official position

sentences.english: The car is a common form of transportation in many countries.
sentences.chinese: 汽车是许多国家常见的交通工具。

sentences.english: She decided to buy a new automobile for her commute.
sentences.chinese: 她决定买一辆新的汽车来上下班。

sentences.english: Automobile manufacturing is a major industry in Germany.
sentences.chinese: 汽车制造业是德国的主要产业。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that carries people or goods on roads

sentences.english: an automatic weapon
sentences.chinese: 自动武器

sentences.english: an automatic gearbox
sentences.chinese: 自动变速箱

sentences.english: My camera is fully automatic .
sentences.chinese: 我的照相机是全自动的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 自动的，机械的；不假思索的，无意识的；必然的，自然的
detailed_translations.english: an automatic machine is designed to work without needing someone to operate it for each part of a process

detailed_translations.chinese: 自动手枪； 有自动装置的汽车
detailed_translations.english: a weapon that can fire bullets continuously

sentences.english: They proudly declared themselves part of a new autonomous province.
sentences.chinese: 他们自豪地宣布自己是新自治省的一部分。

detailed_translations.chinese: 自治的； 独立自主的
detailed_translations.english: an autonomous place or organization is free to govern or control itself

sentences.english: We enjoy the beautiful colors of autumn every year.
sentences.chinese: 我们每年都欣赏秋天的美丽色彩。

sentences.english: Fall is my favorite season for hiking.
sentences.chinese: 秋天是我最喜欢的远足季节。

sentences.english: The leaves start to change color in autumn.
sentences.chinese: 秋天树叶开始变色。

detailed_translations.english: the season between summer and winter, when the weather becomes cooler and the leaves fall from the trees

sentences.english: Tickets are available from the box office.
sentences.chinese: 售票处有票出售。

sentences.english: Meetings were held to update employees as soon as new information became available .
sentences.chinese: 一有新的信息就开会告诉员工。

sentences.english: Further building can continue when money is made available .
sentences.chinese: 有了资金就可以继续进一步的施工。

sentences.english: Every available space on the wall was covered in pictures.
sentences.chinese: 墙上每一个可用的地方都挂上了画。

detailed_translations.chinese: 现成可使用的， 通用的； 可取的； 联系的； 可得到的
detailed_translations.english: something that is available is able to be used or can easily be bought or found

sentences.english: Fifth Avenue
sentences.chinese: 第五大街

sentences.english: Shaftesbury Avenue
sentences.chinese: 沙夫茨伯里街

detailed_translations.chinese: 林荫道； 道路， 大街
detailed_translations.english: used in the names of streets in a town or city

sentences.english: The age of the candidates ranged from 29 to 49 with an average age of 37.
sentences.chinese: 候选人的年龄29岁至49岁不等，平均37岁。

sentences.english: The average cost of making a movie has risen by 15%.
sentences.chinese: 制作一部影片的平均成本上升了15%。

sentences.english: Last winter was colder than average.
sentences.chinese: 去年冬天比平常冷。

sentences.english: The cars were being sold at an average price of $11,000.
sentences.chinese: 这些汽车的平均售价是1.1万美元。

detailed_translations.english: the average amount is the amount you get when you add together several quantities and divide this by the total number of quantities
to usually do something or usually happen a particular number of times, or to usually be a particular size or amount
the amount calculated by adding together several quantities, and then dividing this amount by the total number of quantities

sentences.english: Road safety is taught to young children to avoid road accidents.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子受到道路安全知识的教育，以避免交通事故。

sentences.english: It is important to take measures to avoid the risk of fire.
sentences.chinese: 采取措施避免火灾风险很重要。

sentences.english: Alan narrowly avoided an accident.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦险出事故。

detailed_translations.chinese: 避免； 避开， 躲开； 预防
detailed_translations.english: to prevent something bad from happening

sentences.english: I hope he’s awake now.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他现在醒着。

sentences.english: She was still only half awake when I brought her a cup of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 我给她端去咖啡的时候，她还是半睡半醒的样子。

sentences.english: How do you stay awake during boring lectures?
sentences.chinese: 听无聊的课你是怎样不让自己睡着的？

sentences.english: Emma lay awake half the night, worrying.
sentences.chinese: 埃玛忧心忡忡，半宿都没睡着。

sentences.english: The noise brought him wide awake (=  completely awake  ) .
sentences.chinese: 那声音使他睡意全无。

sentences.chinese: 为了不让自己睡着，他们坐在地板上相互讲故事。

detailed_translations.chinese: [awoke-awaken] 醒， 唤醒； 意识到， 醒悟
detailed_translations.english: to wake up, or to make someone wake up

sentences.english: Moodie has been awarded a golf scholarship at the University of Hawaii.
sentences.chinese: 穆迪获授夏威夷大学高尔夫奖学金。

sentences.english: The Institute's annual award is presented to organizations that are dedicated to democracy and human rights.
sentences.chinese: 该协会的年度奖授予致力于民主与人权的组织。

detailed_translations.english: to officially give someone something such as a prize or money to reward them for something they have done

detailed_translations.chinese: 奖， 奖品； 报酬， 津贴
detailed_translations.english: An award is a prize or certificate that a person is given for doing something well

sentences.english: Mr Braley has been made aware of the need for absolute secrecy.
sentences.chinese: 布雷利先生被告知需要绝对保密。

sentences.english: As you are aware, a fee will be charged annually.
sentences.chinese: 正如你所知道的那样，每年都要收取一笔费用。

detailed_translations.english: if you are aware that a situation exists, you realize or know that it exists

sentences.english: Go away!

sentences.chinese: 如果你在这一时期什么也不能做(比如旅行，郊游，读书等)，那么你可以选择参加书店里有趣的演讲，你将会听到非常刺激的东西。

sentences.chinese: 我从不食言。

sentences.chinese: 你出卖了我，你说话不算数。

sentences.chinese: 工作早餐

sentences.chinese: 这些胸罩专为乳房丰满的女性设计。

sentences.english: a house made of brick

sentences.chinese: 抗议者用石头和砖块袭击警察。

detailed_translations.chinese: 砖， 砖块， 砖状物

sentences.english: a fallen tree bridging the stream
sentences.chinese: 倒下来架在小溪上的树

detailed_translations.english: a structure built over a river, road etc that allows people or vehicles to cross from one side to the other

sentences.english: We stopped by Alice’s house for a brief visit.
sentences.chinese: 我们顺路在艾丽斯家小坐片刻。

sentences.chinese: 我们长话短说吧，我还要赶飞机。

sentences.chinese: 灿烂的阳光

sentences.english: a large bright room
sentences.chinese: 明亮的大房间

detailed_translations.chinese: 明亮的， 光明的； 聪明的， 机灵的； 欢快的； 鲜艳的； 清晰的

sentences.chinese: 强烈的光线下，她闭起了眼睛。

sentences.chinese: 我们坐在外面，沐浴在灿烂的阳光下。

sentences.english: We went along a broad passage.
sentences.chinese: 我们走在一条宽阔的走廊上。

sentences.chinese: 他身高六英尺，肩膀宽阔。

sentences.english: The interview was broadcast live across Europe.
sentences.chinese: 这次采访向整个欧洲进行了现场直播。

detailed_translations.chinese: 播送，播放；(无线电或电视)广播；播撒(种子)

sentences.english: a holiday brochure
sentences.chinese: 度假手册

detailed_translations.english: a thin book giving information or advertising something

sentences.chinese: 白色棉布衬衫

sentences.chinese: 马修咳了一声清清喉咙。

sentences.chinese: 她八岁时就会读希腊文和拉丁文了。

sentences.english: I knew I couldn’t afford the rent.

sentences.english: I was amazed at the number of plants - I counted 147.
sentences.chinese: 我对植物的数量之多感到惊讶，我数了有147棵。

sentences.chinese: 他在想柜台后面的那个女孩是否认出了他。

sentences.english: the Scandinavian countries

sentences.english: developing countries
sentences.chinese: 发展中国家

sentences.english: travelling to a foreign country
sentences.chinese: 到国外旅行

detailed_translations.chinese: 国家； 国土； 国民， 全国人民； 农村， 乡村
detailed_translations.english: an area of land that is controlled by its own government, president, king etc

sentences.english: The house had lovely views over open countryside .
sentences.chinese: 这房子望出去是开阔的乡村美景。

detailed_translations.chinese: 农村，乡下；乡下的全体居民
detailed_translations.english: land that is outside cities and towns

sentences.chinese: 弗吉尼亚州费尔法克斯县

detailed_translations.english: an area of a state or country that has its own government to deal with local matters

sentences.english: ...a problem that is coupled with lower demand for the machines themselves.
sentences.chinese: …一个与对机器本身需求量减少连在一起的问题。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of printed paper that gives you the right to pay less for something or get something free

sentences.chinese: 休在生病期间表现出了极大的勇气。

sentences.english: Driving again after his accident must have taken a lot of courage (= needed courage ) .

sentences.chinese: 船改变了航向，驶向最近的港口。

sentences.english: We decided to take a different course of action.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定采取不同的行动方案。

sentences.chinese: 河流的航向蜿蜒穿过山谷。

sentences.chinese: 为了成为一名医生，她遵循了一套严格的学习课程。

sentences.english: That was back in the 1960s when we were courting.
sentences.chinese: 那还是20世纪60年代我们在谈恋爱的时候。

detailed_translations.chinese: 法庭，法院；宫廷，朝廷；球场
detailed_translations.english: the place where a trial is held, or the people there, especially the judge and the  jury  who examine the evidence and decide whether someone is guilty or not guilty

sentences.english: My cousin Mark helped me to bring in the bags.
sentences.chinese: 我表弟马克帮我把包提了进来。

detailed_translations.english: the child of your  uncle  or  aunt

sentences.english: Cover the pot and bake for an hour.
sentences.chinese: 把锅盖上，烘烤一小时。

sentences.chinese: 她穿了件低胸连衣裙，搭了一条薄薄的披肩。

sentences.english: a herd of cows
sentences.chinese: 一群牛

detailed_translations.english: a large female animal that is kept on farms and used to produce milk or meat

sentences.chinese: 我的同事帮助我处理了项目的截止日期。

sentences.english: We often collaborate with our co-workers on new ideas.
sentences.chinese: 我们经常与我们的同事合作新的想法。

detailed_translations.english: a person who works with you

sentences.chinese: 传统的乡村手工艺

sentences.chinese: 手工艺

detailed_translations.chinese: 工艺， 手艺； 船， 航空器
detailed_translations.english: a job or activity in which you make things with your hands, and that you usually need skill to do

sentences.english: We watched the waves crashing against the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 我们看着海浪哗啦哗啦地冲击岩石。

sentences.chinese: 盘子哗啦一声摔落到地上。

sentences.chinese: 他用蜡笔给画上色。

sentences.chinese: 奶黄色的地毯

sentences.chinese: 有些人认为宇宙是通过一次大爆炸创造出来的。

sentences.chinese: 她的行为引起了很多问题。

sentences.chinese: 这家新工厂预计能创造400多个新的就业机会。

sentences.chinese: 海洋中所有的生物

detailed_translations.chinese: 生物， 动物， 人； 创造物， 产物
detailed_translations.english: anything that is living, such as an animal, fish, or insect, but not a plant

sentences.chinese: 商店同意他赊购。

sentences.chinese: 你的维萨卡信用额度是多少？

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement with a shop, bank etc that allows you to buy something and pay for it later

sentences.chinese: 飞机坠毁，造成两名机组人员和四名乘客死亡。

sentences.english: We moved here because there was very little crime.
sentences.chinese: 我们搬到这里来是因为这里的犯罪率很低。

sentences.english: a police crackdown on car crime
sentences.chinese: 警察对汽车犯罪活动的一次严厉打击

sentences.chinese: 犯罪率相对较低的一个城镇

sentences.english: The country now faces an economic crisis .
sentences.chinese: 该国目前正面临一场经济危机。

sentences.english: The Prime Minister was criticized for the way in which he handled the crisis .
sentences.chinese: 首相处理危机的方式遭到了批评。

sentences.chinese: 当前的债务危机

sentences.chinese: 重大的政治危机

sentences.chinese: 我如释重负，我们又避免了一场财政危机。

sentences.chinese: 石油公司因在20世纪70年代的石油危机中赚取了丰厚利润而受到严厉抨击。

sentences.english: The car industry is now in crisis .
sentences.chinese: 汽车工业现在正处于危机之中。

sentences.chinese: 他好像不大擅长处理危机。

sentences.chinese: 她踢着脚边松脆的树叶。

sentences.chinese: 他小心地走在松脆的、厚厚的雪地里。

sentences.chinese: 我们挑选候选人的标准

sentences.chinese: 他发表了一些严厉的批判性言论。

detailed_translations.english: if you are critical, you criticize someone or something

sentences.english: Ron does nothing but criticize and complain all the time.
sentences.chinese: 罗恩什么也不干，只是一味指责和抱怨。

sentences.english: The new law has been widely criticized .
sentences.chinese: 这项新法律受到了广泛的批评。

detailed_translations.chinese: 批评； 评论； 非难
detailed_translations.english: to express your disapproval of someone or something, or to talk about their faults

sentences.english: The main crops were oats and barley.
sentences.chinese: 主要作物是燕麦和大麦。

sentences.english: crops grown for market
sentences.chinese: 为供应市场而种植的作物

detailed_translations.english: a plant such as wheat, rice, or fruit that is grown by farmers and used as food

sentences.chinese: 他以胜利的姿态高举双手跑过终点线，赢得了这场百米赛。

detailed_translations.english: if you cross a line, track etc, you go over and beyond it

detailed_translations.english: an upright post of wood with another crossing it near the top, that people in the past were fastened to with nails and left to die on as a punishment

sentences.chinese: 汽车正驶近交叉路口。

detailed_translations.chinese: 十字路口；交叉路口；聚会的中心地点(crossroad的复数形式)
detailed_translations.english: a place where two roads meet and cross each other

sentences.chinese: 海滩上挤满了度假者。

detailed_translations.chinese: 聚集， 群集； 挤， 推

a large group of people who have gathered together to do something, for example to watch something or protest about something

sentences.english: The conservation of tropical forests is of crucial importance .
sentences.chinese: 保护热带雨林至关重要。

detailed_translations.chinese: 至关重要的， 决定性的
detailed_translations.english: something that is crucial is extremely important, because everything else depends on it

sentences.english: His death was a cruel blow .
sentences.chinese: 他的死是个无情的打击。

sentences.english: Sometimes life seems unbearably cruel.
sentences.chinese: 有时候生活残酷得让人无法承受。

detailed_translations.english: making someone suffer or feel unhappy

sentences.english: Don’t cry, Laura. It’ll be OK.
sentences.chinese: 不要哭，劳拉，没事的。

sentences.english: Upstairs, a baby began to cry.
sentences.chinese: 楼上有个婴儿开始哭起来。

sentences.english: Jamie looked like he’d been crying.
sentences.chinese: 杰米看上去好像哭过了。

sentences.english: I just couldn’t stop crying.
sentences.chinese: 我就是哭个不停。

sentences.english: That film always makes me cry .
sentences.chinese: 那部影片总是让我落泪。

sentences.english: Oliver, alone, began to cry bitterly (= cry a lot ) .
sentences.chinese: 奥利弗独自一人，开始伤心地哭了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 哭，哭泣；叫喊，鸣，叫；大声地说
detailed_translations.english: to produce tears from your eyes, usually because you are unhappy or hurt

detailed_translations.chinese: 哭； 哭声； 叫喊； 叫声
detailed_translations.english: a loud sound expressing a strong emotion such as pain, fear, or pleasure

sentences.english: French cuisine
sentences.chinese: 法式烹饪

sentences.english: vegetarian cuisine
sentences.chinese: 素食烹饪

detailed_translations.english: a particular style of cooking

sentences.english: We speak Danish at home so that the boys don’t lose touch with their language and culture.
sentences.chinese: 我们在家说丹麦语，这样男孩子们就不会脱离他们的语言和文化。

sentences.english: In our culture, it is rude to ask someone how much they earn.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的文化里，问别人收入多少是不礼貌的。

sentences.english: I love working abroad and meeting people from diffe-rent cultures.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在国外工作，认识来自不同文化的人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 文化； 文明； 教养， 教育
detailed_translations.english: the beliefs, way of life, art, and customs that are shared and accepted by people in a particular society

sentences.english: Mathew picked up the cup and sipped his coffee.
sentences.chinese: 马修拿起杯子抿了口咖啡。

sentences.english: She put her cup and saucer down on the table.
sentences.chinese: 她把杯碟放到桌上。

detailed_translations.english: a small round container, usually with a handle, that you use to drink tea, coffee etc

sentences.english: It’s in the kitchen cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 它在厨房的碗柜里。

sentences.english: The cupboard doors were open.
sentences.chinese: 柜门开着。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture with doors, and sometimes shelves, used for storing clothes, plates, food etc

sentences.english: Many types of cancer can now be cured.
sentences.chinese: 现在许多癌症都可以治好。

sentences.english: an operation that can cure short-sightedness in 15 minutes
sentences.chinese: 15分钟就可治愈近视的一种手术

detailed_translations.chinese: 治疗；治愈；使硫化；加工处理
detailed_translations.english: to make an illness or medical condition go away

detailed_translations.chinese: 治疗；治愈；[临床] 疗法
detailed_translations.english: a medicine or medical treatment that makes an illness go away

sentences.english: Puppies are naturally curious.
sentences.chinese: 小狗天生好奇。

detailed_translations.english: wanting to know about something

sentences.english: the current President
sentences.chinese: 现任总统

sentences.english: In its current state, the car is worth £1,000.
sentences.chinese: 这辆车按现在的车况来看值1,000英镑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 当前的， 通用的； 流行的， 流传的
detailed_translations.english: happening or existing now

sentences.english: I love to cook curry dishes for my family on weekends.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在周末为家人烹饪咖喱菜肴。

sentences.english: This Indian curry is spicier than the last one I tried.

sentences.chinese: 夏天她当过救生员。

sentences.english: He slept calmly during the early part of the night.
sentences.chinese: 他上半夜睡得很安稳。

sentences.english: Foxes remain hidden during the day.
sentences.chinese: 狐狸白天一直躲藏着。

detailed_translations.english: from the beginning to the end of a period of time

sentences.english: All the furniture was covered in dust .
sentences.chinese: 所有的家具都蒙上了灰尘。

sentences.english: a thick layer of dust
sentences.chinese: 厚厚的一层灰尘

sentences.english: There’s not a speck of dust in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 厨房里一尘不染。

sentences.english: Dust particles floated in the sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 阳光里飘浮着尘埃颗粒。

sentences.english: A sudden breeze sent motes of dust (= small bits of dust ) dancing in the air.
sentences.chinese: 突然刮起一阵微风吹得灰尘飞扬。

detailed_translations.english: dry powder consisting of extremely small bits of dirt that is in buildings on furniture, floors etc if they are not kept clean
to clean the dust from a surface by moving something such as a soft cloth across it

sentences.english: A bomb planted in a dustbin exploded early today.
sentences.chinese: 一枚安置在一个垃圾桶内的炸弹今天清早爆炸了。

detailed_translations.english: a large container outside your house, used for holding waste until it is taken away

sentences.english: I promise I will do my duty .
sentences.chinese: 我保证会尽到我的责任。

sentences.english: We feel it is our duty to help her.
sentences.chinese: 我们感到帮助她是我们的责任。

sentences.english: Local authorities have a duty to keep the streets clean.
sentences.chinese: 地方当局有责任保持街道整洁。

sentences.english: You have a duty to your husband and to your children.
sentences.chinese: 你对你丈夫和孩子负有责任。

sentences.english: She has a strong sense of moral duty .
sentences.chinese: 她的道德责任感很强。

sentences.english: The unions have failed in their duty to female workers.
sentences.chinese: 工会未能对女职工尽到责任。

sentences.english: In the traditional Hindu family, the son is duty-bound to look after his mother.
sentences.chinese: 在传统的印度家庭里，儿子负有照顾母亲的责任。

detailed_translations.chinese: 责任， 义务； 职责， 职务； 税， 关税
detailed_translations.english: something that you have to do because it is morally or legally right

sentences.english: a dynamic and unstable process
sentences.chinese: 不断变化的、不稳定的过程

detailed_translations.chinese: 有活力的；动力的；不断变化的
detailed_translations.english: continuously moving or changing
something that causes action or change

sentences.english: The Ming Dynasty was one of the most prosperous periods in Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 明朝是中国历史上最繁荣的时期之一。

sentences.english: The Roman Empire was a powerful dynasty that ruled for centuries.
sentences.chinese: 罗马帝国是一个强大的王朝，统治了数个世纪。

detailed_translations.english: a line of rulers from the same family that succeeds each other in the same country

sentences.english: The children were given one each, handed to them or placed on their plates.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们每人给一个，递给他们或者放在他们的盘子里。

detailed_translations.english: Each is also an adverb

sentences.english: He’s a bright kid and eager to learn.
sentences.chinese: 他是个聪明的孩子，热爱学习。

sentences.english: She’s a very hard worker and very eager to please.
sentences.chinese: 她工作很卖力，而且很希望别人满意。

sentences.english: A crowd of eager young students were already waiting outside.
sentences.chinese: 一群急不可待的青年学生已经在外面等着。

detailed_translations.english: very keen and excited about something that is going to happen or about something you want to do

sentences.english: The eagle plumed its wing.
sentences.chinese: 这只鹰整理它的翅膀。

sentences.english: She looked down at her Viennese fan of eagle feathers.
sentences.chinese: 她的头低着，眼睛看着手中的威尼斯鹰羽扇。

sentences.english: She looked down at her viennese fan of eagle feathers.
sentences.chinese: 她的头低著，眼睛看著手中的威尼斯鹰羽扇。

detailed_translations.english: a very large strong bird with a beak like a hook that eats small animals, birds etc

sentences.english: She tucked her hair behind her ears.
sentences.chinese: 她把头发拢到耳朵背后。

detailed_translations.chinese: 耳， 耳朵； 听力， 听觉
detailed_translations.english: one of the organs on either side of your head that you hear with

sentences.english: We arrived early.
sentences.chinese: 我们提早到了。

sentences.english: They must have come home early.
sentences.chinese: 他们肯定提早回到家了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在开始阶段， 在初期； 提前， 提早
detailed_translations.english: before the usual, arranged, or expected time
in the first part of a period of time, event, or process

sentences.english: He earns nearly £20,000 a year.
sentences.chinese: 他每年挣近20,000英镑。

sentences.english: You don’t earn much money being a nurse.
sentences.chinese: 当护士挣钱并不多。

sentences.english: He did all sorts of jobs to earn a living.
sentences.chinese: 他为谋生什么活都干。

sentences.english: I was the only person in the house who was earning.
sentences.chinese: 我是家里唯一上班挣钱的人。

sentences.english: She was earning good money at the bank.
sentences.chinese: 她在银行工作，收入不错。

sentences.english: Chris will pay – he’s earning a fortune.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯会付款的，他在挣大钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 赚，赚得；获得，挣得；使得到；博得
detailed_translations.english: to receive a particular amount of money for the work that you do

sentences.english: She wore a pair of elegant gold earrings.
sentences.chinese: 她戴着一对优雅的金耳环。

sentences.english: The earrings were a perfect match for her necklace.
sentences.chinese: 这对耳环与她项链完美搭配。

sentences.english: He received a set of diamond earrings as a gift.
sentences.chinese: 他收到一份钻石耳环作为礼物。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of jewelry worn in the ear

sentences.english: the planet Earth
sentences.chinese: 地球

detailed_translations.chinese: 地球； 陆地， 地面； 土， 泥
detailed_translations.english: the planet that we live on

sentences.english: An earthquake measuring 6.1 on the Richter scale struck southern California on June 28.
sentences.chinese: 6月28日加州南部地区发生了里氏6.1级地震。

sentences.english: The city is in an earthquake zone.
sentences.chinese: 该市位于地震带。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden shaking of the earth’s surface that often causes a lot of damage

sentences.english: She lived a life of ease.
sentences.chinese: 她过着悠闲自在的生活。

detailed_translations.english: Ease is the state of being very comfortable and able to live as you want, without any worries or problems
if something unpleasant eases, or if you ease it, it gradually improves or becomes less

sentences.english: We drove east along Brooklyn Avenue.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿布鲁克林大街往东行驶。

sentences.english: an east-facing bedroom
sentences.chinese: 朝东的卧室

detailed_translations.english: towards the east
in the east or facing the east
the direction from which the sun rises, and which is on the right if you are facing north

sentences.english: The test was easy.
sentences.chinese: 考试很容易。

sentences.english: Finishing the task will not be easy.
sentences.chinese: 完成这项任务并不容易。

sentences.english: There must be an easier way to do that.
sentences.chinese: 一定有更容易的方法去做那件事。

sentences.english: instructions that are easy to follow
sentences.chinese: 易于掌握的使用说明

sentences.english: It would have been easy for the team to lose the game.
sentences.chinese: 球队本来是很容易会输掉这场比赛的。

sentences.english: Having you here does make things a lot easier for me.
sentences.chinese: 对我来说，有你在这里事情的确好办多了。

sentences.english: The station is within easy reach of (= close to ) the town centre.
sentences.chinese: 车站离市中心不远。

sentences.english: The park is within easy walking distance (= close enough to walk to ).
sentences.chinese: 公园很近，步行便可到达。

detailed_translations.chinese: 容易的， 不费力的； 舒适的， 安逸的； 随和的， 友善的
detailed_translations.english: not difficult to do, and not needing much effort

sentences.english: Felix chatted cheerfully as he ate.
sentences.chinese: 费利克斯一边吃一边兴奋地聊天。

sentences.english: A small girl was eating an ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 一个小女孩在吃冰激凌。

sentences.english: We had plenty to eat and drink.
sentences.chinese: 我们有很多吃的喝的。

sentences.english: It’s important to eat healthily when you are pregnant.
sentences.chinese: 怀孕的时候吃得健康很重要。

sentences.english: I exercise and eat right and get plenty of sleep.
sentences.chinese: 我做运动，饮食得当，睡眠充足。

sentences.english: Would you like something to eat?
sentences.chinese: 想吃点什么吗？

sentences.english: She can eat like a horse and never put on weight.
sentences.chinese: 她可以吃得很多，但体重从来不会增加。

sentences.english: We stopped at McDonalds to get a bite to eat.
sentences.chinese: 我们在麦当劳停下来吃点东西。

sentences.english: Good eating habits are the best way of preventing infection.
sentences.chinese: 良好的饮食习惯是预防感染的最佳方法。

sentences.english: ‘More cake?’ ‘No thanks, I couldn’t eat another thing.’
sentences.chinese: “再来点蛋糕？” “不要了，谢谢。 我再也吃不下了。”

sentences.english: No chicken for me. I don’t eat meat (= I never eat meat ).
sentences.chinese: 我不要鸡肉，我不吃肉的。

sentences.english: Does Rob eat fish?
sentences.chinese: 罗布吃鱼吗？

detailed_translations.english: to put food in your mouth and chew and swallow it

sentences.english: the natural ecology of the Earth
sentences.chinese: 地球的自然生态

sentences.english: plant ecology
sentences.chinese: 植物生态学

detailed_translations.english: the way in which plants, animals, and people are related to each other and to their environment, or the scientific study of this

sentences.english: The council must make economies to meet government spending targets.
sentences.chinese: 市政会必须采取节约措施以达到政府的开支指标。

sentences.english: Not insuring your belongings is a false economy (= it is cheaper but could have bad results ).
sentences.chinese: 不给个人财产投保实际上并不划算。

detailed_translations.chinese: 经济； 节约， 节省
detailed_translations.english: something that you do in order to spend less money

sentences.english: Put the eggs in the centre of the dish, with the vegetables and herbs around the edge.
sentences.chinese: 把鸡蛋放在盘子中间，盘边一圈放些蔬菜和香草。

sentences.english: He stood at the water’s edge staring across the lake.
sentences.chinese: 他站在水边，凝视着湖对面。

sentences.english: A leaf was on the ground, curling up at the edges.
sentences.chinese: 地上有一片叶子，叶边卷曲着。

detailed_translations.chinese: 边， 边缘； 刀口， 刃； 优势， 优越地位
detailed_translations.english: the part of an object that is furthest from its centre

sentences.english: the editor of a book of essays on modern poetry
sentences.chinese: 现代诗歌论文集的编者

detailed_translations.chinese: 编辑， 编者， 校订者
detailed_translations.english: the person who is in charge of a newspaper or magazine, or part of a newspaper or magazine, and decides what should be included in it

sentences.english: The Ormerod School educates handicapped children.
sentences.chinese: 奥默罗德学校的教育对象为残疾儿童。

detailed_translations.chinese: 教育； 培养， 训练
detailed_translations.english: to teach a child at a school, college, or university

sentences.english: the long-term effects of the drug
sentences.chinese: 这种毒品的长期影响

sentences.english: I could feel the effects of the thin mountain air.
sentences.chinese: 我能感觉到山上稀薄空气产生的影响。

sentences.english: This ingredient also has the effect of making your skin look younger.
sentences.chinese: 这种成分还有使皮肤看上去更年轻的效果。

sentences.english: A system failure has a knock-on effect throughout the whole hotel.
sentences.chinese: 系统故障会给整个酒店带来连锁反应。

sentences.english: the cumulative effect of human activities on the global environment
sentences.chinese: 人类活动对全球环境日积月累的影响

sentences.english: A much lower dose of the painkiller can still produce the desired effect.
sentences.chinese: 大量减少该止痛药的服用剂量依然能产生预期的效果。

sentences.english: In mental illness, there is a complex relationship between cause and effect.
sentences.chinese: 精神疾病有复杂的因果关系。

detailed_translations.english: a change that is caused by an event, action etc

sentences.english: a very efficient secretary
sentences.chinese: 效率高的秘书

sentences.english: an efficient use of land
sentences.chinese: 土地的有效使用

sentences.english: Lighting is now more energy efficient.
sentences.chinese: 如今的照明设备更加节能。

detailed_translations.chinese: 效率高的； 有能力的
detailed_translations.english: if someone or something is efficient, they work well without wasting time, money, or energy

sentences.english: Lou lifted the box easily, without using much effort.
sentences.chinese: 卢没费多大力气就把箱子搬了起来。

sentences.english: Frank put a lot of effort into the party.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克办这次聚会花了不少精力。

sentences.english: Learning to speak another language takes effort.
sentences.chinese: 学说外语要下功夫。

detailed_translations.chinese: 努力， 尝试； 努力的成果， 成就
detailed_translations.english: the physical or mental energy that is needed to do something

sentences.english: Blackbirds lay their eggs in March.
sentences.chinese: 乌鸫在3月产蛋。

sentences.english: an ostrich egg
sentences.chinese: 鸵鸟蛋

sentences.english: The eggs hatch (= break open to allow the baby out ) in 26 days.
sentences.chinese: 这些蛋要26天才能孵化。

detailed_translations.english: a round object with a hard surface, that contains a baby bird, snake, insect etc and which is produced by a female bird, snake, insect etc

sentences.english: E-hailing services have revolutionized the way people commute in many cities.
sentences.chinese: 网约车服务已经彻底改变了许多城市的通勤方式。

sentences.english: Many drivers rely on E-hailing apps to find their next ride.
sentences.chinese: 许多司机依赖网约车应用程序来寻找下一份工作。

detailed_translations.chinese: 网约车； 滴滴出行； 共享出行
detailed_translations.english: a service where people can request taxi-like rides through a mobile app

sentences.english: I haven’t seen the movie and my brother hasn’t either (= he also has not seen it ).
sentences.chinese: 我没看过这部电影，我弟弟也没看过。

sentences.english: ‘I can’t swim.’ ‘I can’t either.’
sentences.chinese: “我不会游泳。”“我也不会。

sentences.english: It’s not an easy car to drive, and at $40,000 it’s not cheap either.
sentences.chinese: 这车不容易开，而且要价4万美元，也不便宜。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that a negative statement is also true about another thing or person, or to add a different negative statement about something or someone

sentences.english: Sarah is the elder of the two.
sentences.chinese: 两人当中萨拉年纪较长。

detailed_translations.english: the elder of two people, especially brothers and sisters, is the one who was born first

sentences.english: the country’s first democratically elected government
sentences.chinese: 该国第一个民主选举产生的政府

sentences.english: a new method for electing the leader of the party
sentences.chinese: 选举党领导的新方式

detailed_translations.chinese: 选举， 推选； 选择
detailed_translations.english: to choose someone for an official position by voting

sentences.english: The farm was very isolated, but it had electricity.
sentences.chinese: 那个农场非常偏远，但有电力供应。

detailed_translations.english: the power that is carried by wires, cables etc, and is used to provide light or heat, to make machines work etc

sentences.english: electronic games
sentences.chinese: 电子游戏

sentences.english: an electronic organizer (= a small piece of electronic equipment that you can use to record addresses, phone numbers etc )
sentences.chinese: 电子记事本

detailed_translations.english: electronic equipment, such as computers and televisions, uses electricity that has passed through computer chips, transistors etc

sentences.english: a tall, elegant young woman
sentences.chinese: 身材高挑、举止优雅的年轻女子

sentences.english: You can dine in elegant surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在雅致的环境中进餐。

detailed_translations.chinese: 优美的， 文雅的， 讲究的； 简练的， 简洁的
detailed_translations.english: beautiful, attractive, or graceful

sentences.english: Business and management elements are built into the course.
sentences.chinese: 本课程加入了商务和管理方面的内容。

detailed_translations.chinese: 成分， 要素， 元素； 基础， 纲要； 自然力
detailed_translations.english: one part or feature of a whole system, plan, piece of work etc, especially one that is basic or important

sentences.english: Once I saw an elephant go by.
sentences.chinese: 一次我看见一头大象路过。

sentences.english: What is your elephant? How do you deal with it?
sentences.chinese: 你的大象是什么？你会怎么处理它？

sentences.english: Once I addressed the elephant, we were able to kick him out of the room.
sentences.chinese: 当我承认了这头大象的存在，我们就能够把它从房间里面赶走。

detailed_translations.english: a very large grey animal with four legs, two tusks(= long curved teeth ) and a trunk(= long nose ) that it can use to pick things up

sentences.english: She was sent to jail for eleven months.
sentences.chinese: 她被判入狱11个月。

sentences.english: I never go to bed before eleven (= 11 o’clock ).
sentences.chinese: 我从不在11点钟以前上床睡觉。

sentences.english: James had worked every summer since he was eleven (= 11 years old ).
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯自11岁起每年夏天都打工。

detailed_translations.english: the number

sentences.english: Our team was eliminated in the first round.
sentences.chinese: 我们队第一轮就被淘汰了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 消灭， 消除， 排除； 淘汰
detailed_translations.english: to completely get rid of something that is unnecessary or unwanted

sentences.english: There’s something else I’d like to talk about as well.
sentences.chinese: 我还有其他事情要谈一谈。

sentences.english: I’d like you to come, and anyone else who’s free.
sentences.chinese: 我想请你过来，其他人有空也可以来。

sentences.english: He was awake now, as was everyone else.
sentences.chinese: 他现在已经醒了，其他人也都醒了。

sentences.english: Who else was at the party?
sentences.chinese: 还有谁参加了聚会？

sentences.english: ‘Two coffees, please.’ ‘Anything else?’ ‘No, thanks.’
sentences.chinese: “请来两杯咖啡。”“还要别的吗？”“不要了，谢谢。

sentences.english: (= more than any other things ) she was seeking love.
sentences.chinese: 她追求爱情胜过一切。

detailed_translations.english: besides or in addition to someone or something

sentences.english: She is becoming famous in Australia and elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 她在澳大利亚和其他地方渐渐出名了。

sentences.english: Kerala has less crime and alcoholism than elsewhere in India.
sentences.chinese: 喀拉拉邦的犯罪和酗酒现象少于印度的其他地区。

detailed_translations.english: in, at, or to another place

sentences.english: I received your email this morning.
sentences.chinese: 我今天早上收到了你的电子邮件。

sentences.english: Please send the report via email.
sentences.chinese: 请通过电子邮件发送报告。

sentences.english: She forgot to attach the file to her email.
sentences.chinese: 她忘了在电子邮件中附加文件。

detailed_translations.chinese: 电子邮件；电子邮件信息
detailed_translations.english: a message sent from one computer to another using the internet

sentences.english: Lori gets embarrassed if we ask her to sing.
sentences.chinese: 我们要是请洛丽唱歌，她就会难为情。

sentences.english: He looked embarrassed when I asked him where he’d been.
sentences.chinese: 我问他去了哪里，他显得很窘迫。

detailed_translations.chinese: 尴尬的， 为难的； 陷入困境的， 窘迫的
detailed_translations.english: feeling uncomfortable or nervous and worrying about what people think of you, for example because you have made a silly mistake, or because you have to talk or sing in public

sentences.english: ...a young couple locked in an embrace.
sentences.chinese: …紧紧相拥的年轻一对。

detailed_translations.english: the act of holding someone close to you, especially as a sign of love

detailed_translations.chinese: 拥抱； 包括； 包围
detailed_translations.english: to put your arms around someone and hold them in a friendly or loving way

sentences.english: The flowers emerge in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 花儿在春天开放。

detailed_translations.chinese: 出现， 涌现， 冒出
detailed_translations.english: to appear or come out from somewhere

sentences.english: Lifeguards are trained to deal with emergencies.
sentences.chinese: 救生员接受过应对紧急情况的训练。

sentences.english: (= In case of emergency ), press the alarm button.
sentences.chinese: 遇到紧急情况，请按报警按钮。

sentences.english: The plane had to make an emergency landing.
sentences.chinese: 那架飞机不得不紧急着陆。

sentences.english: The government called an emergency meeting to discuss the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 政府召开了紧急会议，讨论这次危机。

detailed_translations.chinese: 紧急情况， 突然事件
detailed_translations.english: an unexpected and dangerous situation that must be dealt with immediately

sentences.english: Her voice was full of emotion.
sentences.chinese: 她的声音充满了激情。

sentences.english: She was good at hiding her emotions.

sentences.chinese: 他终于逃脱并返回英格兰。

sentences.chinese: 似乎从来没有什么事情会使他烦恼。

to burst, or to make something burst, into small pieces, usually with a loud noise and in a way that causes damage

sentences.english: The device was thrown at an army patrol but failed to explode.
sentences.chinese: 炸弹投向了陆军巡逻队，但没有爆炸。

detailed_translations.english: to burst, or to make something burst, into small pieces, usually with a loud noise and in a way that causes damage
to burst, or to make something burst, into small pieces, usually with a loud noise and in a way that causes damage

sentences.chinese: 小孩子有时不能区分幻想与现实。

sentences.chinese: 他为格拉夫顿六户人家修剪草坪和花园，他们中一些是父母的朋友，此外他还是个积极的义务消防员。

sentences.chinese: 大多数医生建议睡硬床垫。
