sentences.chinese: 学校的体育馆配备了现代化的健身设备。

detailed_translations.english: a place equipped for sports or physical exercise

detailed_translations.chinese: 体育馆；学校里的体育教学
detailed_translations.english: a large room or building equipped for sports or physical training

sentences.english: a gymnastics display
sentences.chinese: 体操表演

sentences.english: We don’t do gymnastics at school.
sentences.chinese: 我们学校没有体操训练。

detailed_translations.english: a sport involving physical exercises and movements that need skill, strength, and control, and that are often performed in competitions

sentences.english: Regular exercise is a good habit.
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼是个好习惯。

sentences.english: Thinking negatively can become a habit.
sentences.chinese: 消极的思维方式会成为一种习惯。

sentences.english: She has a habit of playing with her hair when she’s nervous.
sentences.chinese: 她有一个习惯，一紧张就拨弄自己的头发。

sentences.english: Some people drink alcohol as much from habit as from desire.
sentences.chinese: 有些人喝酒既是因为想喝，也是出于习惯。

detailed_translations.english: something that you do regularly or usually, often without thinking about it because you have done it so many times before

sentences.english: The rainforest is a crucial habitat for many species.
sentences.chinese: 热带雨林是许多物种的重要栖息地。

sentences.english: Habitat loss is a major threat to biodiversity.
sentences.chinese: 栖息地丧失是对生物多样性的主要威胁。

detailed_translations.english: the natural environment in which an animal or plant lives

sentences.english: Her hair was short and dark.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发又短又黑。

sentences.english: a short fat man with no hair on his head
sentences.chinese: 光头的矮胖男人

detailed_translations.english: the mass of things like fine threads that grows on your head

detailed_translations.chinese: 生长毛发；形成毛状纤维
毛发的；护理毛发的；用毛发制成的

sentences.english: She went to the hairdresser to get a new haircut.
sentences.chinese: 她去理发师那里做了个新发型。

sentences.english: The hairdresser carefully trimmed her bangs.
sentences.chinese: 理发师仔细地修剪了她的刘海。

sentences.english: I need to find a good hairdresser for my wedding hair.
sentences.chinese: 我需要为我的婚礼找一位好的发型师。

detailed_translations.english: a person whose job is to cut and style people's hair

sentences.english: She reached for the hairdryer to dry her wet hair.
sentences.chinese: 她伸手拿起了吹风机来吹干她的湿发。

sentences.english: Make sure to unplug the hairdryer after use.
sentences.chinese: 使用后一定要拔掉吹风机的插头。

sentences.english: He used the hairdryer to style his hair before the party.
sentences.chinese: 他在参加派对前用吹风机打理了一下他的头发。

detailed_translations.english: a device used to dry wet hair by blowing warm or hot air onto it

sentences.english: He’s half English, half Swiss.
sentences.chinese: 他有一半英格兰血统，一半瑞士血统。

sentences.english: ...a half measure of fresh lemon juice.
sentences.chinese: …半量杯的新鲜柠檬汁。

detailed_translations.english: if something is half one thing and half something else, it is a combination of those two things
Half is also an adjective
exactly or about 50% (1/2) of an amount, time, distance, number etc

sentences.english: He was halfway up the ladder.
sentences.chinese: 他梯子上到了一半。

detailed_translations.chinese: 半路地； 在中途， 在半途
detailed_translations.english: Halfway means in the middle of a place or between two points, at an equal distance from each of them

detailed_translations.chinese: 中途的；部分的；不彻底的
detailed_translations.english: at a middle point in space or time between two things

sentences.english: a concert at Carnegie Hall
sentences.chinese: 卡内基音乐厅的一场音乐会

detailed_translations.chinese: 门厅； 礼堂， 会堂； 办公大楼
detailed_translations.english: a building or large room for public events such as meetings or dances

sentences.english: a ham sandwich
sentences.chinese: 火腿三明治

sentences.english: a seven-pound ham
sentences.chinese: 七磅重的火腿

detailed_translations.english: the upper part of a pig’s leg, or the meat from this that has been preserved with salt or smoke

sentences.english: A hamburger and a coke.
sentences.chinese: 一个汉堡和一杯可乐。

sentences.english: Then have a hamburger.
sentences.chinese: 那么吃一个汉堡吧。

sentences.english: I order a soda and a hamburger for myself. Then another person gets coffee for me.
sentences.chinese: 嗯， 我为自己点了一杯苏打和一个汉堡包， 然后另外一人给我拿了杯咖啡。

detailed_translations.english: a flat round piece of finely cut beef(= meat from a cow ) which is cooked and eaten in a bread bun

sentences.english: the sound of hammering and sawing
sentences.chinese: 锤打和拉锯的声音

detailed_translations.english: to hit something with a hammer in order to force it into a particular position or shape
the part of a gun that hits the explosive charge that fires a bullet

sentences.english: To communicate with her, you have to spell words out on her hand.
sentences.chinese: 跟她交流，你必须把字一个个地在她手心里拼写出来。

detailed_translations.english: to give something to someone else with your hand

detailed_translations.chinese: 手；指针；帮助，援助；手艺，技能
detailed_translations.english: the part of your body at the end of your arm, including your fingers and thumb, that you use to hold things

sentences.english: Rice: No, I only have a handbag.
sentences.chinese: 没有，我只有一个手提包。

sentences.english: He grabbed at her handbag .
sentences.chinese: 他抢夺了她的手提包。

sentences.english: Is this my (your) handbag?
sentences.chinese: 这是我的手提包吗？

detailed_translations.english: a small bag in which a woman carries money and personal things

sentences.english: Before sweeping the house she bound up her hair in a large handkerchief.
sentences.chinese: 打扫房屋前， 她把头发用一块大手帕扎起来。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of cloth that you use for drying your nose or eyes

sentences.english: Then he turned the handle and went in.
sentences.chinese: 然后他转动把手走了进去。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a door that you use for opening it

detailed_translations.chinese: 拿， 触； 操作， 处理
detailed_translations.english: to do the things that are necessary to complete a job

sentences.english: These handmade ceramics are unique and beautifully crafted.
sentences.chinese: 这些手工陶瓷独特且制作精美。

sentences.english: She received a handmade birthday card from her grandmother.
sentences.chinese: 她从祖母那里收到了一张手工制作的生日卡片。

sentences.english: The museum showcases handmade artifacts from different cultures.
sentences.chinese: 这家博物馆展示了来自不同文化的手工制品。

detailed_translations.english: made by hand rather than machine

sentences.english: He managed to make a handsome profit out of the deal.
sentences.chinese: 他从这笔买卖中赚取了丰厚的利润。

sentences.english: a handsome fee
sentences.chinese: 一大笔费用

detailed_translations.chinese: 漂亮的， 英俊的； 端庄健美的， 好看的； 慷慨的， 可观的
detailed_translations.english: a handsome amount of money is large

sentences.english: I recognised her handwriting on the envelope.
sentences.chinese: 我认出了信封上她的笔迹。

sentences.english: My handwriting has never been very neat.
sentences.chinese: 我的字从来都写得不够工整。

detailed_translations.chinese: 笔迹， 手迹； 书法
detailed_translations.english: the style of someone’s writing

sentences.english: Philip hung his coat on a hook behind the door.
sentences.chinese: 菲利普把自己的大衣挂在门后的钩子上。

sentences.english: She hung the sheets on the washing line.
sentences.chinese: 她把床单晾在晒衣绳上。

detailed_translations.chinese: [hung-hung] 悬挂， 吊； 徘徊； [hanged-hanged] 吊
detailed_translations.english: to put something in a position so that the top part is fixed or supported, and the bottom part is free to move and does not touch the ground

sentences.english: When did the accident happen?
sentences.chinese: 事故什么时候发生的？

sentences.english: It’s impossible to predict what will happen next.
sentences.chinese: 不可能预测接下来会发生什么。

sentences.english: She carried on as if nothing had happened.
sentences.chinese: 她继续干，似乎什么都未曾发生。

sentences.english: This was bound to happen sooner or later.
sentences.chinese: 这事注定早晚会发生。

sentences.english: This kind of thing happens all the time.
sentences.chinese: 这种事一直在发生。

sentences.english: We’ll still be friends, whatever happens.
sentences.chinese: 不管发生什么，我们仍然是朋友。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发生； 碰巧， 恰好
detailed_translations.english: when something happens, there is an event, especially one that is not planned

sentences.english: It’s a lovely house and we’ve been very happy here.
sentences.chinese: 房子很漂亮，我们住在这里非常开心。

sentences.english: I’ve never felt happier in my life.
sentences.chinese: 我一生从未感到如此快乐。

sentences.english: He was a happy child who rarely cried.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个快乐的孩子，很少哭鼻子。

sentences.english: the happy faces of the children
sentences.chinese: 孩子们快乐的表情

sentences.english: I loved her and thought I could make her happy.
sentences.chinese: 我爱她，我想我能让她幸福快乐。

detailed_translations.chinese: 快乐的， 愉快的； 幸福的； 令人满意的
detailed_translations.english: having feelings of pleasure, for example because something good has happened to you or you are very satisfied with your life

sentences.english: a hard wooden chair
sentences.chinese: 一把硬木椅

sentences.english: the hardest substance known to man
sentences.chinese: 已知的最硬物质

sentences.english: After months without rain, the ground was too hard to plough.
sentences.chinese: 数月无雨，土地坚硬难犁。

detailed_translations.chinese: 坚硬的， 坚固的； 困难的， 艰苦的； 勤勉的， 刻苦
detailed_translations.english: firm, stiff, and difficult to press down, break, or cut

sentences.english: The building work has hardly begun.
sentences.chinese: 施工才刚刚开始。

detailed_translations.chinese: 几乎不， 简直不； 刚刚， 仅仅
detailed_translations.english: used to say that something has only just happened

sentences.english: ...a shop from which an uncle had sold hardware and timber.
sentences.chinese: …一家叔叔曾经在那里卖五金器具和木材的店铺。

detailed_translations.english: computer machinery and equipment, as opposed to the programs that make computers work

sentences.english: The scandal did his career a lot of harm.
sentences.chinese: 丑闻对他的职业生涯造成很大损害。

sentences.english: Our children deserve protection from harm.
sentences.chinese: 我们的儿童理应得到保护免受伤害。

detailed_translations.english: damage, injury, or trouble caused by someone’s actions or by an event

sentences.english: the gorgeous vocal harmonies on ‘Mexicali Rose’
sentences.chinese: 《墨西哥玫瑰》的精彩和声演唱

sentences.english: three-part harmonies
sentences.chinese: 三部和声

detailed_translations.chinese: 调和， 协调， 和谐
detailed_translations.english: notes of music combined together in a pleasant way

sentences.english: The company is now reaping the harvest of careful planning.
sentences.chinese: 公司现在尝到了精心规划带来的甜头。

detailed_translations.english: the time when crops are gathered from the fields, or the act of gathering them
to gather crops from the fields

sentences.english: Maria was wearing a beautiful new hat.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚戴着一顶漂亮的新帽子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that you wear on your head

sentences.english: The eggs take three days to hatch.
sentences.chinese: 这些蛋要三天时间才能孵化。

detailed_translations.english: if an egg hatches, or if it is hatched, it breaks, letting the young bird, insect etc come out

detailed_translations.chinese: 舱门； 开口； 孵化
detailed_translations.english: a hole in a ship or aircraft, usually used for loading goods, or the door that covers it

sentences.english: It’s the kind of movie you either love or hate.
sentences.chinese: 这是那种你要么喜欢要么讨厌的电影。

sentences.english: He hates his job.
sentences.chinese: 他讨厌自己的工作。

detailed_translations.english: to dislike something very much
an angry unpleasant feeling that someone has when they hate someone and want to harm them

sentences.english: She has a car.
sentences.chinese: 她有一辆车。

sentences.english: We have a lot of work to do.
sentences.chinese: 我们有很多工作要做。

sentences.english: He has read that book.
sentences.chinese: 他读过那本书。

detailed_translations.english: used to form the present perfect tense
to possess or own something

sentences.english: ‘Where’s Paul?’ ‘He’s gone to the cinema.’
sentences.chinese: “保罗在哪儿？”“他去看电影了。”

sentences.english: It was he who first suggested the idea.
sentences.chinese: 是他先提出这个想法的。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a man, boy, or male animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about

sentences.english: He kissed the top of her head.
sentences.chinese: 他吻了一下她的头顶。

sentences.english: Alan fell asleep as soon as he put his head on the pillow.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦头一挨枕头就睡着了。

sentences.english: They dived head first into the water.
sentences.chinese: 他们一头跳进水中。

sentences.english: She was dressed in black from head to foot (= over all her body ).
sentences.chinese: 她从头到脚穿了一身黑。

sentences.english: He still has a full head of hair (= has all his hair, even though he is getting rather old ).
sentences.chinese: 他依然满头浓发。

detailed_translations.chinese: 头， 头部； 顶部， 前端； 领导， 首脑； 头数； 头脑， 智力
detailed_translations.english: the top part of your body that has your face at the front and is supported by your neck

sentences.english: If you have a headache, you should take some aspirin.
sentences.chinese: 要是头痛，你该吃点阿司匹林。

detailed_translations.chinese: 头痛； 令人头痛的人
detailed_translations.english: a pain in your head

sentences.english: a paper carrying the front-page headline: ‘Space Aliens meet with President’
sentences.chinese: 头版报道题为“天外来客会见总统”的报纸

detailed_translations.chinese: 大字标题； 新闻提要
detailed_translations.english: the title of a newspaper report, which is printed in large letters above the report

sentences.english: This headmaster is very modest.
sentences.chinese: 这位校长很谦虚。

sentences.english: Our headmaster rattled on for at least two hours at the opening ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 我们的校长在开学典礼上唠唠叨叨地讲了至少两个小时。

detailed_translations.english: a male teacher who is in charge of a school

sentences.english: He put on his headphones to listen to the music without disturbing others.
sentences.chinese: 他戴上耳机，以便在不打扰他人的情况下听音乐。

sentences.english: The concert tickets include a pair of headphones for each attendee.
sentences.chinese: 音乐会门票为每位与会者包含一副耳机。

sentences.english: Make sure the headphones are securely plugged in before you start the call.
sentences.chinese: 在开始通话前，确保耳机已牢固插入。

detailed_translations.english: Audio devices worn on or around the head to listen to audio signals.

sentences.english: I know a number of parents have rung the headteacher about what has happened but I would appeal for everyone to be calm, particularly in relation to those people involved.
sentences.chinese: 我知道一些家长正围着校长问事情发生的经过，但我呼吁大家要保持冷静，特别是在那些跟这件事有直接关系的人。

sentences.english: I’m worried about my husband’s health.
sentences.chinese: 我担心我丈夫的健康状况。

detailed_translations.chinese: 健康； 卫生， 保健
detailed_translations.english: the general condition of your body and how healthy you are

sentences.english: Blanche heard a crash as the back door was flung open.
sentences.chinese: 布兰奇听见后门哗啦一声被推开。

sentences.english: Did anyone see or hear anything last night?
sentences.chinese: 昨晚有没有人看见或听见什么？

sentences.english: Old Zeke doesn’t hear too well any more.
sentences.chinese: 老齐克的耳朵已不灵了。

detailed_translations.chinese: [heard-heard] 听见； 听到， 得知； 审讯， 听证； 收到…的信
detailed_translations.english: to know that a sound is being made, using your ears

sentences.english: Regular exercise is good for the heart.
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼对心脏有好处。

sentences.english: Can you hear my heart beating?
sentences.chinese: 你能听见我的心跳吗？

sentences.english: Her cheeks were hot and her heart was pounding.
sentences.chinese: 她脸颊发烫，心怦怦直跳。

sentences.english: My heart raced. Were we going to land safely?
sentences.chinese: 我心跳得厉害。我们能安全着陆吗？

sentences.english: Daniel had no history of heart problems.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼尔没有心脏病史。

sentences.english: She suffers from a rare heart condition.
sentences.chinese: 她患有罕见的心脏病。

sentences.english: His breathing and heart rate were now normal.
sentences.chinese: 他的呼吸和心率现在都正常了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 心， 心脏； 内心， 感情； 勇气， 热忱； 中心， 要点
detailed_translations.english: the organ in your chest which pumps blood through your body

sentences.english: Heat the milk until it boils.
sentences.chinese: 把牛奶煮开。

detailed_translations.english: to make something become warm or hot

detailed_translations.chinese: 热，炎热；体温，热度；激动；激烈
detailed_translations.english: warmth or the quality of being hot

sentences.english: The wardrobe was too heavy for me to move on my own.
sentences.chinese: 衣橱太重，我一个人移不动。

sentences.english: a heavy suitcase
sentences.chinese: 沉重的手提箱

sentences.english: The males are seven times heavier than the females.
sentences.chinese: 雄性的重量是雌性的七倍。

sentences.english: How heavy is the parcel (= how much does it weigh? ) ?
sentences.chinese: 这个包裹有多重？

detailed_translations.chinese: 重的， 重型的； 大量的， 密集的； 严重的， 严厉的； 剧烈的， 繁重的； 沉重
detailed_translations.english: weighing a lot

sentences.english: Sam’s about the same height as his sister now.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆现在身高和他姐姐差不多了。

sentences.english: State your age, height, and weight.
sentences.chinese: 说出你的年龄、身高和体重。

sentences.english: buildings of different heights
sentences.chinese: 高矮不一的建筑

detailed_translations.chinese: 高， 高度； 高处， 高地； 顶点
detailed_translations.english: how tall someone or something is

sentences.english: War is hell.
sentences.chinese: 战争是人间地狱。

detailed_translations.english: the place where the souls of bad people are believed to be punished after death, especially in the Christian and Muslim religions

sentences.english: Hello, John! How are you?
sentences.chinese: 喂，约翰！你好吗？

sentences.english: Stanley, come and say hello to your nephew.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦利，过来和你的侄子打声招呼。

sentences.english: Well, hello there ! I haven’t seen you for ages.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，你好！好久不见了。

detailed_translations.english: used as a greeting when you see or meet someone

sentences.english: If there’s anything I can do to help, just give me a call.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要我帮忙，就给我打个电话。

detailed_translations.english: to make it possible or easier for someone to do something by doing part of their work or by giving them something they need

detailed_translations.chinese: 帮助， 援助； 帮手， 佣人； 救命
detailed_translations.english: things you do to make it easier or possible for someone to do something

sentences.english: She does not like the hen that pecks all day.
sentences.chinese: 她不喜欢这个整天啄来啄去的母鸡。

sentences.english: A little red hen once found a grain of wheat.
sentences.chinese: 一次，一只红色的小母鸡找到了一粒小麦。

sentences.english: What Jones and her colleagues wanted to learn is whether a happy hen in fact produces a better product.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯和她的同事们希望弄明白，是否一只幸福的母鸡确实产出更好的产品。

detailed_translations.english: an adult female chicken

sentences.english: The cost of transport is a major expense for an industry. Hence factory location is an important consideration.
sentences.chinese: 运输成本是企业的一大支出，因此工厂选址是重要的考虑因素。

detailed_translations.chinese: 因此， 所以； 今后
detailed_translations.english: for this reason

sentences.english: Jane? I don’t really know her.
sentences.chinese: 简？我不太认识她。

sentences.english: Margaret wants me to go with her.
sentences.chinese: 玛格丽特想让我和她一起去。

sentences.english: Give her the keys.
sentences.chinese: 把钥匙给她。

sentences.english: I think it was her, but I’m not sure.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得是她，但不肯定。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about

sentences.english: Sprinkle the dish with chopped fresh herbs.
sentences.chinese: 在菜肴上撒些切碎的新鲜香草。

detailed_translations.chinese: 药草， 香草； 草本植物
detailed_translations.english: a small plant that is used to improve the taste of food, or to make medicine

sentences.english: What are you doing here?
sentences.chinese: 你们在这里干什么？

sentences.english: Shall we eat here?
sentences.chinese: 我们在这里吃好吗？

sentences.english: Come here for a minute.
sentences.chinese: 到这里来一下。

sentences.english: This switch here controls the lights.
sentences.chinese: 此处的这个开关控制电灯。

sentences.english: My friend here will show you the way.
sentences.chinese: 我这位朋友会给你指路的。

sentences.english: Come on. I’m over here .
sentences.chinese: 快点，我在这里。

sentences.english: Will you be back here tonight?
sentences.chinese: 今晚你回这里吗？

sentences.english: There are no good pubs round here .
sentences.chinese: 这一带没有好的酒吧。

sentences.english: Let’s settle the matter here and now .
sentences.chinese: 我们现在就解决此事吧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在这里，到这里；在这一点上
detailed_translations.english: in this place

sentences.english: He had dared to speak out against injustice, and overnight he became a national hero .
sentences.chinese: 他敢于站出来抨击不公正的现象，一夜之间就成了国家英雄。

sentences.english: His father was a war hero , a former fighter pilot.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲是一位战争英雄，曾经是战斗机飞行员。

sentences.english: the unsung heroes who drove convoys of aid to Bosnia
sentences.chinese: 运载援助物品到波斯尼亚的那些无名英雄

sentences.english: A man hailed as a hero for 50 years has been unmasked as a traitor.
sentences.chinese: 50年来一直被誉为英雄的人被揭发为叛徒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 英雄， 勇士； 男主角， 男主人公
detailed_translations.english: a man who is admired for doing something extremely brave

sentences.english: He bent and touched his mouth to hers.
sentences.chinese: 他俯身吻她的嘴唇。

sentences.english: These are my gloves. Hers are in the drawer.
sentences.chinese: 这是我的手套，她的在抽屉里。

sentences.english: The idea was hers.
sentences.chinese: 这个主意是她出的。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to something that belongs to or is connected with a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned

sentences.english: She cut herself on some broken glass.
sentences.chinese: 碎玻璃把她割伤了。

sentences.english: She made herself a cup of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 她给自己煮了杯咖啡。

detailed_translations.chinese: 她自己(she的反身代词)；她亲自
detailed_translations.english: used to show that the woman or girl who does something is affected by her own action

sentences.english: Some parents hesitate to take these steps because they suspect that their child is exaggerating.
sentences.chinese: 一些家长迟迟不肯采取这些措施，因为他们怀疑自己的孩子在夸大其词。

detailed_translations.chinese: 犹豫， 踌躇； 含糊； 不情愿

sentences.english: Hi! How are you?
sentences.chinese: 嗨！你好吗？

sentences.english: Hi there! I haven’t seen you for ages.
sentences.chinese: 嘿！好久不见。

detailed_translations.chinese: 嗨！(表示问候或用以唤起注意)
detailed_translations.english: hello

sentences.english: She keeps a bottle of gin hidden behind a stack of books.
sentences.chinese: 她在一堆书的后面藏了一瓶杜松子酒。

detailed_translations.english: to deliberately put or keep something or someone in a place where they cannot easily be seen or found

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔可观察鸟兽行动的〕隐匿处，埋伏处
detailed_translations.english: a place from which you can watch animals or birds without being seen by them

sentences.english: This is the highest mountain in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 这是日本最高的山。

sentences.english: The camp was surrounded by a high fence.
sentences.chinese: 营地四周围着高高的栅栏。

sentences.english: a ten-foot high statue
sentences.chinese: 10英尺高的雕像

sentences.english: How high is the Eiffel Tower?
sentences.chinese: 埃菲尔铁塔有多高？

detailed_translations.chinese: 高的， 高度的； 高级的， 重要的； 高兴的， 愉快的； 正盛
detailed_translations.english: measuring a long distance from the bottom to the top

sentences.english: Your résumé should highlight your skills and achievements.
sentences.chinese: 你的简历应该突出自己的技能和成绩。

detailed_translations.english: to make a problem or subject easy to notice so that people pay attention to it

detailed_translations.chinese: 最精彩的部分； 最重要的事件
detailed_translations.english: the most important, interesting, or enjoyable part of something such as a holiday, performance, or sports competition

sentences.english: The company specializes in high-tech manufacturing.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司专门从事高科技制造。

sentences.english: High-tech industries are rapidly growing in this region.
sentences.chinese: 高科技产业在这个地区迅速发展。

sentences.english: She works for a high-tech startup.
sentences.chinese: 她在一家高科技初创公司工作。

detailed_translations.english: using the most advanced technology

sentences.english: Interstate Highway 75
sentences.chinese: 75号州际公路

detailed_translations.english: a wide main road that joins one town to another

sentences.english: He wants to hike round the world.
sentences.chinese: 他打算徒步旅行环游世界一周。

sentences.english: You can organize a picnic in the park, a group hike or bike ride, or meet up with friends for one of those free local events.
sentences.chinese: 你可以组织在公园野餐一群徒步旅行或者骑自行车或者和朋友会面为其中的一个免费本地事件。

detailed_translations.english: to take a long walk in the mountains or countryside
a long walk in the mountains or countryside
to increase a price, tax etc by a large amount

sentences.english: Their house is on a hill overlooking the sea.
sentences.chinese: 他们的房子建在可以俯视大海的小山上。

sentences.english: A cart was making its way up the hill.
sentences.chinese: 一辆马车正在爬上山丘。

detailed_translations.chinese: 小山， 山冈； 斜坡
detailed_translations.english: an area of land that is higher than the land around it, like a mountain but smaller

sentences.english: Are you in love with him?
sentences.chinese: 你爱上他了吗？

sentences.english: Why don’t you ask him yourself?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么不自己问他？

sentences.english: He repeated what she had told him.
sentences.chinese: 他把她告诉他的话重复了一遍。

sentences.english: I knew it was him as soon as I heard his voice.
sentences.chinese: 我一听声音就知道是他。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a man, boy, or male animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about

sentences.english: He hurt himself while playing basketball.
sentences.chinese: 他在打篮球时伤到了自己。

sentences.english: He always tries to do things himself to ensure quality.
sentences.chinese: 他总是尽量亲自做事以确保质量。

sentences.english: The chef prepared the meal himself.
sentences.chinese: 厨师亲自准备了这顿饭。

detailed_translations.chinese: 他自己； 他亲自， 他本人

sentences.english: Hip-hop culture includes elements such as DJing, MCing, rapping, and breakdancing.
sentences.chinese: 嘻哈文化包括诸如DJing、MCing、说唱和霹雳舞等元素。

sentences.english: She was inspired by the rhythmic beats of hip-hop music.
sentences.chinese: 她被嘻哈音乐的节奏所启发。

sentences.english: Hip-hop fashion is known for its bold colors and unique styles.
sentences.chinese: 嘻哈时尚以其大胆的颜色和独特的风格而闻名。

detailed_translations.chinese: 嘻哈文化； 嘻哈音乐； 嘻哈艺术
detailed_translations.english: a cultural movement that originated in African American and Latinx communities in the 1970s, involving music, dance, art, and fashion

sentences.english: The best way to explore the island is to hire a car.
sentences.chinese: 在该岛寻幽访胜的最好方式就是租用一辆汽车。

sentences.english: What does it cost to hire a boat for a week?
sentences.chinese: 一艘小船租用一星期的费用是多少？

detailed_translations.english: to pay money to borrow something for a short period of time

sentences.english: That should be his mother.
sentences.chinese: 那大概是他的母亲。

sentences.english: You have his card?
sentences.chinese: 你有他的名片吧？

sentences.english: I like his car.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢他的小汽车。

sentences.english: Throughout history the achievements of women have been largely ignored.
sentences.chinese: 从古至今，妇女的成就都被大大地忽视了。

sentences.english: No man in recent history has done more to rebuild the Democratic Party.
sentences.chinese: 他对重建民主党的贡献在近代史上无人能及。

sentences.english: the early history of Scotland
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰的早期历史

sentences.english: Other meteor storms have occurred in recorded history .
sentences.chinese: 在有记载的历史上发生过其他的流星暴。

sentences.english: a museum devoted to local history
sentences.chinese: 专门介绍当地历史的博物馆

sentences.english: one of the darkest episodes in American history
sentences.chinese: 美国历史上最黑暗的事件之一

sentences.english: an interesting period in Egyptian history
sentences.chinese: 埃及历史上一段有趣的时期

sentences.english: a decision that changed the course of history
sentences.chinese: 改变历史进程的决定

sentences.english: a college steeped in history
sentences.chinese: 一所历史悠久的学院

sentences.english: History shows that the usual response to violent protest is repression.
sentences.chinese: 历史表明，一般对待暴力抗议的回应就是镇压。

detailed_translations.chinese: 历史，历史学；历史记录；来历
detailed_translations.english: all the things that happened in the past, especially the political, social, or economic development of a nation

sentences.english: He raised the hammer and hit the bell.
sentences.chinese: 他举起钟锤敲钟。

detailed_translations.chinese: [hit-hit; hitting] 打， 击中； 碰撞
detailed_translations.english: to touch someone or something quickly and hard with your hand, a stick etc

sentences.english: What are your hobbies?
sentences.chinese: 你有些什么爱好？

sentences.english: Susan’s hobbies include reading, cooking, and drama.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊的业余爱好包括阅读、烹饪和戏剧。

sentences.english: Retirement gave him the time to pursue his hobbies.
sentences.chinese: 退休以后他有充裕的时间来做自己喜欢做的事。

detailed_translations.english: an activity that you enjoy doing in your free time

sentences.english: I play hockey with my friends every Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 我每个周六和朋友们打冰球。

sentences.english: The hockey team won the championship last year.
sentences.chinese: 这支冰球队去年赢得了冠军。

sentences.english: Hockey is a popular sport in Canada.
sentences.chinese: 冰球在加拿大是一项流行的运动。

detailed_translations.english: a game played on ice between two teams using curved sticks and a small ball

sentences.english: Lift your head off the floor and hold this position for five seconds.
sentences.chinese: 把头抬离地面，保持这个姿势五秒钟。

detailed_translations.chinese: [held-held] 拿， 握； 使保持某种状态；
detailed_translations.english: to make something stay in a particular position

sentences.english: I began digging a hole for the plant.
sentences.chinese: 我开始挖洞种那棵植物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 洞， 孔眼； 漏洞， 缺陷
detailed_translations.english: an empty space in something solid

sentences.english: The school holidays start tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 学校假期从明天开始。

detailed_translations.english: a time of rest from work, school etc

sentences.english: These children need a proper home life .
sentences.chinese: 这些孩子需要正常的家庭生活。

detailed_translations.chinese: 家庭的； 家用的； 国内的
detailed_translations.english: relating to or belonging to your home or family

detailed_translations.chinese: 家乡；家，家庭；原产地，发源地
detailed_translations.english: the place where a child lived with his or her family

sentences.english: Many are planning to return to their homeland.
sentences.chinese: 很多人正计划回到自己的祖国去。

detailed_translations.english: the country where someone was born

sentences.english: Do you like your hometown?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢你的家乡吗？

sentences.english: What do you think of your hometown?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得你的家乡怎么样？

detailed_translations.english: Someone's hometown is the town where they live or the town that they come from

sentences.english: For homework, finish the exercise on page 14.
sentences.chinese: 家庭作业是完成第14页的练习。

detailed_translations.chinese: 家庭作业， 课后作业
detailed_translations.english: work that a student at school is asked to do at home

sentences.english: He was a hard-working, honest man.
sentences.chinese: 他勤奋老实。

sentences.english: Ann had an honest face.
sentences.chinese: 安有一张诚实的面孔。

detailed_translations.chinese: 诚实的， 正直的； 坦诚的， 直率的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is honest always tells the truth and does not cheat or steal

sentences.english: Hi, honey.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，亲爱的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 蜜， 蜂蜜； 甜蜜； 宝贝儿， 亲爱的
detailed_translations.english: a sweet sticky substance produced by  bees  , used as food

sentences.english: We showed great honour to the visiting dignitaries.
sentences.chinese: 我们对来访的贵宾表示了极大的敬意。

sentences.english: He always carried out his duties with honour.
sentences.chinese: 他总是荣誉地履行他的职责。

sentences.english: This victory brought great honour to the team.
sentences.chinese: 这次胜利为团队带来了巨大的荣誉。

sentences.english: She took honourable leave from her job.
sentences.chinese: 她从工作中光荣地离职了。

sentences.english: He has always been willing to do honour to his country.
sentences.chinese: 他一直愿意为他的国家增光。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being honest and having good moral principles; respect and admiration gained through achievements or qualities

detailed_translations.chinese: 向…表示敬意；使…荣誉；给…增添荣誉
detailed_translations.english: to show respect and admiration for someone or something; to do something that brings credit or honour to someone

sentences.english: Ruth hooked her arm through Tony’s.
sentences.chinese: 露丝挽住了托尼的手臂。

sentences.english: He tried to hook his leg over the branch.
sentences.chinese: 他试图用腿钩住树枝。

detailed_translations.english: to bend your finger, arm, or leg, especially so that you can pull or hold something else
a curved piece of metal or plastic that you use for hanging things on

sentences.english: I do hope everything goes well.
sentences.chinese: 我真心希望一切顺利。

sentences.english: It was hoped that the job would be filled by a local person.
sentences.chinese: 希望该职位由当地人来担任。

sentences.english: Let’s just hope someone finds her bag.
sentences.chinese: 希望有人找到她的提包。

sentences.english: I hope to God I haven’t left the car window open.
sentences.chinese: 但愿我没有忘记关车窗。

detailed_translations.english: to want something to happen or be true and to believe that it is possible or likely

sentences.english: The weather has been really horrible all week.
sentences.chinese: 整个星期天气都很糟。

sentences.english: a horrible smell
sentences.chinese: 极难闻的气味

sentences.english: The food looked horrible, but it tasted OK.
sentences.chinese: 那食物看上去很糟，可吃起来还不错。

detailed_translations.chinese: 令人恐惧的， 可怕的； 骇人听闻的； 极讨厌的， 使人不愉快的； 糟透的
detailed_translations.english: very bad - used, for example, about things you see, taste, or smell, or about the weather

sentences.english: a horse and cart
sentences.chinese: 一辆马车

sentences.english: Lee had never ridden a horse before.
sentences.chinese: 李以前从未骑过马。

detailed_translations.english: a large strong animal that people ride and use for pulling heavy things

sentences.english: They are building a new hospital.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在建一家新医院。

detailed_translations.english: a large building where sick or injured people receive medical treatment

sentences.english: The wedding party was hosted by the groom's parents.
sentences.chinese: 婚礼是由新郎的父母主持的。

sentences.english: She served as the hostess for the entire evening.
sentences.chinese: 她作为主人/女主人服务了整个晚上。

sentences.english: We had a great time at the party hosted by our friends.
sentences.chinese: 我们在朋友主持的派对上玩得很开心。

detailed_translations.english: a person who invites guests to a social or formal event and looks after them during it
to arrange and supervise an event, such as a party or a TV show

sentences.english: a hot curry
sentences.chinese: 一种辛辣的咖喱

detailed_translations.chinese: 热的； 辣的； 激烈的， 热烈的； 急躁的， 易发怒的； 最新的， 热
detailed_translations.english: food that tastes hot has a burning taste because it contains strong spices

sentences.english: I bought a hotdog from the street vendor.
sentences.chinese: 我从街头小贩那里买了一根热狗。

sentences.english: Hotdogs are a popular food at baseball games.
sentences.chinese: 热狗是棒球比赛中受欢迎的食物。

sentences.english: She added mustard and ketchup to her hotdog.
sentences.chinese: 她在热狗上加了芥末和番茄酱。

detailed_translations.english: a sausage served in a long split roll

sentences.english: I’ve booked the flights and the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 我已订好机票和酒店。

sentences.english: We’ll be staying at the Hotel Ibis.
sentences.chinese: 我们将住在宜必思酒店。

detailed_translations.english: a building where people pay to stay and eat meals

sentences.english: The interview will last about two hours.
sentences.chinese: 面试大概要持续两小时。

sentences.english: I study for an hour every night.
sentences.chinese: 我每晚学习一小时。

sentences.english: I’ll be back in three hours .
sentences.chinese: 我三小时以后回来。

sentences.english: Three hours later he was back.
sentences.chinese: 三小时后他回来了。

sentences.english: Her bag was stolen within hours of her arrival.
sentences.chinese: 她才到没几个小时，手提包就被偷了。

sentences.english: You weren’t interested in my story a half hour ago.
sentences.chinese: 半小时之前你还对我讲的事情不感兴趣呢。

sentences.english: It takes about a quarter of an hour to walk into town.
sentences.chinese: 步行进城大约需要一刻钟。

sentences.english: The hotel is only an hour’s drive from the airport.
sentences.chinese: 那家宾馆离机场只有一小时的车程。

sentences.english: a top speed of 120 miles an hour
sentences.chinese: 120英里的最高时速

sentences.english: This was freelance work, paid by the hour .
sentences.chinese: 这是自由工作，按小时计酬。

sentences.english: a five-hour delay
sentences.chinese: 五小时的延误

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring time. There are 60 minutes in one hour, and 24 hours in one day.

sentences.english: ...homes that house up to nine people.
sentences.chinese: …最多可容纳9人的住处。

detailed_translations.english: to provide someone with a place to live
a group of people who make the laws of a country

sentences.english: household chores
sentences.chinese: 家务杂活

sentences.english: ...growing up in a male-only household.
sentences.chinese: …在全体成员均为男性的家庭里长大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 家庭的； 家喻户晓的
detailed_translations.english: relating to looking after a house and the people in it
A household is all the people in a family or group who live together in a house

sentences.english: Married at nineteen, she was a traditional housewife and mother of four children.
sentences.chinese: 她19岁就结婚了，是个传统的家庭主妇和4个孩子的母亲。

detailed_translations.english: a married woman who works at home doing the cooking, cleaning etc, but does not have a job outside the house

sentences.english: Men are doing more housework nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 现今男人正在承担越来越多的家务。

detailed_translations.english: work that you do to take care of a house, for example washing, cleaning etc

sentences.english: How do you spell your name?
sentences.chinese: 你的名字怎么拼写？

sentences.english: How can I help you?
sentences.chinese: 我怎么帮你？

sentences.english: I’d like to help in some way, but I’m not sure how.
sentences.chinese: 我想帮点忙，可不知道该怎么做。

sentences.english: He explained how the system worked.
sentences.chinese: 他讲解了该系统是如何运转的。

sentences.english: We both used to work at the airport – that’s how we met.
sentences.chinese: 我们俩都曾经在机场工作过，我们就是这么认识的。

sentences.english: advice on how best (= the best way ) to invest your money
sentences.chinese: 如何以最好方式进行投资的建议

sentences.english: They had a number of suggestions as to how the service could be improved.
sentences.chinese: 他们有一些关于如何改进服务的建议。

sentences.english: This still leaves the question of how local services should be funded.
sentences.chinese: 这仍然没有解决如何为地方公共服务业提供资金的问题。

detailed_translations.chinese: 怎么， 怎样； 多么， 多少
detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about the way in which something happens or is done

sentences.english: This is a cheap and simple process. However, there are dangers.
sentences.chinese: 这是个花钱少而又简单的方法，不过有危险。

sentences.english: an extremely unpleasant disease that is, however, easy to treat
sentences.chinese: 一种让人极其难受却容易治疗的病

detailed_translations.english: used when you are adding a fact or piece of information that seems surprising, or seems very different from what you have just said
in whatever way

sentences.english: We stood there crying and hugging each other.
sentences.chinese: 我们站在那里哭着互相拥抱。

sentences.english: She went to her daughter and hugged her tightly .
sentences.chinese: 她走到女儿身边，紧紧地拥抱她。

detailed_translations.english: to put your arms around someone and hold them tightly to show love or friendship

the action of putting your arms around someone and holding them tightly to show love or friendship

sentences.chinese: 你要是饿了，冰箱里有些冷鸡肉。

sentences.chinese: 法医小组正在搜寻线索。

sentences.chinese: 如果有地震、飓风、暴风雪或其他的灾害突袭你的家园，你可能会好几天甚至好几个星期都得不到食物、水和电。

sentences.chinese: 要是赶紧的话，我们能及时到那里。

sentences.chinese: 我讨厌匆匆忙忙地吃饭。

sentences.chinese: 我们得赶紧，否则就会错过开头部分了。

detailed_translations.english: more quickly than usual

sentences.chinese: 快把那东西放下，你会伤着别人的。

suffering pain or injury

sentences.chinese: 你见过我的丈夫罗伊吗？

sentences.chinese: 月球南极是一个持续黑暗的区域，在这里，人类能够接触到水，以生产氢和氧。

sentences.chinese: 因此实际上我们可以直接进行比较，对氮分子与氢分子的离解能，或键的强度。

sentences.chinese: 所有的这些都是来自于第一主族和第二组主族，到第五主族和第六组主族的悬殊，那么元素呢，比如氢气，氮气或氧气那样的分子呢？

detailed_translations.english: Hydrogen is a colourless gas that is the lightest and commonest element in the universe

sentences.chinese: 六年前我搬到了这个城市。

sentences.chinese: 我和丈夫喜欢去剧院看戏。

sentences.chinese: 歌词大意： 当你哼你的歌，水变成冰上面我们的家。

sentences.chinese: 通过加热我们可以把冰变成水。

detailed_translations.english: water that has frozen into a solid state

sentences.chinese: 撞击力使她喘不过气来。

sentences.chinese: 政府许诺要实施新的制度来控制金融贷款机构。

sentences.english: In 2001, Britain exported more cars than it imported.
sentences.chinese: 2001年英国的汽车出口量大于进口。

sentences.english: a very important meeting
sentences.chinese: 很重要的会议

sentences.english: The accident taught him an important lesson.
sentences.chinese: 那次事故给了他很大的教训。

sentences.chinese: 快乐比金钱更重要。

sentences.english: ‘What did you say?’ ‘Oh, nothing important.’

sentences.english: ‘I want to speak to Mr Franks.’ ‘I’m afraid that’s impossible.’
sentences.chinese: “我想和弗兰克斯先生谈谈。”“恐怕不行。”

sentences.chinese: 这些事情不可能准确无误。

sentences.chinese: 噪音吵得人无法睡觉。

sentences.chinese: 有小孩的会员常觉得没法参加晚上的聚会。

sentences.chinese: 他面临着似乎不可能完成的任务。

sentences.english: It was physically impossible to get the fridge through the door.
sentences.chinese: 根本不可能把冰箱从这扇门搬过去。

sentences.english: Six months ago, peace seemed an impossible dream.
sentences.chinese: 六个月前和平还似乎是个无法实现的梦。

sentences.english: Such mental attitudes are difficult, if not impossible, to change.

detailed_translations.chinese: 不可能的， 办不到的

sentences.english: Steve borrowed his dad’s sports car to impress his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫借来他爸爸的跑车向女友炫耀。

sentences.english: ‘He’s a lawyer?’ Mum looked suitably impressed (= as impressed as you would expect ).
sentences.chinese: “他是个律师？”妈妈看上去果然对他印象颇好。

sentences.english: a course for students wishing to improve their English
sentences.chinese: 为想提高英语水平的学生开设的一门课

sentences.english: The doctors say she is improving (= after being ill ).
sentences.chinese: 医生说她正在康复。

sentences.english: You could use the money for improving your home.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用这笔钱改善家居。

sentences.english: Many wines improve with age (= get better as they get older ).
sentences.chinese: 很多葡萄酒年代越久越香醇。

detailed_translations.english: to make something better, or to become better

sentences.english: There’s some sugar in the cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 碗橱里有一些糖。

sentences.english: My mother was in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 我母亲在厨房里。

sentences.english: He took us for a drive in his new car.
sentences.chinese: 他开着他的新车载我们去兜风。

sentences.english: I found her sitting up in bed.
sentences.chinese: 我发现她直直地坐在床上。

sentences.english: Manson spent fifteen years in prison.
sentences.chinese: 曼森在监狱里待了15年。

sentences.english: a hole in the ground
sentences.chinese: 地上的一个洞

sentences.english: Mr Fisher is in Boston this week.
sentences.chinese: 费希尔先生本周在波士顿。

sentences.english: My parents live in New Zealand now.
sentences.chinese: 我父母现住在新西兰。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在…里， 在…内； 在…期间， 在…之内；
detailed_translations.english: used with the name of a container, place, or area to say where someone or something is

sentences.english: The curtains were an inch too short.
sentences.chinese: 窗帘短了一英寸。

sentences.english: Rainfall here is under 15 inches a year.
sentences.chinese: 本地的年降雨量不到15英寸。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring length, equal to 2.54 centimetres. There are 12 inches in a foot.
to move very slowly in a particular direction, or to make something do this

sentences.english: Am I at risk because of some incident in my sexual past?
sentences.chinese: 我过去性生活中的某件事会使我处于危险境地吗？

sentences.english: Roads were sealed off because of a major incident.
sentences.chinese: 因为发生重大事故，道路被封锁了。

detailed_translations.english: an event, especially one that is unusual, important, or violent

sentences.english: Does the price include postage?
sentences.chinese: 这个价格包含邮费吗？

sentences.english: His job includes looking after under-21 teams.
sentences.chinese: 他的职责包括照管21岁以下球队。

sentences.english: The curriculum includes courses in computing.
sentences.chinese: 课程内容包括计算机技术。

detailed_translations.chinese: 包括， 包含， 计入
detailed_translations.english: if one thing includes another, the second thing is part of the first

sentences.english: low-income families
sentences.chinese: 低收入家庭

detailed_translations.english: the money that you earn from your work or that you receive from investments, the government etc

sentences.english: Recent tax increases have affected the poor more than the rich.
sentences.chinese: 新近的增税对穷人的影响比对富人的大。

sentences.english: the dramatic increase in the population aged over 65
sentences.chinese: 65岁以上人口的急剧增加

sentences.english: There has been a marked increase in the use of firearms.
sentences.chinese: 使用枪支的人数显著增加了。

sentences.english: Cases of tuberculosis are on the increase.
sentences.chinese: 结核病病例越来越多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 增加， 增强； 增加， 增强
detailed_translations.english: a rise in amount, number, or degree

sentences.english: It’s incredible that he survived the fall.
sentences.chinese: 他跌下去竟然能够生还，真不可思议。

sentences.english: It’s incredible how much Tom has changed since he met Sally.
sentences.chinese: 自从遇见萨莉后，汤姆的变化之大简直令人难以置信。

sentences.english: I find it almost incredible that no one noticed these errors.
sentences.chinese: 没人发现这些错误，真让我无法相信。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不能相信的， 不可信的； 难以置信的， 不可思议的； 惊人的
detailed_translations.english: too strange to be believed, or very difficult to believe

sentences.english: The blood tests prove that Vince is indeed the father.
sentences.chinese: 验血证明文斯确实是父亲。

sentences.english: ‘Would it help if you had an assistant?’ ‘It would indeed.’
sentences.chinese: “你要是有个助手，会有帮助吗？”“那是肯定的。

sentences.chinese: 他们把生命献给了祖国的解放事业。
