sentences.chinese: …对平等的向往及对自由的欣赏。

detailed_translations.chinese: 自由； 许可， 准许； 过于随便， 放肆
detailed_translations.english: Liberty is the freedom to live your life in the way that you want, without interference from other people or the authorities

sentences.english: a public library
sentences.chinese: 公共图书馆

sentences.english: a library book
sentences.chinese: 图书馆的书

detailed_translations.chinese: 图书馆， 藏书室； 藏书
detailed_translations.english: a room or building containing books that can be looked at or borrowed

sentences.english: He needs a driving licence to operate a car legally.
sentences.chinese: 他需要一张驾驶执照才能合法驾驶汽车。

sentences.english: The company obtained a business licence from the local government.
sentences.chinese: 公司从当地政府获得了营业执照。

sentences.english: She has a licence to practice as a nurse.
sentences.chinese: 她有护士执业许可证。

detailed_translations.english: a official document giving someone the right to do something

sentences.english: She lifted the lid of the box and displayed the contents.
sentences.chinese: 她把盒盖掀起，展示了里边的东西。

detailed_translations.english: a cover for the open part of a pot, box, or other container

sentences.english: The town lies in a small wooded valley.
sentences.chinese: 该城镇坐落于一个林木茂盛的山谷中。

sentences.english: The Tasman Sea lies between Tasmania and Australia.
sentences.chinese: 塔斯曼海位于塔斯马尼亚和澳大利亚之间。

detailed_translations.chinese: [lay-lain, lying] 躺， 平放； 位于； 处于(某种状
detailed_translations.english: if a town, village, etc lies in a particular place, it is in that place

sentences.english: Learning goes on throughout life.
sentences.chinese: 学习是一生的事。

sentences.english: You have your whole life ahead of you.
sentences.chinese: 你前面还有漫长的人生呢。

sentences.english: I’ve known John all my life (= since I was born ).
sentences.chinese: 我从小就认识约翰了。

sentences.english: His main aim in life was to have fun.
sentences.chinese: 他人生的主要目标就是享乐。

sentences.english: It was one of the best days of my life.
sentences.chinese: 那是我一生中最快乐的时光之一。

sentences.english: The accident scarred him for life (= for the rest of his life ).
sentences.chinese: 这场事故给他留下了终生的创伤。

sentences.english: She knew she’d feel guilty for the rest of her life.
sentences.chinese: 她知道自己将内疚终生。

sentences.english: Raj spent his life caring for others.
sentences.chinese: 拉杰一辈子都在关爱他人。

sentences.english: Bonington spent his entire adult life in France.
sentences.chinese: 博宁顿成年后就一直在法国生活。

sentences.english: We don’t know much about the poet’s early life (= when he was young ).
sentences.chinese: 我们对这位诗人的早年生活所知甚少。

sentences.english: Poor diet can lead to a whole range of diseases in later life (= when you are older ).
sentences.chinese: 饮食不良会在晚年引发各种疾病。

sentences.english: She married late in life (= when she was fairly old ).
sentences.chinese: 她结婚晚。

sentences.english: He’s a life member (= continuing until he dies ) of the club.
sentences.chinese: 他是俱乐部的终身会员。

detailed_translations.chinese: 生命， 性命； 一生， 寿命； 生活， 生存； 人生； 生物； 生气， 活力
detailed_translations.english: the period of time when someone is alive

sentences.english: Sophie lifted the phone before the second ring.
sentences.chinese: 铃响了一下苏菲就接起了电话。

sentences.english: He lifted the lid on the pot of soup.
sentences.chinese: 他揭开汤锅的盖子。

sentences.english: The lumber was lifted by crane and dropped into the truck.
sentences.chinese: 木材由起重机搬运到卡车上。

detailed_translations.english: to move something or someone upwards into the air

detailed_translations.chinese: 电梯； 抬， 上升； 搭便车
detailed_translations.english: a machine that you can ride in, that moves up and down between the floors in a tall building

sentences.english: You look nice in light colours.
sentences.chinese: 你穿浅色衣服很好看。

sentences.english: I wanted a lighter yellow paint for the walls.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一种颜色更浅的黄色墙面涂料。

detailed_translations.chinese: 光线充足的， 明亮的； 淡
detailed_translations.english: a light colour is pale and not dark
one of the lights on a car, bicycle etc that help you to see at night

sentences.english: Two farmworkers were struck by lightning (= hit by lightning ).
sentences.chinese: 两个农民遭闪电击中。

sentences.english: Lightning flashed overhead.
sentences.chinese: 头顶上电光闪闪。

detailed_translations.english: a powerful flash of light in the sky caused by electricity and usually followed by thunder

sentences.english: I like your jacket.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢你这件上衣。

sentences.english: I don’t really like classical music.
sentences.chinese: 我不是很喜欢古典音乐。

sentences.english: Do you like this colour?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢这种颜色吗？

sentences.english: I like my coffee quite weak.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢喝很淡的咖啡。

sentences.english: I don’t like it when you get angry.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢你生气时的样子。

sentences.english: How do you like living in London (= how much do you like it )?
sentences.chinese: 住在伦敦你感觉怎样？

sentences.english: I quite like their new album.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢他们的新专辑。

sentences.english: We really liked the film.
sentences.chinese: 我们非常喜欢这部影片。

sentences.english: The time I like best (= like most of all ) is the evening when it’s cool.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢的时间是凉爽的傍晚。

sentences.english: I didn’t like the idea of being a single parent.
sentences.chinese: 我可不想当单亲家长。

detailed_translations.english: to enjoy something or think that it is nice or good

sentences.english: a 55 mph speed limit
sentences.chinese: 55英里的时速限制

detailed_translations.english: the greatest or least amount, number, speed etc that is allowed
to stop an amount or number from increasing beyond a particular point

sentences.english: Draw a straight line across the top of the page.
sentences.chinese: 在这一页的上方画一条直线。

sentences.english: Sign your name on the dotted line (= line made up of a series of dots ).
sentences.chinese: 在虚线上签名。

sentences.english: The edges of the pitch are marked by white lines.
sentences.chinese: 球场的四边画着白线。

sentences.english: The goalkeeper just managed to stop the ball going over the line.
sentences.chinese: 守门员刚好把球截住，没有让它越过球门线。

sentences.english: He raced towards the finishing line.
sentences.chinese: 他朝终点线冲刺。

detailed_translations.chinese: 线条， 界线； 条纹， 皱纹； 方针， 路线； 线路， 电话线； 线， 绳； 排， 行； 铁路
detailed_translations.english: a long thin mark on a piece of paper, the ground, or another surface

sentences.english: So they sent me a… lion!
sentences.chinese: 于是他们又送我一头…狮子！

sentences.english: The lion and the mouse are happy. They are friends.
sentences.chinese: 这狮子和这老鼠是快乐的。它们是朋友。

detailed_translations.english: a large animal of the cat family that lives in Africa and parts of southern Asia. Lions have gold-coloured fur and the male has a mane(= long hair around its neck ).

sentences.english: She had big eyes and full lips (= large and round lips ).
sentences.chinese: 她眼睛大大的，嘴唇很丰满。

sentences.english: Matt opened the door with a smile on his lips.
sentences.chinese: 马特开了门，嘴角挂着微笑。

sentences.english: Marty kissed me right on the lips!
sentences.chinese: 马蒂一下吻在我的嘴唇上！

sentences.english: Stephen pursed his lips with distaste (= brought them together tightly into a small circle ).
sentences.chinese: 斯蒂芬厌恶地噘起嘴唇。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two soft parts around your mouth where your skin is redder or darker

sentences.english: Children take antibiotics in liquid form.
sentences.chinese: 儿童服用液态抗生素。

sentences.english: liquid soap
sentences.chinese: 液体皂

detailed_translations.chinese: 液体的； 清澈的； 流畅的
detailed_translations.english: in the form of a liquid instead of a gas or solid
a substance that is not a solid or a gas, for example water or milk

sentences.english: The guidebook lists 1,000 hotels and restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 旅游手册上列有1,000家宾馆和餐厅。

detailed_translations.english: to write a list, or mention things one after the other
a set of names, numbers etc, usually written one below the other, for example so that you can remember or check them

sentences.english: Listen! There’s a strange noise in the engine.
sentences.chinese: 听！引擎发出奇怪的声音。

detailed_translations.english: to pay attention to what someone is saying or to a sound that you can hear

sentences.english: She literally flew to Paris for the conference.
sentences.chinese: 她真的飞往巴黎参加那个会议。

sentences.english: I was literally sleeping when the phone rang.
sentences.chinese: 我当时真的在睡觉，电话响了。

sentences.english: The book literally changed my life.
sentences.chinese: 这本书真的改变了我的生活。

detailed_translations.english: used for emphasis, to indicate that something is exactly or truly what it appears to be

sentences.english: a literary prize
sentences.chinese: 文学奖

detailed_translations.chinese: 文学的； 文人的， 书卷气的
detailed_translations.english: relating to literature

sentences.english: the Ford’s 2.8 litre engine
sentences.chinese: 福特汽车2.8升排量的引擎

detailed_translations.chinese: [计量] 公升(米制容量单位)
detailed_translations.english: the basic unit for measuring liquid in the metric system

sentences.english: I hate people who litter in the forest.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌那些在森林里乱扔垃圾的人。

detailed_translations.english: to leave waste paper, cans etc on the ground in a public place
to leave waste paper, cans etc on the ground in a public place

detailed_translations.chinese: 废弃物， 被胡乱扔掉的东西； 一窝； 杂乱的东西
detailed_translations.english: waste paper, cans etc that people have thrown away and left on the ground in a public place

sentences.english: a little house
sentences.chinese: 小屋

sentences.english: a cake decorated with little flowers
sentences.chinese: 点缀着小花的蛋糕

sentences.english: She was cutting the meat up into little bits.
sentences.chinese: 她把肉切成小丁。

detailed_translations.chinese: 小的， 矮小的； 短的； 琐碎的， 微不足道的； 不多的， 少到
detailed_translations.english: small in size

sentences.english: experiments on live animals
sentences.chinese: 动物活体实验

sentences.english: Protesters want to stop the export of live sheep and cattle.
sentences.chinese: 抗议者希望阻止出口活羊活牛。

sentences.english: the number of live births per 1,000 population
sentences.chinese: 每1,000人中的活产婴儿数目

sentences.english: We were so excited to seereal liveelephants.
sentences.chinese: 看到活生生的大象我们非常兴奋。

detailed_translations.chinese: 活的；生动的；实况转播的；精力充沛的
detailed_translations.english: not dead or artificial
to continue to live or work after a failure or after you have dealt with a difficult situation

sentences.english: a lively child
sentences.chinese: 精力充沛的孩子

detailed_translations.chinese: 活泼的；生动的；真实的；生气勃勃的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is lively has a lot of energy and is very active

sentences.english: The lorry hadshed its load(= the load had fallen off ).
sentences.chinese: 卡车上的货掉下来了。

sentences.english: The plane was carrying afull loadof fuel.
sentences.chinese: 飞机载满燃料。

detailed_translations.chinese: 负载，负荷；工作量；装载量
detailed_translations.english: a large quantity of something that is carried by a vehicle, person etc
to put a large quantity of something into a vehicle or container

sentences.english: There were always a lot of men loafing in the shop.
sentences.chinese: 总有许多人在商店里闲逛。

detailed_translations.english: to spend time somewhere and not do very much
bread that is shaped and baked in one piece and can be cut into slices

sentences.english: The Wilderness Society lobbied Congress to authorize the Endangered Species Act.
sentences.chinese: 荒野协会游说国会批准《濒危物种法》。

detailed_translations.english: to try to persuade the government or someone with political power that a law or situation should be changed

detailed_translations.chinese: 大厅；休息室；院外活动集团
detailed_translations.english: a wide passage or large hall just inside the entrance to a public building

sentences.english: local hospital
sentences.chinese: 当地医院

sentences.english: local residents
sentences.chinese: 本地居民

detailed_translations.chinese: 地方性的，本地的；局部的；狭隘的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the particular area you live in, or the area you are talking about
someone who lives in the place where you are or the place that you are talking about

sentences.english: We couldn’t locate the source of the radio signal.
sentences.chinese: 我们无法确定无线电信号的来源。

detailed_translations.chinese: 探明， 找出； 把…设置在， 使…坐落于
detailed_translations.english: to find the exact position of something

sentences.english: Did you lock the car?
sentences.chinese: 你把汽车锁好了吗？

sentences.english: I can’t get this drawer to lock.
sentences.chinese: 我没法把这个抽屉锁上。

detailed_translations.english: to fasten something, usually with a key, so that other people cannot open it, or to be fastened like this (
a thing that keeps a door, drawer etc fastened and is usually opened with a key or by moving a small metal bar

sentences.english: a roaring log fire
sentences.chinese: 原木燃烧的熊熊大火

detailed_translations.english: a thick piece of wood from a tree
to make an official record of events, facts etc

sentences.english: It’s a logical site for a new supermarket, with the housing development nearby.
sentences.chinese: 附近有住宅区，新的超级市场选址在此是合情合理的。

sentences.english: a logical conclusion
sentences.chinese: 合理的结论

detailed_translations.chinese: 逻辑的， 合乎常理的
detailed_translations.english: seeming reasonable and sensible

sentences.english: a lonely old man
sentences.chinese: 一个孤单的老人

sentences.english: Don’t you get lonely being on your own all day?
sentences.chinese: 你整天独自一人不感到寂寞吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 孤独的， 寂寞的； 荒凉的， 人迹稀少的
detailed_translations.english: unhappy because you are alone or do not have anyone to talk to

sentences.english: Have you beenwaiting long?
sentences.chinese: 你是否等了很长时间？

sentences.english: Reform of the law islong overdue.
sentences.chinese: 这项法律早就该修改了。

sentences.english: long established traditions
sentences.chinese: 历史悠久的传统

detailed_translations.english: for a long time
measuring a great length from one end to the other
used to ask and talk about particular amounts of time

sentences.english: How do I look?
sentences.chinese: 我看上去怎么样？

sentences.english: What did the man look like ?
sentences.chinese: 那人长相如何？

sentences.english: My sister doesn’t look anything like me.
sentences.chinese: 我妹妹长得一点也不像我。

detailed_translations.chinese: 看， 注视； 显得， 看上去； 朝着， 面向
detailed_translations.english: to have a particular appearance

sentences.english: a loose floorboard
sentences.chinese: 松动的地板

sentences.english: This tooth feels very loose.
sentences.chinese: 这颗牙感觉松动得厉害。

sentences.english: The screw has come loose (= become loose ) .
sentences.chinese: 螺丝松了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 松的； 不精确的， 不严密的； 散漫的
detailed_translations.english: not firmly fastened in place

sentences.english: I’ve lost my appetite.
sentences.chinese: 我已经没有了胃口。

sentences.english: Try not to lose heart (= become sad and hopeless ) - there are plenty of other jobs.
sentences.chinese: 不要灰心―还有很多其他的工作。

sentences.english: By the time the ambulance arrived, Douglas had lost consciousness .
sentences.chinese: 救护车赶到时，道格拉斯已经失去知觉。

detailed_translations.chinese: [lost-lost] 失去， 损失； 迷失， 使迷路； 输， 输掉； 白费， 浪费； 走慢
detailed_translations.english: to stop having a particular attitude, quality, ability etc, or to gradually have less of it

sentences.english: We’ve spent a lot on the children’s education.
sentences.chinese: 我们在孩子的教育上花费甚多。

sentences.english: ‘How many CDs have you got?’ ‘Lots.’
sentences.chinese: “你有多少张CD？”“多着呢。”

detailed_translations.chinese: 许多， 大量； 签， 抽签； 一块地， 场地
detailed_translations.english: a large amount or number

sentences.english: The book fell to the floor with a loud bang.
sentences.chinese: 书砰的一声掉落到地上。

sentences.english: The music was so loud that I had to shout.
sentences.chinese: 音乐太响了，我只得大声地喊。

sentences.english: ‘Who’s there?’ asked David in a loud voice.
sentences.chinese: “是谁？” 戴维大声问道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 响亮的， 大声的； 刺目的； 太招摇的
detailed_translations.english: making a lot of noise

sentences.english: I love you, Tracy.
sentences.chinese: 我爱你，特雷西。

sentences.english: He was the only man she had ever loved.
sentences.chinese: 他是她唯一爱过的男人。

detailed_translations.english: to have a strong feeling of  affection  for someone, combined with sexual attraction
a strong feeling of caring about someone, especially a member of your family or a close friend

sentences.english: Their safety standards seem to be pretty low.
sentences.chinese: 他们的安全标准似乎相当低。

sentences.english: Cost-cutting has led to a lower quality of service.
sentences.chinese: 削减成本导致服务质量降低。

sentences.english: the children’s low achievement in school
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在学校里不好的成绩

detailed_translations.chinese: 低的， 矮的； 低下的， 低等的； 粗劣的， 低俗的； 不充分的， 缺乏的； 意气
detailed_translations.english: bad, or below an acceptable or usual level or quality

sentences.english: You’re not having much luck today, are you?
sentences.chinese: 你今天运气不太好，是不是？

sentences.english: He’s had good luck with his roses this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年他种玫瑰的运气不错。

sentences.english: It was an incredible piece of luck.
sentences.chinese: 真是令人难以置信的好运气。

detailed_translations.chinese: 运气； 好运， 幸运
detailed_translations.english: good things that happen to you by chance

sentences.english: They searched his luggage for illegal drugs.
sentences.chinese: 他们搜查他的行李看是否藏有毒品。

detailed_translations.english: the cases, bags etc that you carry when you are travelling

sentences.english: studies of the lunar surface
sentences.chinese: 对月球表面的研究

sentences.english: a lunar eclipse
sentences.chinese: 月食

detailed_translations.english: relating to the Moon or to travel to the Moon

sentences.english: What’s for lunch?
sentences.chinese: 午饭吃什么？

detailed_translations.english: a meal eaten in the middle of the day

sentences.english: Smoking can cause lung cancer.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟会引起肺癌。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two organs in your body that you breathe with

sentences.english: He was leading a life of luxury in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他在澳大利亚过着豪华舒适的生活。

sentences.english: The dress is lambswool – pure luxury.
sentences.chinese: 礼服是用羔羊毛制作的——绝对奢华。

detailed_translations.english: very great comfort and pleasure, such as you get from expensive food, beautiful houses, cars etc

sentences.english: Could you get me a coffee from the drinks machine ?
sentences.chinese: 给我从自动饮料机里买一罐咖啡好吗？

sentences.english: The fax machine is broken.
sentences.chinese: 传真机坏了。

sentences.english: Did you put my dirty shirts in the machine (= washing machine ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你把我的脏衬衫放进洗衣机里了吗？

sentences.english: I left a message for you on your machine (= telephone answering machine ) .
sentences.chinese: 我在你的电话答录机里留了言。

sentences.english: The machine wouldn’t let me have any money (= cash machine ) .
sentences.chinese: 自动取款机不让我取钱。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment with moving parts that uses power such as electricity to do a particular job

sentences.english: He can’t possibly get that finished in time. He must be mad !
sentences.chinese: 他不可能按时完成的。他一定是疯了！

sentences.english: I’d go mad (= start to feel crazy ) if I was stuck at home all day.
sentences.chinese: 如果我整天困在家里我会发疯的。

sentences.english: He’s been driving me mad !
sentences.chinese: 他真让我受不了！

sentences.english: You’ve agreed to marry him! Are you mad?
sentences.chinese: 你已经同意跟他结婚了！你疯了吗？

sentences.english: Surely no one would be mad enough to fly in this weather?
sentences.chinese: 肯定没有人会傻到在这样的天气条件下飞行吧？

sentences.english: My friends all think I’m stark raving mad (= completely crazy ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友都认为我是彻底疯了。

sentences.english: It’s enough to send you barking mad (= completely crazy ) .
sentences.chinese: 这足以让你发狂。

detailed_translations.chinese: 疯的， 神经错乱的； 恼火的， 狂怒的； 狂热的， 着迷的
detailed_translations.english: crazy or very silly

sentences.english: Are you being served, Madam?
sentences.chinese: 有人接待您吗，夫人？

detailed_translations.english: used to address a woman in a polite way, especially a customer in a shop

sentences.english: a magazine article
sentences.chinese: 杂志中的文章

sentences.english: She glanced over the magazine racks.
sentences.chinese: 她扫了一眼杂志架。

detailed_translations.english: a large thin book with a paper cover that contains news stories, articles, photographs etc, and is sold weekly or monthly

sentences.english: a book of magic spells
sentences.chinese: 一本关于魔法的书

sentences.english: a magic sword
sentences.chinese: 一把魔剑

detailed_translations.english: in stories, a magic word or object has special powers that make the person using it able to do impossible things
the power to make impossible things happen by saying special words or doing special actions

sentences.english: They send the mail by road.
sentences.chinese: 他们通过公路运送邮件。

sentences.english: No, I could mail it to you.
sentences.chinese: 一点也不迟，我可以邮寄给你。

sentences.english: Some mail servers appear to be open relays.
sentences.chinese: 有些邮件服务器似乎是开放中继。

detailed_translations.english: to send a letter or package to someone

detailed_translations.chinese: 邮政，邮递；邮件，邮包；电子邮件
detailed_translations.english: the letters and packages that are delivered to you

sentences.english: The main reason for living in Spain is the weather.
sentences.chinese: 居住在西班牙的主要原因是天气。

sentences.english: What do you consider to be the main problem?
sentences.chinese: 你认为最主要的问题是什么？

sentences.english: Our main concern is that the children are safe.
sentences.chinese: 我们最关心的是保证孩子们的安全。

sentences.english: a summary of the main points of the agreement
sentences.chinese: 协议要点的总结

sentences.english: the main aim of the meeting
sentences.chinese: 会议的要旨

sentences.english: I’ll meet you outside the main entrance.
sentences.chinese: 我在大门外等你。

sentences.english: the main bedroom
sentences.chinese: 主卧室

detailed_translations.english: larger or more important than all other things, ideas etc of the same kind

sentences.english: flights between a Greek island and the mainland
sentences.chinese: 希腊一海岛和本土之间的航班

detailed_translations.english: the main area of land that forms a country, as compared to islands near it that are also part of that country

sentences.english: Careers Officers maintain contact with young people when they have left school.
sentences.chinese: 年轻人离开学校以后，职业指导员和他们保持联系。

sentences.english: Britain wants to maintain its position as a world power.
sentences.chinese: 英国想保持其世界强国的地位。

sentences.english: A lot depends on building and maintaining a good relationship with your customers.
sentences.chinese: 和顾客建立并保持良好关系很重要，很多事情要取决于此。

sentences.english: The hotel prides itself on maintaining high standards.
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店以保持高标准而自豪。

sentences.english: How can we maintain control of spending?
sentences.chinese: 我们如何保持对开支的控制？

detailed_translations.chinese: 维持； 维修， 保养； 主张； 赡养
detailed_translations.english: to make something continue in the same way or at the same standard as before

sentences.english: There is a major problem with parking in London.
sentences.chinese: 在伦敦，停车是个很大的问题。

sentences.english: The loss of their goalkeeper through injury was a major setback for the team.
sentences.chinese: 守门员因伤缺阵使该队的实力大打折扣。

sentences.english: He underwent major heart surgery recently.
sentences.chinese: 他最近做了心脏大手术。

sentences.english: It could have sparked a major confrontation.
sentences.chinese: 此事险些导致一场严重的冲突。

detailed_translations.english: having very serious or worrying results
an officer of middle rank in the British or US army or  marine s  ,or in the US air force

sentences.english: I’m going to show you how to make a box for your tools.
sentences.chinese: 我来教你怎么做一个箱子存放工具。

sentences.english: A family of mice had made their nest in the roof.
sentences.chinese: 一窝老鼠在屋顶上安了家。

sentences.english: She made her own wedding dress.
sentences.chinese: 她的婚纱是自己做的。

sentences.english: The company has been making quality furniture for over 200 years.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司制作优质家具有两百多年的历史了。

sentences.english: They met while they were making a film.
sentences.chinese: 他们是在拍电影时认识的。

sentences.english: Make a list of all the things you need.
sentences.chinese: 把你需要的所有物品列一份清单。

detailed_translations.chinese: [made-made] 做， 制造； 作出， 制定； 使， 迫使； 获得， 挣得； 成为， 到达
detailed_translations.english: to produce something, for example by putting the different parts of it together

sentences.english: She always wears makeup to feel confident.
sentences.chinese: 她总是化妆以感到自信。

sentences.english: The makeup artist helped her choose the right colors.
sentences.chinese: 化妆师帮她选对了颜色。

sentences.english: His makeup was running down his face after the rain.
sentences.chinese: 雨后他的妆容流了下来。

detailed_translations.english: cosmetics; the application of cosmetics to the face and other parts of the body to enhance or alter appearance
the process of putting on makeup
a person's facial appearance as represented in a photograph

sentences.english: a deep male voice
sentences.chinese: 低沉的男声

sentences.english: traditional male values
sentences.chinese: 传统的男性价值观

sentences.english: Motor-racing has largely been a male preserve (= something that only men have been involved with ) .
sentences.chinese: 赛车基本上是男人的专利。

detailed_translations.english: typical of or relating to men or boys
a male animal

sentences.english: There were two men and a woman in the car.
sentences.chinese: 车上有两男一女。

sentences.english: He’s a very kind man.
sentences.chinese: 他是个非常和蔼的人。

sentences.english: a man’s watch
sentences.chinese: 男式手表

sentences.english: Don’t keep Hansen waiting – he’s a busy man.
sentences.chinese: 别让汉森老等着——他可是个大忙人。

detailed_translations.english: an adult male human

detailed_translations.chinese: 在〔某系统、设备等上〕工作；使用，操纵〔某系统、设备等〕
detailed_translations.english: to work at, use, or ope-rate a system, piece of equipment etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 喂，嘿，啊呀〔用于强调正在说的话，尤在生气、吃惊、失望等时使用〕

sentences.english: He was asked to manage a new department.
sentences.chinese: 他被要求去管理一个新的部门。

sentences.english: Managing a football team is harder than you think.
sentences.chinese: 管理一支足球队比你想象的要难。

sentences.english: The company had been very badly managed.
sentences.chinese: 公司管理非常糟糕。

sentences.english: a brewery which has been owned and managed by the same family for over 100 years
sentences.chinese: 被同一个家族拥有和经营了一百多年的啤酒厂

detailed_translations.chinese: 管理， 控制； 操纵， 应付； 设法做到
detailed_translations.english: to direct or control a business or department and the people, equipment, and money involved in it

sentences.english: I love to eat fresh mangoes for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在早餐时吃新鲜的芒果。

sentences.english: The mango tree in our garden produces a lot of fruit every year.
sentences.chinese: 我们花园里的芒果树每年结很多果。

sentences.english: Mango chutney is a popular side dish in Indian cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 芒果酸辣酱是印度菜中受欢迎的配菜。

detailed_translations.english: a tropical fruit with a yellow skin when ripe and a sweet, juicy flesh

sentences.english: Since earliest times, mankind has been fascinated by fire.
sentences.chinese: 人类自远古以来就对火很感兴趣。

sentences.english: one of the most important events in the history of mankind
sentences.chinese: 人类历史上最重要的事件之一

detailed_translations.english: all humans considered as a group

sentences.english: He felt some guilt over the manner of her death.
sentences.chinese: 她以这种方式死去，他心里有些内疚。

sentences.english: The issue will be resolved in a manner that is fair to both sides.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题将用对双方都公平的方式来解决。

sentences.english: criticism of the manner in which the bishop was appointed
sentences.chinese: 对主教任命方式的批评

detailed_translations.english: the way in which something is done or happens

sentences.english: the company that manufactured the drug
sentences.chinese: 生产这种药的公司

sentences.english: manufactured goods
sentences.chinese: 工业品，制成品

detailed_translations.english: to use machines to make goods or materials, usually in large numbers or amounts
the process of making goods or materials using machines, usually in large numbers or amounts

sentences.english: The printing press gave power to a few to change the world for the many.
sentences.chinese: 印刷机赋予了少数人为多数人改变世界的力量。

sentences.english: Among his many hobbies was the breeding of fine horses.
sentences.chinese: 在他的众多爱好中有饲养名马。

detailed_translations.english: The many means a large group of people, especially the ordinary people in society, considered as separate from a particular small group
Many is also an adjective

sentences.english: He spent the next fifteen years mapping the Isle of Anglesey.
sentences.chinese: 他在后来的十五年里绘制了安格尔西岛的地图。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在地图上标示出； 绘制…的地图
detailed_translations.english: to make a map of a particular area
a drawing of a particular area, for example a city or country, which shows its main features, such as its roads, rivers, mountains etc

sentences.english: the Boston Marathon
sentences.chinese: 波士顿马拉松赛

sentences.english: Garcia ran the marathon in just under three hours.
sentences.chinese: 加西亚用了不到三小时就跑完了马拉松。

detailed_translations.chinese: 马拉松长跑； 持久比赛； 〈喻〉拖时长久令人
detailed_translations.english: a long race of about 26 miles or 42 kilometres

sentences.english: An estimated 5,000 people marched through the city to demonstrate against the factory closures.
sentences.chinese: 大约有五千人在市里游行示威，抗议关闭工厂。

detailed_translations.english: if soldiers or other people march somewhere, they walk there quickly with firm regular steps

detailed_translations.chinese: 行进， 行军； 游行示威； 进行， 进展； [M-] 三月
detailed_translations.english: an organized event in which many people walk together to express their ideas or protest about something

sentences.english: I can’t get these marks out of my T-shirt.
sentences.chinese: 我无法把我T恤衫上的这些污迹去掉。

sentences.english: His feet left dirty marks all over the floor.
sentences.chinese: 他的脚踩得地板上到处都是污迹。

sentences.english: The skid marks (= marks left by a car’s tyres ) were over 30 feet long.
sentences.chinese: 打滑痕迹有30多英尺长。

detailed_translations.chinese: 痕迹， 斑点， 污点； 记号， 标记； 分数
detailed_translations.english: a spot or dirty area on something that spoils its appearance

sentences.english: If you could ever figure out how to market this you’d make a fortune.
sentences.chinese: 如果能想出办法来推销这个东西，你就发财了。

detailed_translations.english: to try to persuade people to buy a product by advertising it in a particular way, using attractive packages etc
a particular country or area where a company sells its goods or where a particular type of goods is sold

sentences.english: He married Bea in 1925.
sentences.chinese: 他在1925年娶了贝亚。

sentences.english: I’m going to ask her to marry me on St Valentine’s Day.
sentences.chinese: 我打算在情人节向她求婚。

sentences.english: She married young (= at a young age ) .
sentences.chinese: 她结婚早。

sentences.english: People in higher social classes are more likely to marry late (= when they are older than is usual ) .
sentences.chinese: 社会阶层较高的人士倾向于晚婚。

sentences.english: Sophia had, in a sense, married beneath her (= married someone of a lower social class than her ) .
sentences.chinese: 索菲娅在某种意义上是下嫁了。

detailed_translations.english: if you marry someone, you become their husband or wife

sentences.english: a mass protest
sentences.chinese: 大规模的抗议

sentences.english: weapons of mass destruction
sentences.chinese: 大规模杀伤性武器

sentences.english: the problem of mass unemployment
sentences.chinese: 大批人失业的问题

detailed_translations.english: involving or intended for a very large number of people
to come together, or to make people or things come together, in a large group

detailed_translations.chinese: 众多，大量；团，块，堆；群众；质量
detailed_translations.english: a large crowd

sentences.english: She got a professional massage to relieve her muscle tension.
sentences.chinese: 她请了一位专业人士给她做按摩，以缓解肌肉紧张。

sentences.english: The masseuse used oils to make the massage more relaxing.
sentences.chinese: 按摩师使用了精油，使按摩更加放松。

sentences.english: He learned how to give a basic foot massage.
sentences.chinese: 他学会了如何进行基本的足部按摩。

detailed_translations.english: the act of rubbing or pressing muscles and other soft parts of the body to give relief from pain or stiffness
to rub or press muscles and other soft parts of the body to give relief from pain or stiffness

sentences.english: the skills needed to master a new language
sentences.chinese: 掌握一门新语言所需的技能

sentences.english: I never quite mastered the art of walking in high heels.
sentences.chinese: 我一直学不会穿高跟鞋走路。

detailed_translations.english: to learn a skill or a language so well that you have no difficulty with it
most important or main

detailed_translations.chinese: 主人，雇主；能手；名家，大师
detailed_translations.english: someone who is very skilled at something

sentences.english: We painted the cabinets green to match the rug.
sentences.chinese: 我们把柜子刷成绿色，和地毯相配。

sentences.english: Do you think this outfit matches?
sentences.chinese: 你认为这套衣服配吗？

sentences.english: a beech dining table with four chairs to match (= chairs that match it )
sentences.chinese: 配有四把椅子的山毛榉餐桌

detailed_translations.english: if one thing matches another, or if two things match, they look attractive together because they are a similar colour, pattern etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 比赛，竞赛；对手，敌手；匹配；火柴
detailed_translations.english: an organized sports event between two teams or people

sentences.english: Rabbits can be mated as early as six months old.
sentences.chinese: 兔子在六个月大时就可以交配了。

detailed_translations.english: if animals mate, they have sex to produce babies

detailed_translations.chinese: 伙伴，同事；配偶，配对物；大副
detailed_translations.english: someone you work with, do an activity with, or share something with

sentences.english: According to some, the material world is all that exists.
sentences.chinese: 有些人认为，物质世界就是存在的一切。

detailed_translations.chinese: 物质的， 实际的； 客观存在的； 重要的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the real world and physical objects, rather than religious or  spiritual  things
cloth used for making clothes, curtains etc

sentences.english: I am studying both maths and physics at university.
sentences.chinese: 我在大学学习数学和物理。

sentences.english: She is very good at mathematics and often helps her classmates with problems.
sentences.chinese: 她非常擅长数学，经常帮助同学解决问题。

sentences.english: We have a maths test next Monday.
sentences.chinese: 我们下周一是数学考试。

detailed_translations.english: a subject in school that involves the study of numbers, shapes, and calculations

sentences.english: If I have to stay late at work tonight, it won’t matter because we can go out another night.
sentences.chinese: 如果今晚我必须工作到很晚的话，那也没关系，我们可以改天晚上再出去。

sentences.english: Does it matter what I think?
sentences.chinese: 我怎么想重要吗？

sentences.english: Do you think it matters that the cups and saucers don’t match?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得茶杯与杯托不相配要紧吗？

sentences.english: campaigning on issues that really matter
sentences.chinese: 以重大问题为竞选议题

sentences.english: Money was the only thing that mattered to him.
sentences.chinese: 对他来说，钱是唯一重要的东西。

sentences.english: I don’t care what it looks like – what matters is that it works.
sentences.chinese: 我不在乎外观——要紧的是它要管用。

sentences.english: At last she was with the man she loved and nothing else mattered .
sentences.chinese: 最终她和她所爱的男人在一起了，其他都无关紧要。

sentences.english: She said very little during the meal. Not that it mattered (= it was not important ) .
sentences.chinese: 她吃饭时话很少，那倒无所谓。

detailed_translations.english: to be important, especially to be important to you, or to have an effect on what happens

detailed_translations.chinese: 事情，情况；物质；麻烦事，毛病
detailed_translations.english: a subject or situation that you have to think about or deal with

sentences.english: Laura is very mature for her age .
sentences.chinese: 相对她的年龄来说劳拉是很成熟的。

sentences.english: We’re mature enough to disagree on this issue but still respect each other.
sentences.chinese: 我们都很成熟，尽管我们对此事意见不同，但还是彼此尊重。

detailed_translations.chinese: 成熟的；成年人的；深思熟虑的；到期的，应支付的
detailed_translations.english: someone, especially a child or young person, who is mature behaves in a sensible and reasonable way, as you would expect an adult to behave
to become fully grown or developed

sentences.english: The car has a maximum speed of 120 mph.
sentences.chinese: 这辆汽车的最高时速为120英里。

sentences.english: They made maximum use of the resources available.
sentences.chinese: 他们充分利用可获取的资源。

sentences.english: To get the maximum benefit, do the exercises slowly.
sentences.chinese: 要想获得最佳的效果，这些运动要做得慢一点。

sentences.english: Display the hologram under a strong light for maximum effect.
sentences.chinese: 把立体全息图放在强光下展示以得到最佳效果。

sentences.english: The plant is operating at maximum capacity .
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂正在开足马力生产。

sentences.english: The award will consist of a lump sum to a maximum value of $5,000.
sentences.chinese: 奖学金最高将是5,000美元，一次性给付。

detailed_translations.chinese: 最大的， 最高的， 顶点的
detailed_translations.english: the maximum amount, quantity, speed etc is the largest that is possible or allowed
the largest number or amount that is possible or is allowed

sentences.english: I may be late, so don’t wait for me.
sentences.chinese: 我可能会迟到，所以别等我。

sentences.english: Some chemicals may cause environmental damage.
sentences.chinese: 有些化学物品可能会给环境造成破坏。

sentences.english: There may not be enough money to pay for the repairs.
sentences.chinese: 可能钱不够支付修理费。

sentences.english: Well, I may have been wrong.
sentences.chinese: 好了，可能是我错了。

sentences.english: They may have called while you were out.
sentences.chinese: 你出去时他们可能给你打过电话。

sentences.english: It may be that Minoan ships were built and repaired here.
sentences.chinese: 米诺斯人的船可能就是在这里建造和修理的。

sentences.english: Your job may well involve some travelling (= it is fairly likely ) .
sentences.chinese: 你的工作很可能有时需要出差。

detailed_translations.english: if something may happen or may be true, there is a possibility that it will happen or be true but this is not certain
the white or pink flowers of the  hawthorn

sentences.english: Maybe it’s all just a big misunderstanding.
sentences.chinese: 也许这只是一个很大的误会。

sentences.english: ‘Do you think he’ll come back?’ ‘Maybe.’
sentences.chinese: “你认为他会回来吗？”“也许会吧。”

sentences.english: Maybe they’re right, but maybe not .
sentences.chinese: 也许他们是对的，但也许不是。

sentences.english: You have talent, maybe even genius.
sentences.chinese: 你很有才能，甚至可以说有天赋。

sentences.english: He said he’d finish the work soon – maybe tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 他说他很快就会完成那项工作——也许是明天。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that something may happen or may be true but you are not certain

sentences.english: the election of the London mayor
sentences.chinese: 选举伦敦市长

detailed_translations.english: the person who has been elected to lead the government of a town or city

sentences.english: Stop, you’re hurting me.
sentences.chinese: 住手，你弄疼我了。

sentences.english: He bought me a drink.
sentences.chinese: 他给我买了一杯酒。

sentences.english: Give that book to me.
sentences.chinese: 把那本书给我。

sentences.english: She’s two years older than me.
sentences.chinese: 她比我大两岁。

sentences.english: That’s me, standing on the left.
sentences.chinese: 那是我，站在左边的那一个。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself

sentences.english: We must have a meal together some time.
sentences.chinese: 我们一定要找个时间一起吃顿饭。

sentences.english: Dinner is the main meal of the day for most people.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭是大多数人一天中的主餐。

detailed_translations.chinese: 膳食， 一餐， 一顿； 进餐
detailed_translations.english: an occasion when you eat food, for example breakfast or dinner, or the food that you eat on that occasion

sentences.english: What does ‘patronizing’ mean?
sentences.chinese: patronizing是什么意思？

sentences.english: The red light means ‘Stop’.
sentences.chinese: 红灯表示“停”。

sentences.english: The report fails to define what is meant by the term ‘key issues’.
sentences.chinese: 报告没有明确“关键问题”一词指的是什么。

detailed_translations.chinese: [meant-meant] 表示…的意思； 意欲， 打算； 意指， 意味着
detailed_translations.english: to have or represent a particular meaning

sentences.english: The only means of communication was sign language.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的交流方法是手语。

sentences.english: He missed 20 games after breaking a bone in his wrist.
sentences.chinese: 由于手腕骨折，他错过了20场比赛。

sentences.english: She was upset at missing all the excitement.
sentences.chinese: 精彩部分都错过了，她很失望。

detailed_translations.chinese: 未击中， 未达到； 未赶上， 错过； 思念， 想念； 未明白； 避免， 逃脱
detailed_translations.english: to not go somewhere or do something, especially when you want to but cannot
used in front of the family name of a woman who is not married to address her politely, to write to her, or to talk about her

sentences.english: a nuclear missile
sentences.chinese: 核导弹

sentences.english: a missile attack
sentences.chinese: 导弹袭击

detailed_translations.chinese: 导弹， 飞弹， 投射物
detailed_translations.english: a weapon that can fly over long distances and that explodes when it hits the thing it has been aimed at

sentences.english: We found the missing piece of the jigsaw under the chair.
sentences.chinese: 我们在椅子下面找到了那块丢失的拼图。

sentences.english: The keys have been missing for ages.
sentences.chinese: 钥匙早已丢失了。

detailed_translations.english: something that is missing is not in its usual place, so that you cannot find it

sentences.english: He was sent on over 200 missions before being killed in action.
sentences.chinese: 在阵亡之前他奉命执行过200多次军事任务。

sentences.english: US troops taking part in the peacekeeping mission
sentences.chinese: 参与维和任务的美军

detailed_translations.chinese: 使命， 任务； 使团
detailed_translations.english: an important job that involves travelling somewhere, done by a member of the air force, army etc, or by a spacecraft

sentences.english: The windows misted, blurring the stark streetlight.
sentences.chinese: 窗户蒙上了一层水汽，使得明亮的街灯模糊了。

detailed_translations.english: If a piece of glass mists or is misted, it becomes covered with tiny drops of moisture, so that you cannot see through it easily
a light cloud low over the ground that makes it difficult for you to see very far

sentences.english: The most common mistake is to plant them too deep.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的错误就是把它们种得太深了。

detailed_translations.english: something that has been done in the wrong way, or an opinion or statement that is incorrect
to understand something wrongly

sentences.english: Oil and water don’t mix.
sentences.chinese: 油和水不相融。

detailed_translations.english: if you mix two or more substances or if they mix, they combine to become a single substance, and they cannot be easily separated
the particular combination of things or people in a group or thing

sentences.english: a more mobile workforce
sentences.chinese: 具有更强流动性的劳动力

sentences.english: People these days are much more socially mobile .
sentences.chinese: 如今人们的社会地位容易改变多了。

sentences.english: an upwardly mobile (= moving to a higher social scale ) professional
sentences.chinese: 步步高升的专业人士

detailed_translations.chinese: 运动的； 流动的； 多变的
detailed_translations.english: moving or able to move from one job, area, or social class to another

sentences.english: This device allows you to switch between different modes for various tasks.
sentences.chinese: 这款设备允许您在不同的模式之间切换，以完成各种任务。

sentences.english: The software comes with several modes, including a beginner-friendly interface.
sentences.chinese: 该软件提供多种模式，包括适合初学者的界面。

sentences.english: The machine operates in automatic mode by default.
sentences.chinese: 该机器默认以自动模式运行。

detailed_translations.english: a way of doing something or a plan for doing something
a particular way in which a computer system or program operates
a particular setting or way in which a machine or device works

sentences.english: a working model (= one with parts which move ) of a steam engine
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽机车的活动模型

detailed_translations.chinese: 模型； 模特儿； 模范， 典型
detailed_translations.english: a small copy of a building, vehicle, machine etc, especially one that can be put together from separate parts

sentences.english: Such companies must change if they are to compete in the modern world .
sentences.chinese: 此类公司如果想在现代社会中与别人竞争，就必须有所改变。

sentences.english: They are the youngest children in modern times to face murder charges.
sentences.chinese: 他们是近代面临谋杀指控儿童中年龄最小的。

sentences.english: Smaller families are a feature of modern society .
sentences.chinese: 家庭规模变小是现代社会的一个特征。

sentences.english: Computers are an essential part of modern life .
sentences.chinese: 电脑是现代生活必不可少的组成部分。

sentences.english: a book about modern history
sentences.chinese: 一本关于现代史的书

sentences.english: The original supermarkets were small by modern standards.
sentences.chinese: 最初的超级市场按现代的标准来看是很小的。

detailed_translations.english: belonging to the present time or most recent time

sentences.english: It was one of the most exciting moments in his life.
sentences.chinese: 这是他一生中最激动人心的时刻之一。

sentences.english: She may be in trouble at this very moment and trying to call you.
sentences.chinese: 此时此刻她可能遇到了麻烦，正想方设法给你打电话。

sentences.english: I remember the moment when I first saw him after the operation.
sentences.chinese: 我还记得手术后第一次见到他的那一刻。

sentences.english: Quinn always seems to be in the right place at the crucial moment.
sentences.chinese: 奎因似乎总能在关键时刻把握时机。

sentences.english: I just this moment (= only a very short time ago ) arrived and already Dan wants to know when I’m leaving.
sentences.chinese: 我才刚到，丹就想知道我什么时候走。

sentences.english: At this moment in time it would be inappropriate to comment on the situation.
sentences.chinese: 这个时候恐怕不宜对局势作出评论。

sentences.english: (= after that time ) we were the best of friends.
sentences.chinese: 从那以后我们就成了最好的朋友。

detailed_translations.chinese: 片刻， 瞬间， 时刻； 机会， 时机
detailed_translations.english: a particular point in time

sentences.english: Don’t spend all your money on the first day of your holiday!
sentences.chinese: 别在度假的第一天就把钱都花完了！

sentences.english: The repairs will cost quite a lot of money.
sentences.chinese: 修理要花一大笔钱。

detailed_translations.english: what you earn by working and can use to buy things. Money can be in the form of notes and coins or cheques, and can be kept in a bank

sentences.english: a heart monitor
sentences.chinese: 心脏监测仪

detailed_translations.chinese: 班长；监视器，检测器；显示器
detailed_translations.english: a television or part of a computer with a screen, on which you can see pictures or information
to carefully watch and check a situation in order to see how it changes over a period of time

sentences.english: Do they have any monkey tricks?
sentences.chinese: 他们有猴子耍把戏吗？

sentences.english: Which monkey do you like?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢哪一只猴子？

sentences.english: Do you like that monkey?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢那个猴子吗?。

detailed_translations.english: a small brown animal with a long tail, which uses its hands to climb trees and lives in hot countries

sentences.english: I hope I’ll have finished the work by the end of the month .
sentences.chinese: 我希望我这个月底能完成工作。

sentences.english: She earns about £350 a month (= each month ) .
sentences.chinese: 她每月约挣350英镑。

sentences.english: We update the schedule at least once a month.
sentences.chinese: 我们至少每月更新一次日程表。

detailed_translations.english: one of the 12 named periods of time that a year is divided into

sentences.english: You’re in a good mood this morning!
sentences.chinese: 你今天早晨心情不错啊！

sentences.english: the general mood of depression in the office
sentences.chinese: 办公室里普遍的沮丧情绪

detailed_translations.chinese: 心情， 情绪； 语气
detailed_translations.english: the way you feel at a particular time

sentences.english: the craters on the surface of the moon
sentences.chinese: 月球表面的环形山

sentences.english: The Americans landed on the Moon in 1969.
sentences.chinese: 美国人于1969年登上月球。

sentences.english: The moon appeared from behind a cloud.
sentences.chinese: 月亮从云后钻了出来。

sentences.english: The moon rose into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 月亮升上天空。

sentences.english: The moon was shining in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 月儿当空照。

detailed_translations.chinese: 月球， 月亮； 卫星
detailed_translations.english: the round object that you can see shining in the sky at night, and that moves around the Earth every 28 days

sentences.english: She carried on mopping the floor.
sentences.chinese: 她继续用拖把拖地。

detailed_translations.english: to wash a floor with a wet mop
a thing used for washing floors, consisting of a long stick with threads of thick string or a piece of  sponge  fastened to one end

sentences.english: It is easy to have an opinion on a moral issue like the death penalty for murder.
sentences.chinese: 对于判谋杀犯死刑这种涉及伦理道德的问题，有个观点并非难事。

sentences.english: If we accept that certain babies should be allowed to die, we place doctors in a moral dilemma .
sentences.chinese: 如果我们同意应该允许某些婴儿死去，那就是让医生在道德上处于两难境地了。

sentences.english: Man is gifted with a moral sense by which he distinguishes good from evil.
sentences.chinese: 人类天生有道德意识，能区分善与恶。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the principles of what is right and wrong behaviour, and with the difference between good and evil

detailed_translations.chinese: 品行； 道德规范； 寓意
detailed_translations.english: principles or standards of good behaviour, especially in matters of sex

sentences.english: You’ll have to be more careful next time.
sentences.chinese: 你下次要更小心一点。

sentences.english: Can’t it be done more quickly?
sentences.chinese: 不能快一点吗？

sentences.english: Selling goods abroad is no more difficult (= not more difficult ) than selling to the home market.
sentences.chinese: 做外销和做内销一样不难。

detailed_translations.english: having a particular quality to a greater degree

sentences.english: The rent is reasonable and, moreover, the location is perfect.
sentences.chinese: 租金合理，而且位置也非常好。

sentences.english: The source of the information is irrelevant. Moreover, the information need not be confidential.
sentences.chinese: 信息来源无关紧要，而且也不一定必须是机密的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 而且， 再者， 此外
detailed_translations.english: in addition – used to introduce information that adds to or supports what has previously been said

sentences.english: I hated those cold winter mornings.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌冬天里寒冷的早晨。

sentences.english: I’m not feeling very well this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上我觉得不大舒服。

sentences.english: He stayed in bed late on Sunday morning.
sentences.chinese: 星期日早上他睡到很晚。

sentences.english: She took the early morning train.
sentences.chinese: 她搭乘了一大早的火车。

detailed_translations.english: the early part of the day, from when the sun rises until 12 o’clock in the middle of the day

sentences.english: The Grand Mosque is a famous landmark in Mecca.
sentences.chinese: 麦加的大清真寺是一个著名的地标。

sentences.english: Many Muslims visit the mosque for daily prayers.
sentences.chinese: 许多穆斯林每天去清真寺祈祷。

sentences.english: The mosque features beautiful architecture and intricate designs.
sentences.chinese: 清真寺拥有美丽的建筑和复杂的图案。

detailed_translations.english: a Muslim place of worship

sentences.english: The use of mosquito lure female mosquitoes.
sentences.chinese: 运用蚊子的趋光性引诱雌蚊。

sentences.english: Can I go to the theatre?"asked a mosquito to her mother. "Yes, but.
sentences.chinese: “我可以去电影院吗？”一只蚊子问妈妈。“可以，但是要小心。

sentences.english: He crushes it, with one hydraulic hand, almost unconsciously, like someone swatting a mosquito.
sentences.chinese: 他下意识地地用液压手将它拍个稀烂，就像拍死一只蚊子。

detailed_translations.english: a small flying insect that sucks the blood of people and animals, sometimes spreading the disease  malaria

sentences.english: She’s one of the most experienced teachers in the district.
sentences.chinese: 她是该地区最有经验的教师之一。

sentences.english: The most important thing is to stay calm.
sentences.chinese: 最重要的是保持冷静。

sentences.english: A recent study showed that gardening is easily the most popular activity among the over 50s.
sentences.chinese: 最近的一项研究表明园艺绝对是50岁以上人群中最受欢迎的活动。

sentences.english: We shall find out which system works most effectively.
sentences.chinese: 我们要找出哪个系统效率最高。

sentences.english: It is the kind of tea most often served in Chinese restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 这是中国餐馆里最常用的茶。

sentences.english: The president himself won the most votes.
sentences.chinese: 总统本人赢得了最多的选票。

detailed_translations.english: having the greatest amount of a particular quality

detailed_translations.chinese: 最多的， 最大的； 大多数的， 大部分的
detailed_translations.english: You use the most to mean a larger amount than anyone or anything else, or the largest amount possible

sentences.english: My mother or mum always supports me in everything I do.
sentences.chinese: 我的妈妈或妈妈总是支持我所做的一切。

sentences.english: She is both my mother and my best friend.
sentences.chinese: 她既是我的妈妈，也是我的最好朋友。

detailed_translations.english: a woman who has given birth to a child or children

sentences.english: She motioned for the locked front doors to be opened.
sentences.chinese: 她打手势示意把锁着的前门打开。

sentences.english: He stood aside and motioned Don to the door.
sentences.chinese: 他站在一边，示意唐到门口。

detailed_translations.english: If you motion to someone, you move your hand or head as a way of telling them to do something or telling them where to go

detailed_translations.chinese: 运动；手势，眼色，动作；提议
detailed_translations.english: the process of moving or the way that someone or something moves

sentences.english: Was he motivated solely by a desire for power?
sentences.chinese: 他只是受到权欲的驱使吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 作为…的动机； 激励， 激发
detailed_translations.english: to be the reason why someone does something

sentences.english: What do you suppose the killer’s motive was?
sentences.chinese: 你认为凶手的动机是什么？

sentences.english: The violence was clearly prompted by political motives.
sentences.chinese: 这次暴力事件显然是由政治动机引发的。

sentences.english: It’s not the kind of thing he’d do unless he had an ulterior motive (= a reason he kept hidden ) .
sentences.chinese: 他不会做这种事的，除非他另有隐情。

detailed_translations.english: the reason that makes someone do something, especially when this reason is kept hidden

sentences.english: an electric motor
sentences.chinese: 电动马达

detailed_translations.english: the part of a machine that makes it work or move, by changing power, especially electrical power, into movement

sentences.english: The motorbike is supposed to make annoying noise.
sentences.chinese: 摩托车当然会发出令人感到烦恼的噪音。

sentences.english: Some earlier witness reports cited by police or security officials had explosives being thrown from a motorbike or the upper storey's of an adjacent hotel.
sentences.chinese: 一些更早的证词报道引用警方或安全部门的话说，爆炸物从摩托车上扔下，或是从领进旅馆的楼上扔下来。

detailed_translations.english: a small fast two-wheeled vehicle with an engine

sentences.english: We drove at high speed on the motorway.
sentences.chinese: 我们在高速公路上高速行驶。

sentences.english: The motorway connects the city center to the airport.
sentences.chinese: 高速公路将市中心与机场连接起来。

sentences.english: Building a new motorway was a costly project.
sentences.chinese: 修建一条新的高速公路是一个耗资巨大的项目。

detailed_translations.english: a major road for high-speed traffic, especially connecting cities

sentences.english: ‘Be prepared’ is the motto of the Boy Scouts.
sentences.chinese: “时刻准备着”是童子军的格言。

detailed_translations.english: a short sentence or phrase giving a rule on how to behave, which expresses the aims or beliefs of a person, school, or institution

sentences.english: He mounted the stairs and looked around him slowly.
sentences.chinese: 他登上楼梯，慢慢环顾四周。

sentences.english: A car suddenly mounted the pavement to avoid a vehicle coming in the opposite direction.
sentences.chinese: 有辆汽车为了躲避迎面驶来的一辆车，突然冲上了人行道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 登上；发起；安放；增加，加剧
detailed_translations.english: to go up a step or stairs
used as part of the name of a mountain

sentences.english: the highest mountain in Austria
sentences.chinese: 奥地利最高的山

sentences.english: the Rocky Mountains
sentences.chinese: 落基山脉

sentences.english: a steep mountain road
sentences.chinese: 陡峭的山路

sentences.english: magnificent mountain ranges
sentences.chinese: 雄伟的山脉

sentences.english: snow-capped mountain peaks
sentences.chinese: 白雪覆盖的山峰

sentences.english: a mountain rescue team
sentences.chinese: 山地营救队

sentences.english: She was the first British woman to climb the mountain .
sentences.chinese: 她是攀登这座山峰的第一位英国女子。

detailed_translations.english: a very high hill

sentences.english: Select the printer icon and then click the left mouse button.
sentences.chinese: 选择打印机图标，然后点击鼠标左键。

detailed_translations.chinese: 鼠； 胆小的人； 鼠标
detailed_translations.english: a small object connected to a computer by a wire, which you move with your hand to give instructions to the computer

sentences.english: He lifted his glass to his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 他把玻璃杯举到嘴边。

sentences.english: Liam was fast asleep with his mouth wide open.
sentences.chinese: 利亚姆大张着嘴，睡得很熟。

detailed_translations.english: the part of your face which you put food into, or which you use for speaking

sentences.english: Please keep the doors closed while the train is moving.
sentences.chinese: 火车行驶时请保持车门关闭。

sentences.english: ‘Come on,’ Sue said. No one moved.
sentences.chinese: “来吧。”休说。但没有人动。

sentences.english: Could you move your car, please? It’s blocking the road.
sentences.chinese: 你能把车挪一下吗？挡着路了。

sentences.english: Becca moved down the steps and into the yard.
sentences.chinese: 贝卡走下台阶，来到院子里。

sentences.english: The bar was so crowded you could hardly move .
sentences.chinese: 酒吧很挤，人都难以挪动。

sentences.english: At Christmas, you couldn’t move for toys in this house (= there were a lot of toys ) .
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节的时候，这房子里玩具多得让人都挪不开步。

sentences.english: Paul couldn’t move a muscle (= could not move at all ) – he was so scared.
sentences.chinese: 保罗动弹不得——他吓坏了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 移动， 搬动， 搬； 动摇， 使改变主意； 感动， 激起； 进展， 发展
detailed_translations.english: to change from one place or position to another, or to make something do this

sentences.english: It was like one of those old John Wayne movies.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影有点像约翰•韦恩演的一部老片子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 电影， 影片； 电影院， 电影业
detailed_translations.english: a film made to be shown at the cinema or on television

sentences.english: Mr Smith is the head of the department.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯先生是部门的负责人。

sentences.english: Mrs Jones is a very kind teacher.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯夫人是一位非常友善的老师。

sentences.english: Ms Davis works in the marketing department.
sentences.chinese: 戴维斯女士在市场部工作。

detailed_translations.english: a title used before someone's name to show their social status or relationship to a husband

sentences.english: Then you can have much in common with them.
sentences.chinese: 然后你可以与他们有许多共同之处。

sentences.english: If you [he] had much money, you [he] should buy it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你[他]有许多钱， 你[他]就该把它买下来。

detailed_translations.english: by a great amount

sentences.english: By the end of the game, all the kids were covered in mud.
sentences.chinese: 到了比赛快结束的时候，所有的孩子都浑身是泥。

sentences.english: The path beside the river was slippery with mud.
sentences.chinese: 河边的小路泥泞湿滑。

sentences.english: Many villages in Mali consist of mud huts.
sentences.chinese: 马里的大多数村庄都是泥草房。

sentences.english: boots caked with mud
sentences.chinese: 沾满泥巴的靴子

sentences.english: It was impossible to move the car – its wheels had got stuck in the mud.
sentences.chinese: 这车子动不了——车轮陷到烂泥里了。

detailed_translations.english: wet earth that has become soft and sticky

sentences.english: a coffee mug
sentences.chinese: 一个咖啡杯

detailed_translations.english: a tall cup used for drinking tea, coffee etc
to attack someone and rob them in a public place

sentences.english: Baxter was rushed to the hospital with multiple stab wounds.
sentences.chinese: 巴克斯特因多处刺伤被紧急送往医院。

sentences.english: Having multiple partners increases your risk of sexual diseases.
sentences.chinese: 性伴侣多会增加得性病的风险。

sentences.english: His new album includes multiple versions of the same songs.
sentences.chinese: 他的新专辑包括同一些歌曲的多种版本。

detailed_translations.english: many, or involving many things, people, events etc
a number that contains a smaller number an exact number of times

sentences.english: On the night the murder was committed , he was out of the country.
sentences.chinese: 凶案发生当晚他不在国内。

sentences.english: The man accused of her murder will appear in court today.
sentences.chinese: 被指控谋杀她的那名男子将于今天出庭。

sentences.english: He was found guilty of attempted murder .
sentences.chinese: 他被判谋杀未遂。

sentences.english: She was charged with two counts of first degree murder .
sentences.chinese: 她被控犯有两项一级谋杀罪。

sentences.english: The mother of the murder victim wept in court.
sentences.chinese: 凶案死者的母亲在法庭上痛哭。

sentences.english: Police are searching for the murder weapon .
sentences.chinese: 警方在寻找杀人凶器。

sentences.english: Detectives have launched a murder investigation .
sentences.chinese: 警方探员已经启动凶杀案调查。

detailed_translations.english: the crime of deliberately killing someone
to kill someone deliberately and illegally

sentences.english: Relax your stomach muscles , then stretch again.
sentences.chinese: 放松腹部肌肉，然后再绷紧。

sentences.english: Regular exercise will help to strengthen your muscles .
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼有助于强健肌肉。

sentences.english: Rooney has pulled a muscle in his thigh and won’t play tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 鲁尼大腿肌肉拉伤，明天不能参赛了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 肌肉， 体力； 力量， 实力
detailed_translations.english: one of the pieces of flesh inside your body that you use in order to move, and that connect your bones together

sentences.english: the Museum of Modern Art
sentences.chinese: 现代艺术博物馆

sentences.english: The museum has an extensive collection of early photographs.
sentences.chinese: 这座博物馆藏有大量早期的照片。

detailed_translations.english: a building where important  cultural  , historical, or scientific objects are kept and shown to the public

sentences.english: New housing developments mushroomed on the edge of town.
sentences.chinese: 城郊新住宅区雨后春笋般地冒出来。

detailed_translations.english: to grow and develop very quickly
one of several kinds of  fungus  with stems and round tops, some of which can be eaten

sentences.english: I often listen to classic music when I’m in the car.
sentences.chinese: 我在车上经常听古典音乐。

sentences.english: A new piece of music was specially written for the occasion.
sentences.chinese: 为了这个活动专门写了一首新曲子。

detailed_translations.english: a series of sounds made by instruments or voices in a way that is pleasant or exciting

sentences.english: Warm clothes are a must in the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 御寒衣物在山里是必不可少的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 必须做的事； 必备之物
detailed_translations.english: something that you must do or must have

sentences.english: ...a leg of mutton.
sentences.chinese: …一条羊腿。

detailed_translations.english: the meat from a sheep

sentences.english: I have my way, and you have yours.
sentences.chinese: 我有我的处理方式，你有你的。

sentences.english: Yes, I like my job.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我喜欢我的工作。

sentences.english: I blame myself for what has happened.
sentences.chinese: 发生这一切都怪我自己。

sentences.english: I can look after myself.
sentences.chinese: 我可以照顾好自己。

sentences.english: I’m making myself a sandwich.
sentences.chinese: 我在给自己做三明治。

detailed_translations.chinese: 我自己； 我亲自， 我本人
detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to show that they are affected by their own action

sentences.english: Frank put the first plank down and nailed it in place.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克放下第一块木板，把它钉到位。

detailed_translations.english: to fasten something to something else with nails
a thin pointed piece of metal with a flat top, which you hit into a surface with a hammer, for example to join things together or to hang something on

sentences.english: Her name is Mandy Wilson.
sentences.chinese: 她的名字是曼迪•威尔逊。

sentences.english: What’s your name?
sentences.chinese: 你叫什么名字？

detailed_translations.chinese: 名字， 名称； 名声， 名誉
detailed_translations.english: what someone is called

sentences.english: The stairs were very narrow.
sentences.chinese: 楼梯非常狭窄。

sentences.english: a long, narrow band of cloud
sentences.chinese: 窄长的云带

detailed_translations.chinese: 狭窄的，有限的；勉强的；精密的；度量小的
detailed_translations.english: measuring only a small distance from one side to the other, especially in relation to the length
to make something narrower or to become narrower

sentences.english: the President’s radio broadcast to the nation
sentences.chinese: 总统对全国的广播讲话

sentences.english: an independent nation
sentences.chinese: 独立的国家

sentences.english: the world’s leading industrial nations
sentences.chinese: 世界上的主要工业国

detailed_translations.english: a country, considered especially in relation to its people and its social or economic structure

sentences.english: They never saw their native land again.
sentences.chinese: 他们再也没见到故土。

sentences.english: He spent most of his professional life outside his native Poland.
sentences.chinese: 他大部分的职业生涯都没在祖国波兰度过。

detailed_translations.english: your native country, town etc is the place where you were born

detailed_translations.chinese: 土生土长者， 本国人
detailed_translations.english: a word used by white people in the past to refer to the people who lived in America, Africa, southern Asia etc before European people arrived, now considered offensive

sentences.english: We grew up in the countryside, surrounded by the beauties of nature.
sentences.chinese: 我们在乡村长大，周围是美丽的大自然。

sentences.english: nature conservation
sentences.chinese: 自然保护

sentences.english: Disease is nature’s way of keeping the population down.
sentences.chinese: 疾病是大自然控制人口的方法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 大自然， 自然界； 本性， 性格， 性情； 性质， 类型
detailed_translations.english: everything in the physical world that is not controlled by humans, such as wild plants and animals, earth and rocks, and the weather

sentences.english: The little boy was naughty and kept misbehaving in class.
sentences.chinese: 那个小男孩很淘气，在课堂上一直调皮捣蛋。

sentences.english: She got a naughty smile on her face when she heard the joke.
sentences.chinese: 当听到笑话时，她脸上露出了淘气的微笑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 淘气的；顽皮的；不听话的
detailed_translations.english: behaving in a way that is mischievous or slightly unacceptable

sentences.english: the British Navy
sentences.chinese: 英国海军

sentences.english: He joined the navy during the war.
sentences.chinese: 他在战争期间参加了海军。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a country’s military forces that fights at sea

sentences.english: They live near London.
sentences.chinese: 他们住在伦敦附近。

sentences.english: I’m sure they live somewhere near here.
sentences.chinese: 我肯定他们就住在这附近。

sentences.english: They moved house to be nearer the school.
sentences.chinese: 他们把家搬到离学校近一些。

sentences.english: She told the children not to go near the canal.
sentences.chinese: 她告诉孩子们不要走近运河。

sentences.english: I’m warning you - don’t come any nearer!
sentences.chinese: 我警告你别再靠近！

sentences.english: We heard voices as we drew near the village.
sentences.chinese: 我们走近村子时听见了说话声。

detailed_translations.english: only a short distance from a person or thing

detailed_translations.chinese: 近的， 接近的； 亲近的
detailed_translations.english: only a short distance away from someone or something

sentences.english: He might easily have been seen by someone who lived nearby.
sentences.chinese: 他可能很容易被住在附近的人看到。

sentences.english: The helicopter crashed to earth nearby.
sentences.chinese: 直升机坠毁在附近的地面上。

detailed_translations.english: If something is nearby, it is only a short distance away
not far away

sentences.english: neat handwriting
sentences.chinese: 工整的笔迹

sentences.english: His clothes were always neat and clean.
sentences.chinese: 他的衣服总是很整洁。

sentences.english: Everything in the house was neat and tidy.
sentences.chinese: 房子里的每样物品都干净整齐。

sentences.english: She arranged the books in a nice neat pile.
sentences.chinese: 她把书摞成整齐的一堆。

detailed_translations.chinese: 灵巧的；整洁的；优雅的；齐整的；未搀水的；平滑的
detailed_translations.english: tidy and carefully arranged

sentences.english: The booklet provides all the necessary information about the college.
sentences.chinese: 这本小册子提供了关于那所学院的所有必需信息。

sentences.english: No further changes were considered necessary.
sentences.chinese: 没有必要作出进一步的改变。

sentences.english: The doctor says it may be necessary for me to have an operation.
sentences.chinese: 医生说我可能需要做手术。

detailed_translations.chinese: 必要的，必需的；必然的，势必的，不可避免的
detailed_translations.english: something that is necessary is what you need to have or need to do
things such as food or basic clothes that you need in order to live

sentences.english: Mike rubbed the back of his neck.
sentences.chinese: 迈克揉了揉后颈。

sentences.english: You have a lot of tension in your neck muscles.
sentences.chinese: 你的颈部肌肉很紧张。

sentences.english: He patted his horse’s neck.
sentences.chinese: 他拍了拍马脖子。

sentences.english: She had a mass of golden hair, which she wore in a coil at the nape  of her neck.
sentences.chinese: 她有一头金发，盘在脖子后面。

sentences.english: The dog picked up the puppy and carried it by the scruff of the neck into the house.
sentences.chinese: 那条狗叼住小狗的后颈，把它叼进了屋子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 颈， 脖子； 领圈， 领口
detailed_translations.english: the part of your body that joins your head to your shoulders, or the same part of an animal or bird

sentences.english: ...a diamond necklace and matching earrings.
sentences.chinese: …一条钻石项链和与之相配的耳环。

detailed_translations.english: a string of jewels, beads etc or a thin gold or silver chain to wear around the neck

sentences.english: You don’t really need a car.
sentences.chinese: 你其实并不需要一辆车。

sentences.english: Plants need light in order to survive.
sentences.chinese: 植物需要光才能存活。

sentences.english: The camcorder needs a new battery.
sentences.chinese: 这台摄像机需要一块新电池。

sentences.english: Are you sure that you have everything you need?
sentences.chinese: 你确定需要的都有了吗？

detailed_translations.english: to have to have something or someone, because you cannot do something without them, or because you cannot continue or cannot exist without them

detailed_translations.chinese: 需要， 必要； 缺乏； 迫切要求
detailed_translations.english: a situation in which something is necessary, especially something that is not happening yet or is not yet available

sentences.english: She carried hypodermic needles and syringes in her bag.
sentences.chinese: 她包里带着皮下注射针和针筒。

sentences.english: Drug users are at risk when they share needles.
sentences.chinese: 吸毒者共用注射针很危险。

detailed_translations.english: a very thin, pointed steel tube at the end of a syringe, which is pushed into your skin to put a drug or medicine into your body or to take out blood

sentences.english: students with a negative attitude to school
sentences.chinese: 对上学抱消极态度的学生

sentences.english: They have a uniformly negative image of the police.
sentences.chinese: 他们都对警察印象不好。

sentences.english: Jean rarely sounded so negative about her mother.
sentences.chinese: 琼很少这么说她母亲不好。

detailed_translations.english: considering only the bad qualities of a situation, person etc and not the good ones
an image on a photographic film that shows dark areas as light and light areas as dark, from which the final picture is printed

sentences.english: His first aim is to get the warring parties back to the negotiating table (= discussing something ).
sentences.chinese: 他的首要目标就是把交战各方拉回到谈判桌上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 洽谈， 协商； 顺利通过， 成功越过； 协商， 谈判
detailed_translations.english: to discuss something in order to reach an agreement, especially in business or politics

sentences.english: One of the neighbors complained about the noise from the party.
sentences.chinese: 有位邻居抱怨聚会太吵。

sentences.english: FBI agents were interviewing all their friends and neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 联邦调查局人员正在向他们所有的朋友和邻居问话。

sentences.english: Our next-door neighbours (= the people who live in the house next to us ) say they’ll look after our cat for us while we’re away.
sentences.chinese: 我们隔壁的邻居说，我们不在时他们会照顾我们的猫。

detailed_translations.english: someone who lives next to you or near you

sentences.english: Be quiet! You’ll wake up the whole neighbourhood!
sentences.chinese: 安静点！ 你会把邻居全都吵醒的！

detailed_translations.chinese: 四邻； 附近； 接近
detailed_translations.english: the area around you or around a particular place, or the people who live there

sentences.english: ‘I don’t like horror movies.’ ‘Me neither.’
sentences.chinese: “我不喜欢恐怖电影。”“我也不喜欢。”

detailed_translations.english: used to show that a negative statement is also true about another person or thing

sentences.english: I am planning a 25th birthday party for my nephew.
sentences.chinese: 我正在为侄子筹划他25岁的生日聚会。

detailed_translations.english: the son of your brother or sister, or the son of your husband’s or wife’s brother or sister

sentences.english: I wish you’d stop looking at me like that. You’re making me nervous.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你不要再那样看着我了，你让我紧张。

sentences.english: By the time I got into the interview I was a nervous wreck (= was extremely nervous ).
sentences.chinese: 到了面试的时候，我紧张得要命。

detailed_translations.chinese: 神经紧张的， 情绪不安的； 神经系统的； 神经性的
detailed_translations.english: worried or frightened about something, and unable to relax

sentences.english: They say eagles used to nest in those rocks.
sentences.chinese: 他们说以前常有老鹰在那些岩石中筑巢。

detailed_translations.english: to build or use a nest
a place made or chosen by a bird to lay its eggs in and to live in

sentences.english: The net profit (= after taxes, costs etc ) was up 16.3% last month.
sentences.chinese: 上个月净利润增长了16.3%。

sentences.english: The company reported a net loss of $56 million last year.
sentences.chinese: 公司报告去年净亏损5,600万美元。

sentences.english: Vernon estimates the company’s net worth at over $8 billion.
sentences.chinese: 弗农估算公司的资产净值超过80亿美元。

sentences.english: The United States is a net importer of beef (= it imports more than it exports ).
sentences.chinese: 美国是牛肉净进口国。

detailed_translations.english: the net amount is the final amount that remains after all the other amounts have been taken away
the system that allows millions of computer users around the world to exchange information

sentences.english: Hungary’s telephone network
sentences.chinese: 匈牙利的电话网

sentences.english: a high-speed European rail network
sentences.chinese: 欧洲的高速铁路网

detailed_translations.chinese: 网状物； 广播网， 电视网； 网络
detailed_translations.english: a system of lines, tubes, wires, roads etc that cross each other and are connected to each other

sentences.english: He’s never been to Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他从未去过澳大利亚。

sentences.english: I’m never going back there again, not as long as I live.
sentences.chinese: 只要我活着，我再也不会回到那儿去。

sentences.english: It is never too late to give up smoking.
sentences.chinese: 戒烟不言晚。

sentences.english: (= never after a particular time ) would he return to Naples.
sentences.chinese: 他再也不会回到那不勒斯。

detailed_translations.chinese: 从不， 永不； 决不， 千万不
detailed_translations.english: not at any time, or not once

sentences.english: What you said was true. It was, nevertheless, a little unkind.
sentences.chinese: 你说的都是实话，只不过有点刻薄。

detailed_translations.english: in spite of a fact that you have just mentioned

sentences.english: How do you like your new diet?
sentences.chinese: 你认为你的新的饮食怎么样？

sentences.english: I like the new dress.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢这件新连衣裙。

sentences.english: What do you think our new house should be like ?
sentences.chinese: 你认为我们的新房子应当是什么样子的？

detailed_translations.chinese: 新的；新鲜的，新型的，流行的；更新的
detailed_translations.english: recently made, built, invented, written, designed etc

sentences.english: I hope to have some good news for you soon.
sentences.chinese: 我希望很快就能给你好消息。

detailed_translations.english: information about something that has happened recently

sentences.english: She had read about it in the newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 关于这件事她已经在报纸上看到了。

sentences.english: a series of newspaper articles about life in Cuba
sentences.chinese: 刊登在报纸上的一系列关于古巴生活的文章

detailed_translations.english: a set of large folded sheets of printed paper containing news, articles, pictures, advertisements etc which is sold daily or weekly

sentences.english: When I next saw her she completely ignored me.
sentences.chinese: 我再次见到她时，她压根儿没有理我。

sentences.english: I'll be 26 years old next Friday.
sentences.chinese: 我下周五就26岁了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 接下去， 然后； 居后地， 次于
detailed_translations.english: the next time

detailed_translations.chinese: 下一个的；紧接在后的；接下来的
detailed_translations.english: Next is also an adjective

sentences.english: They’ve got a very nice house.
sentences.chinese: 他们的房子真漂亮。

sentences.english: Did you have a nice time?
sentences.chinese: 你们玩得开心吗？

sentences.english: It’s such a nice day (= good weather ), why not go for a swim?
sentences.chinese: 天气真好，为什么不去游泳呢？

sentences.english: What a nice surprise!
sentences.chinese: 真是个惊喜！

sentences.english: One of the nice things about Christmas is having all the family together.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节的一个好处是全家可以聚首一堂。

detailed_translations.chinese: 好的； 令人愉快的； 友好的， 好心的； 细致的
detailed_translations.english: pleasant, attractive, or enjoyable

sentences.english: ...his niece, the daughter of his eldest sister.
sentences.chinese: …他的外甥女，他大姐的女儿。

detailed_translations.english: the daughter of your brother or sister, or the daughter of your wife’s or husband’s brother or sister

sentences.english: It was a cold moonlit night.
sentences.chinese: 那是个寒冷的月夜。

sentences.english: I didn’t sleep too well last night.
sentences.chinese: 我昨晚睡得不太好。

detailed_translations.english: the dark part of each 24-hour period when the sun cannot be seen and when most people sleep

sentences.english: ‘Are you Italian?’ ‘No, I’m Spanish.’
sentences.chinese: “你是意大利人吗？”“不，我是西班牙人。”

sentences.english: ‘Do you want any more?’ ‘No thanks.’
sentences.chinese: “你还要再来点吗？”“不要了，谢谢。”

sentences.english: ‘Could you help me write this?’ ‘No, sorry, I haven’t got time at the moment.’
sentences.chinese: “你能帮我写这个吗？”“抱歉，不行，我现在没时间。”

sentences.english: He wanted to take me to a disco but I said no.
sentences.chinese: 他想带我去迪斯科舞厅，但是我拒绝了。

sentences.english: Sixty percent of people voted no.
sentences.chinese: 60%的人投了反对票。

sentences.english: If you’re asking whether I feel the same way about her, the answer is no.
sentences.chinese: 如果你问的是我对她是否也有相同的感觉，答案是没有。

detailed_translations.english: used to give a negative reply to a question, offer, or request
used on signs to say that something is not allowed

sentences.english: It’s very noble of you to spend all your weekends helping the old folk.
sentences.chinese: 你心地真好，周末的时间全都用来帮助老人。

sentences.english: noble ideals
sentences.chinese: 崇高的理想

detailed_translations.chinese: 高尚的；贵族的；惰性的；宏伟的
detailed_translations.english: morally good or generous in a way that is admired
a member of the highest social class with a title such as ‘Duke’ or ‘Countess’

sentences.english: I knocked on the door but nobody answered.
sentences.chinese: 我敲了敲门，但没人应门。

detailed_translations.english: no one

sentences.english: The woman greeted us with a nod of the head.
sentences.chinese: 那个女人向我们点点头打招呼。

sentences.english: I showed the doorman my card and he gave a friendly nod.
sentences.chinese: 我向门卫出示了卡片，他友善地点了点头。

detailed_translations.english: an act of nodding
to move your head up and down, especially in order to show agreement or understanding

sentences.english: What’s that noise?
sentences.chinese: 那是什么声音？

sentences.english: Try not to make a noise when you go upstairs.
sentences.chinese: 上楼时尽量不要弄出声。

sentences.english: There was a lot of noise outside.
sentences.chinese: 外面很吵闹。

sentences.english: Noise levels have been reduced by 20%.
sentences.chinese: 噪音水平下降了20%。

detailed_translations.chinese: 声音， 响声； 噪音
detailed_translations.english: a sound, especially one that is loud, unpleasant, or frightening

sentences.english: I was none too pleased to have to take the exam again.
sentences.chinese: 我要重考一次，根本高兴不起来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一点也不， 毫不， 毫无
detailed_translations.english: not at all
not any amount of something or not one of a group of people or things

sentences.english: Serve the meat with rice or noodles.
sentences.chinese: 肉配米饭或面条一起上。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin piece of food made from a mixture of flour, water, and eggs, usually cooked in soup or boiling water

sentences.english: We met at 12 noon.
sentences.chinese: 我们中午12点见了面。

detailed_translations.english: 12 o’clock in the daytime

sentences.english: I have neither bag nor wallet.
sentences.chinese: 我既没有包也没有钱夹。

sentences.english: A normal working week is 40 hours.
sentences.chinese: 一个正常的工作周是40小时。

sentences.english: She was assessed in the normal way, and placed on the waiting list.
sentences.chinese: 她接受了正常的评估后被列入等候名单。

sentences.english: All I want is to lead a normal life.
sentences.chinese: 我想要的只是能过正常的生活。

detailed_translations.chinese: 正常的， 平常的； 正规的， 规范的
detailed_translations.english: usual, typical, or expected

sentences.english: The birds fly north in summer.
sentences.chinese: 夏季鸟儿向北飞。
