the direction that is at the top of a map of the world, above the Equator. It is on the left if you are facing the rising sun

sentences.chinese: 有人一拳打在他的鼻子上。

sentences.english: Most of the stores do not open until 10 am.
sentences.chinese: 大多数商店要到上午10点才开始营业。

sentences.english: She’s not a very nice person.
sentences.chinese: 她为人不太好。

sentences.english: You were wrong not to inform the police.
sentences.chinese: 你没有通知警方是错误的。

sentences.chinese: “我们能去公园吗？”“不，今天不行，亲爱的。”

detailed_translations.english: used to make a word, statement, or question negative

sentences.english: Can I borrow your lecture notes?
sentences.chinese: 我能不能借用一下你的课堂笔记？

sentences.chinese: 他从口袋里掏出了一个笔记本和一支钢笔。

detailed_translations.english: a book made of plain paper on which you can write notes

sentences.chinese: 这镇上从来都不会发生什么特别的事。

sentences.chinese: 医生们没有别的办法了。

sentences.chinese: 他没有更多要说的了。

sentences.chinese: 我们对她的家庭一无所知。

sentences.chinese: 我不能就那样袖手旁观。

sentences.chinese: 我答应这件事对谁也不说。

sentences.chinese: 晚饭她几乎什么也没吃。

sentences.english: There’s nothing wrong with the data.
sentences.chinese: 这些数据没什么差错。

sentences.english: There’s nothing new about this.
sentences.chinese: 这没有什么新鲜的。

sentences.english: A brief search was made but they found nothing untoward.
sentences.chinese: 他们简单地搜查了一番，没发现任何异常。

detailed_translations.english: not anything or no thing

sentences.chinese: 他看到有位黑衣女子坐在他的对面。

sentences.chinese: 我没注意到有烟。

sentences.english: Have you noticed any change in him?
sentences.chinese: 你注意到他有什么变化了吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 注意， 察觉； 通知， 布告
detailed_translations.english: when you notice or pay attention to someone or something

sentences.english: She had no notion what he meant.
sentences.chinese: 她根本不明白他是什么意思。

detailed_translations.chinese: 概念， 观念； 意图， 想法， 念头
detailed_translations.english: an idea, belief, or opinion

sentences.english: Protesters found a novel way of demonstrating against steeply rising oil prices.
sentences.chinese: 抗议者们找到一种新奇的示威方式来反对石油价格的飙升。

detailed_translations.english: not like anything known before, and unusual or interesting
a long written story in which the characters and events are usually imaginary

sentences.english: She's a widow now.
sentences.chinese: 她现在是一个寡妇。

sentences.english: But we are now a much more fragmented society.
sentences.chinese: 但是我们现在是一个更加四分五裂的社会。

detailed_translations.chinese: 现在， 如今； 此刻
detailed_translations.english: You use now to refer to the present time, often in contrast to a time in the past or the future

sentences.english: Nowadays people are rarely shocked by the sex they see on television.
sentences.chinese: 如今人们在电视上看见性爱镜头不太会感到吃惊了。

sentences.english: Most people nowadays are aware of the importance of a healthy diet.
sentences.chinese: 现在大多数人都明白健康饮食的重要性。

detailed_translations.english: now, compared with what happened in the past

sentences.english: Nowhere is drug abuse more of a problem than in the US.
sentences.chinese: 没有什么地方的吸毒问题比美国更严重。

detailed_translations.english: not in any place or to any place

sentences.chinese: 法国对核能的依赖

sentences.english: a nuclear power station
sentences.chinese: 核电站

sentences.english: They haven’t numbered the pages of the report.
sentences.chinese: 他们还未给报告编页码。

sentences.english: All the seats in the theatre are numbered.
sentences.chinese: 剧场里的所有座位都编了号。

sentences.chinese: 每张支票都是按连续的数字编号。

detailed_translations.english: to give a number to something that is part of an ordered set or list
a word or sign that represents an amount or a quantity

sentences.english: Numerous attempts have been made to hide the truth.
sentences.chinese: 为掩盖事实作了很多尝试。

sentences.english: The two leaders have worked together on numerous occasions.
sentences.chinese: 那两位领导人已经多次合作。

detailed_translations.english: many

sentences.english: The nurse is coming to give you an injection.
sentences.chinese: 护士会来给你打针。

sentences.english: The school nurse sent Sara home.
sentences.chinese: 学校的护士送萨拉回家。

sentences.english: a male nurse
sentences.chinese: 男护士

sentences.english: a senior nurse
sentences.chinese: 高级护士

sentences.english: a student nurse (= someone who is learning to be a nurse )
sentences.chinese: 实习护士

sentences.english: a psychiatric nurse (= a nurse for people who are mentally ill )

sentences.english: a community nurse
sentences.chinese: 社区护士

someone whose job is to look after people who are ill or injured, usually in a hospital

sentences.chinese: 松子

sentences.english: roasted nuts

sentences.chinese: 我们围坐在火炉边夹碎坚果。

sentences.english: Nutrition and exercise are essential to fitness and health.
sentences.chinese: 营养和运动是保持健康所必不可少的。

sentences.english: a nutrition expert

detailed_translations.english: the process of giving or getting the right type of food for good health and growth

sentences.chinese: 现在五点钟。

sentences.chinese: 现在几点了？两点了。

detailed_translations.english: used to indicate the hour of the day

sentences.chinese: 这小男孩不肯服从。

sentences.chinese: “坐下！”他说道，那只狗马上就服从了。

detailed_translations.english: to do what someone in authority tells you to do, or what a law or rule says you must do

sentences.chinese: 如果没人反对的话，我想请哈里森夫人出席。

sentences.chinese: 科学家已经观察到南极洲上方的臭氧浓度有所下降。

sentences.chinese: 这些状况已不复存在。

sentences.chinese: 她遇到过扎希德两次。

sentences.chinese: 请写明你的姓名、地址和职业。

sentences.chinese: 足球占去了我大部分的闲暇时间。

detailed_translations.english: if something occupies you or your time, you are busy doing it

sentences.chinese: 有三分之一的意外死亡发生在家里。

sentences.english: The explosion occurred at 5.30 a.m.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸发生在清晨5点30分。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发生， 出现， 存在； 被想起， 被想到

sentences.chinese: 她站在海滩上，凝视着大海。

sentences.chinese: 海水足够暖的时候，我喜欢在海里游泳。

sentences.chinese: 这话说得很奇怪。

sentences.english: the beauty of the scenery
sentences.chinese: 景色之美

sentences.english: the length of the swimming pool
sentences.chinese: 游泳池的长度

sentences.chinese: 他上了车，随即开车走了。

sentences.chinese: 突然他们拐出去停在一条岔路上。

sentences.chinese: 我们一离开主高速公路，旅途的感觉就更像是度假了。

sentences.chinese: 她丈夫到什么地方出差去了。

sentences.chinese: 他们要去意大利，想早点出发。

sentences.chinese: 本赛季熊队必须要加强进攻了。

sentences.chinese: 我不需要任何帮助，但是我谢谢你的好意。

detailed_translations.chinese: 提供， 提议； 报价， 开价
detailed_translations.english: a statement saying that you are willing to do something for someone or give them something

sentences.chinese: 该部门就在离白宫一英里远的地方有个办公楼。

sentences.chinese: 今天你去办公室了吗？

sentences.chinese: 对办公室空间日益增长的需求

detailed_translations.english: a building that belongs to a company or organization, with rooms where people can work at desks

sentences.chinese: 英国空军特种部队的一名指挥官

detailed_translations.chinese: 军官，警官；公务员，政府官员；船长
detailed_translations.english: someone who is in a position of authority in the army, navy etc

sentences.english: an official investigation into the causes of the explosion
sentences.chinese: 对此次爆炸事件原因的官方调查

sentences.english: the official policy on education
sentences.chinese: 官方的教育政策

sentences.chinese: 非法使用毒品的官方统计数据

sentences.chinese: 你必须先得到正式许可。

sentences.english: Finally the letter of appointment came, making it all official.
sentences.chinese: 任命书终于来了，这样一切都名正言顺了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 官员， 行政人员， 高级人员
detailed_translations.english: someone who is in a position of authority in an organization

sentences.english: She often works at the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 她周末经常要上班。

sentences.english: If you wash your hair too often, it can get too dry.
sentences.chinese: 如果洗头过勤，头发会变得干枯。

sentences.english: How often do you see your parents?
sentences.chinese: 你隔多久去看你父母？

sentences.english: Robin is a difficult child; you’ve said so yourself often enough (= a lot of times ).
sentences.chinese: 罗宾是个难管的孩子，你自己也常常这么说。

sentences.english: ‘Frances has left her husband, you know.’ ‘Oh, has she?’
sentences.chinese: “你知道，弗朗西丝跟她丈夫分开了。”“哦，真的吗？”

sentences.chinese: 哎呀，那我可不知道啊。

detailed_translations.chinese: 哦；哎呀(表示惊讶或恐惧等)

sentences.chinese: 自行车链条需要上油了。

detailed_translations.english: the thick dark liquid from under the ground from which petrol is produced

sentences.english: The plans have been okayed, so let’s get started as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 计划已经获得批准，所以我们尽快开始吧。

sentences.english: a pair of old shoes
sentences.chinese: 一双旧鞋

sentences.english: Some of the houses around here are very old.
sentences.chinese: 这里有些房子年代已经很久远了。

sentences.english: one of our oldest traditions
sentences.chinese: 我们最古老的传统之一

sentences.english: The car’s getting old now, and things are starting to go wrong with it.
sentences.chinese: 这辆汽车现在越来越旧，已经开始出毛病了。

sentences.english: That story’s as old as the hills (= extremely old ).
sentences.chinese: 那个故事非常古老。

detailed_translations.chinese: 老的， 年老的； 古老的， 陈旧的， 过时的； …岁的， …久的； 以前的， 过去
detailed_translations.english: something that is old has existed or been used for a long time

sentences.chinese: 奥林匹克运动会每四年举办一次。

sentences.english: She has won several Olympic medals in swimming.
sentences.chinese: 她在游泳比赛中赢得过几枚奥运奖牌。

sentences.english: The Olympic torch symbolizes peace and unity.
sentences.chinese: 奥林匹克圣火象征着和平与团结。

sentences.english: a cheese omelette
sentences.chinese: 奶酪煎蛋卷

detailed_translations.english: eggs mixed together and cooked in hot fat, sometimes with other foods added

sentences.english: I wanted to punch him on the nose.
sentences.chinese: 我真想一拳打到他鼻子上。

sentences.english: Matt kissed her on the cheek.
sentences.chinese: 马特亲吻了她的脸颊。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在…上； 向， 朝， 针对； 靠近…， 在…旁； 关于， 论及； 凭， 靠， 根据； 处
detailed_translations.english: used to say what part of someone or something is hit or touched

sentences.english: I’ve only met her once.
sentences.chinese: 我只见过她一面。

sentences.english: Paul’s been to Wexford once before.
sentences.chinese: 保罗曾去过韦克斯福德一次。

detailed_translations.english: on one occasion only
from the time when something happens

sentences.english: ‘Have you got a camera?’ ‘No.’ ‘You should buy one’ (= buy a camera ).
sentences.chinese: “你有照相机吗？”“没有。”“你应该买一架。”

sentences.english: The train was crowded so we decided to catch a later one (= catch a later train ).
sentences.chinese: 火车很挤，于是我们决定乘坐下一班。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一人， 一个； 一个人， 任何人
detailed_translations.english: used to mean someone or something of a type that has already been mentioned or is known about
the number 1

sentences.chinese: 他在踢足球时伤到了自己。

sentences.chinese: 她看着镜中的自己，欣赏她的新衣服。

sentences.chinese: 一个人应该总是把别人放在自己之前。

detailed_translations.english: referring to oneself

sentences.english: We need to chop up the onions for the soup.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要把洋葱切碎来做汤。

sentences.english: The chef seasoned the dish with finely chopped onions.
sentences.chinese: 厨师用切碎的洋葱为这道菜调味。

sentences.english: Raw onions can be quite spicy.
sentences.chinese: 生的洋葱相当辣。

detailed_translations.english: a bulbous plant with a strong smell and taste, used as a vegetable

sentences.english: I bought a book online yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 我昨天在网上买了一本书。

sentences.english: Many people work from home online these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今，许多人通过网络在家工作。

sentences.english: She learned how to cook online.
sentences.chinese: 她通过网络学会了如何做饭。

detailed_translations.english: existing or available on the internet

sentences.english: She is the only person who knows the truth.
sentences.chinese: 她是唯一知道真相的人。

sentences.english: We can only hope for the best.
sentences.chinese: 我们只能希望最好是。

sentences.english: This is the only way to solve the problem.
sentences.chinese: 这是解决问题的唯一方法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 仅仅； 只； 唯一地
detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that something is the single thing of its kind or the only one that exists or is possible
being the single one of its kind; unique

sentences.english: She carefully placed the vase onto the table.
sentences.chinese: 她小心地将花瓶放在桌子上。

sentences.english: The cat jumped onto the windowsill.
sentences.chinese: 猫跳到了窗台上。

sentences.english: He leaned onto the wall for support.
sentences.chinese: 他靠着墙以获得支撑。

detailed_translations.english: indicating movement to or placement upon a surface

sentences.english: Please open the window to let in some fresh air.
sentences.chinese: 请打开窗户，让一些新鲜空气进来。

sentences.english: She opened a new account at the bank.
sentences.chinese: 她在银行开了一个新账户。

sentences.english: The door didn't open; someone must have locked it from the inside.
sentences.chinese: 门没开；准是有人从里面锁了。

detailed_translations.english: to move a door, window, or cover so that it no longer covers a space
available to everyone; not secret

sentences.english: She has a passion for opera and attends performances whenever possible.
sentences.chinese: 她对歌剧充满热情，只要有可能就会去观看演出。

sentences.english: The grand opera house was filled with an excited audience.
sentences.chinese: 宏伟的歌剧院里坐满了兴奋的观众。

sentences.english: Beethoven's opera Fidelio is one of his most famous works.
sentences.chinese: 贝多芬的歌剧《费黛里奥》是他最著名的作品之一。

detailed_translations.english: a play in which singers perform musical parts with orchestral music, costumes, and scenery

sentences.english: The company operates globally, with offices in Europe, Asia, and North America.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司在全球运营，在欧洲、亚洲和北美设有办事处。

sentences.english: We need to operate within the budget constraints provided by the management.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要在管理层提供的预算限制内运营。

sentences.english: The surgeon will operate on the patient tomorrow morning.
sentences.chinese: 外科医生明天上午将为患者进行手术。

detailed_translations.chinese: 运转； 操作； 经营； 动手术
detailed_translations.english: to function or work in a particular way; to conduct or manage a business or system
to perform surgery on someone

sentences.english: In my opinion, this movie is excellent.
sentences.chinese: 在我看来，这部电影很出色。

sentences.english: What's your opinion on this matter?
sentences.chinese: 你对这件事有什么看法？

sentences.english: She expressed her strong opinion about the new policy.
sentences.chinese: 她对新政策表达了强烈的意见。

detailed_translations.english: a view or judgment formed about something, not necessarily based on fact or knowledge

sentences.english: Graf’s opponent in today’s final will be Sukova.
sentences.chinese: 格拉芙今天的决赛对手将是苏科娃。

sentences.english: He is admired even by his political opponents.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至受到政敌的钦佩。

detailed_translations.chinese: 对手， 敌手， 对抗者
detailed_translations.english: someone who you try to defeat in a competition, game, fight, or argument

sentences.english: There are fewer opportunities for new graduates this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年新毕业的大学生就业机会较少。

detailed_translations.english: a chance to do something or an occasion when it is easy for you to do something

sentences.english: Congress is continuing to oppose the President’s health care budget.
sentences.chinese: 国会继续反对总统的医疗保健预算。

detailed_translations.english: to disagree with something such as a plan or idea and try to prevent it from happening or succeeding

sentences.english: I thought the medicine would make him sleep, but it had the opposite effect.
sentences.chinese: 我以为这药会让他睡觉，但是它却起了反作用。

sentences.english: At the opposite extreme, Ashworth’s style is very simple and modern.
sentences.chinese: 截然相反的是，阿什沃思的风格非常简单和现代。

sentences.english: Bob was quicker than Ed? It’s usually the opposite way round.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃比埃德快？通常是反过来的。

detailed_translations.english: as different as possible from something else
a person or thing that is as different as possible from someone or something else

sentences.english: Andrew took a more optimistic view.
sentences.chinese: 安德鲁抱有更为乐观的想法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 乐观的， 乐观主义的
detailed_translations.english: believing that good things will happen in the future

sentences.english: There are a number of options available.
sentences.chinese: 有多种选择。

sentences.english: He had two options.
sentences.chinese: 他有两种选择。

sentences.english: This was not the only option open to him.
sentences.chinese: 这并非是他的唯一选择。

sentences.english: Teenage mothers often have no option but to (= have no other choice except to ) live with their parents.
sentences.chinese: 少女妈妈往往别无选择，只能与父母同住。

detailed_translations.chinese: 选择， 选择权， 选择自由； 选择的事物或人， 选课
detailed_translations.english: a choice you can make in a particular situation

sentences.english: Shall we go out to the cinema or stay at home?
sentences.chinese: 我们是出去看电影还是待在家里？

sentences.english: You can have ham, cheese, or tuna.
sentences.chinese: 你可以选择火腿、干酪或者金枪鱼。

sentences.english: She wasn’t involved in drugs or anything like that.
sentences.chinese: 她没有涉毒之类的行为。

sentences.english: Grapes are usually either green or red.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄一般要么是绿色，要么是红色。

sentences.english: He’s going to do it whether we like it or not.
sentences.chinese: 不管我们喜欢与否，他都会去做这件事。

sentences.english: You must do the job yourself or else employ someone else to do it.
sentences.chinese: 你必须自己做这件事，或者就雇别人去做。

detailed_translations.chinese: 或， 或者， 还是； 即， 或者说； 否则， 要不然
detailed_translations.english: used between two words or phrases to show that either of two things is possible, or used before the last in a list of possibilities or choices

sentences.english: oral history
sentences.chinese: 口述的历史

sentences.english: an oral agreement
sentences.chinese: 口头协议

detailed_translations.english: spoken, not written

sentences.english: I like the orange coat.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢这个橙色的外套。

sentences.english: How about the colour? Do you like orange?
sentences.chinese: 颜色怎么样？你喜欢橙色的吗？

detailed_translations.english: a round fruit that has a thick orange skin and is divided into parts inside

sentences.english: Mars and Earth have orbits which change with time.
sentences.chinese: 火星和地球的轨道随着时间而发生改变。

detailed_translations.english: the curved path travelled by an object which is moving around another much larger object such as the Earth, the Sun etc
to travel in a curved path around a much larger object such as the Earth, the Sun etc

sentences.english: There seemed to be no logical order to the sections.
sentences.chinese: 这几部分似乎没有逻辑顺序。

detailed_translations.chinese: 命令；顺序；规则；[贸易] 定单
detailed_translations.english: the way that things or events are arranged in relation to each other, so that one thing is first, another thing is second etc
to tell someone that they must do something, especially using your official power or authority

sentences.english: It’s just an ordinary camera.
sentences.chinese: 这只是普通的相机。

sentences.english: The book is about ordinary people.
sentences.chinese: 这本书描写的是普通人。

sentences.english: Art should be part of ordinary life.
sentences.chinese: 艺术应该是日常生活的一部分。

sentences.english: It is good because it is written in friendly, ordinary language.
sentences.chinese: 它很不错，因为它是用平易近人的日常语言写的。

detailed_translations.english: average, common, or usual, not different or special

sentences.english: the decision-making organs
sentences.chinese: 决策机关

detailed_translations.chinese: 器官； 机构； 管风琴； 新闻媒介
detailed_translations.english: an organization that is part of, or works for, a larger organization or group

sentences.english: Organic farming is better for the environment.
sentences.chinese: 有机耕作对环境更有利。

sentences.english: organic gardening
sentences.chinese: 有机园艺

detailed_translations.chinese: 有机体的， 有机物的
detailed_translations.english: relating to farming or gardening methods of growing food without using artificial chemicals, or produced or grown by these methods

sentences.english: The company is known for its efficient organisation.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司以其高效的组织而闻名。

sentences.english: Effective organisation is crucial for managing a large project.
sentences.chinese: 有效的组织对于管理一个大项目至关重要。

sentences.english: He has excellent organisational skills.
sentences.chinese: 他具有出色的组织能力。

detailed_translations.english: a group of people or things arranged for a particular purpose
the way in which something is organized or arranged
to arrange or plan something in a systematic way

sentences.english: She needs to organize the files on her computer.
sentences.chinese: 她需要整理电脑上的文件。

sentences.english: We are trying to organize a meeting to discuss the project.
sentences.chinese: 我们正试图组织一个会议来讨论这个项目。

sentences.english: He has a talent for organizing events.
sentences.chinese: 他很有组织活动的天赋。

sentences.english: The tradition has its origins in the Middle Ages.
sentences.chinese: 这一传统源于中世纪。

sentences.english: old folk tales of unknown origin
sentences.chinese: 起源不明的古老民间传说

detailed_translations.chinese: 起源， 起因； 出身， 血统
detailed_translations.english: the place or situation in which something begins to exist

sentences.english: They were just like any other young couple.
sentences.chinese: 他们那时就和其他任何年轻夫妇一样。

detailed_translations.chinese: 别的， 其他的， 另外的； 另一的， 其余的
detailed_translations.english: You use other to refer to an additional thing or person of the same type as one that has been mentioned or is known about

sentences.english: You’ll have to go now, otherwise you’ll miss your bus.
sentences.chinese: 你现在就得走，要不然就赶不上公共汽车了。

sentences.english: Put your coat on, otherwise you’ll get cold.
sentences.chinese: 穿上外套，不然你会着凉的。

detailed_translations.english: used when saying what bad thing will happen if something is not done

detailed_translations.chinese: 另外的；其他方面的；原本，本来

sentences.english: How do you like our schedule?
sentences.chinese: 您喜欢我们的日程安排吗?。

sentences.english: Nothing at all. And our convention?
sentences.chinese: 完全没有。我们的大会？

sentences.english: They all live in our life but far away from us.
sentences.chinese: 他们都生活在我们的生活中却又离我们很远。

sentences.english: I’ll show you to your room. Ours is next door.
sentences.chinese: 我带你去你的房间，我们的房间在你的隔壁。

sentences.english: The main difference between our brains and those of monkeys is that ours are bigger.
sentences.chinese: 我们的大脑和猴子的大脑之间的主要差别在于我们的要大些。

sentences.english: No, that’s not ours.
sentences.chinese: 不，那不是我们的。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to something that belongs to or is connected with us

sentences.english: We prepared ourselves for the long journey ahead.
sentences.chinese: 我们为将要开始的长途旅行做好了准备。

sentences.english: It was strange seeing ourselves on television.
sentences.chinese: 在电视上看到自己感觉很奇怪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 我们自己； 我们亲自
detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking to show that they and one or more other people are affected by their own action

sentences.english: She opened her suitcase and took out a pair of shoes.
sentences.chinese: 她打开手提箱，拿出一双鞋。

sentences.english: Lock the door on your way out.
sentences.chinese: 你出去时把门锁上。

sentences.english: Charlotte went to the window and looked out.
sentences.chinese: 夏洛特走到窗前往外看。

sentences.english: Out you go (= used to order someone to leave a room )!
sentences.chinese: 你给我出去！

detailed_translations.chinese: 出， 向外； 在外， 不在； 出
detailed_translations.english: from inside an object, container, building, or place

sentences.english: People who had heard the evidence at the trial were surprised at the outcome.
sentences.chinese: 在审判过程中听过证词的人都对此结果感到吃惊。

detailed_translations.english: the final result of a meeting, discussion, war etc – used especially when no one knows what it will be until it actually happens

sentences.english: Though with the widespread of the Internet, we can almost do everything at home, we have to enjoy our outdoor lives.
sentences.chinese: 虽然随着互联网的普及，我们在家几乎可以做所有的事情，但是我们得要欣赏我们的户外生活。

detailed_translations.english: existing, happening, or used outside, not inside a building

sentences.english: We’re looking for someone with an outgoing personality.
sentences.chinese: 我们在找一个性格外向的人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 外出的， 离开的； 即将离职的； 友好的， 好交际的； 外向的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is outgoing likes to meet and talk to new people

sentences.english: a research proposal outline
sentences.chinese: 研究计划梗概

detailed_translations.english: the main ideas or facts about something, without the details
to describe something in a general way, giving the main points but not the details

sentences.english: Output is up 30% on last year.
sentences.chinese: 产量比去年提高了30%。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of goods or work produced by a person, machine, factory etc
if a computer outputs information, it produces it

sentences.english: When we got up, it was still dark outside.
sentences.chinese: 我们起床时，外面天还没亮。

sentences.english: Go and play outside.
sentences.chinese: 到外面去玩。

detailed_translations.english: not inside a building
not inside a building

sentences.english: an outstanding example of a 13th-century castle
sentences.chinese: 13世纪城堡的杰出典范

sentences.english: an outstanding success
sentences.chinese: 了不起的成功

sentences.english: His performance was outstanding.
sentences.chinese: 他的表演相当出色。

detailed_translations.chinese: 杰出的； 明显的； 未解决的； 未偿付的
detailed_translations.english: extremely good

sentences.english: A lamp hung over the table.
sentences.chinese: 一盏灯悬挂在桌子上方。

sentences.english: She leaned over the desk to answer the phone.
sentences.chinese: 她身子探过桌面接电话。

sentences.english: The sign over the door said ‘Mind your head’.
sentences.chinese: 门上方的警示牌写着“小心碰头”。

sentences.english: We watched a helicopter flying low over the harbour.
sentences.chinese: 我们看着一架直升机在港口低空飞行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在…上方， 在…上面； 越过， 从一侧到另一侧； 高于， 超过； 在…期间；
detailed_translations.english: above or higher than something, without touching it

sentences.english: The overall cost of the exhibition was £400,000.
sentences.chinese: 展览会的全部费用是40万英镑。

sentences.english: The overall result is an increase in population.
sentences.chinese: 总的结果是人口增加。

sentences.english: An overall winner and a runner-up were chosen.
sentences.chinese: 总冠军和第二名被选了出来。

sentences.english: We don’t want all the details now, just the overall picture.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们不需要全部细节，只要知道大致的情况。

detailed_translations.chinese: 全面的， 总体的， 全部的
detailed_translations.english: considering or including everything

sentences.english: Australia overcame the Netherlands 2-1.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚队2比1战胜了荷兰队。

detailed_translations.chinese: 战胜， 克服； 压倒， 使受不了
detailed_translations.english: to fight and win against someone or something

sentences.english: Chris is going to work overseas.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯要去国外工作。

sentences.english: Most applications came from overseas.
sentences.chinese: 大部分申请来自海外。

detailed_translations.english: to or in a foreign country that is across the sea
coming from, existing in, or happening in a foreign country that is across the sea

sentences.english: He is slightly overweight.
sentences.chinese: 他略微超重。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is overweight is too heavy and fat

sentences.english: How much do I owe you (= often used to show that you want to pay for something )?
sentences.chinese: 我该付你多少钱？

detailed_translations.chinese: 欠； 应把…归功于； 感激， 感恩
detailed_translations.english: to be successful because of the good effect or influence of something or someone

sentences.english: Bring your own equipment.
sentences.chinese: 带上你自己的装备。

sentences.english: Every dance has its own rhythm.
sentences.chinese: 每一种舞蹈都有自己的节奏。

sentences.english: The yacht was intended for the King’s own personal use.
sentences.chinese: 这艘游艇是专供国王私用的。

sentences.english: His face was only a few inches from her own.
sentences.chinese: 他的脸离她自己的脸非常近。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that something belongs to or is connected with a particular person or thing and not any other
to have something which belongs to you, especially because you have bought it, been given it etc and it is legally yours

sentences.english: The human brain needs to be without oxygen for only four minutes before permanent damage occurs.
sentences.chinese: 人脑缺氧只需4分钟就会造成永久性损伤。

detailed_translations.english: a gas that has no colour or smell, is present in air, and is necessary for most animals and plants to live. It is a chemical element: symbol O

sentences.english: I found Mark at the hospital, pacing restlessly up and down .
sentences.chinese: 我看见马克在医院里焦躁不安地踱来踱去。

detailed_translations.english: to walk first in one direction and then in another many times, especially because you are nervous
the speed at which something happens or is done

sentences.english: I forgot to pack my razor.
sentences.chinese: 我忘记把剃须刀放入行李包了。

sentences.english: Have you finished packing yet?
sentences.chinese: 你行李收拾完了吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 捆扎， 打包； 挤在一起； 塞满
detailed_translations.english: to put things into cases, bags etc ready for a trip somewhere

sentences.english: There’s a package here for a Miami Lakes address.
sentences.chinese: 这里有一个寄往迈阿密湖的包裹。

detailed_translations.english: something wrapped in paper, packed in a box, and then sent by mail or delivered
to put food or other goods into a bag, box etc ready to be sold or sent

sentences.english: The full address is given on page 15.
sentences.chinese: 详细地址见第15页。

sentences.english: You will find the answers over the page .
sentences.chinese: 答案见下页。

sentences.english: a 400﹣page novel
sentences.chinese: 一本400页的小说

sentences.english: We took out a full page advertisement in the ‘Village Voice’.
sentences.chinese: 我们在《村声》上投放了一整版广告。

detailed_translations.english: one side of a piece of paper in a book, newspaper, document etc, or the sheet of paper itself

sentences.english: This public acknowledgment of Ted's disability pained my mother.
sentences.chinese: 特德残疾的公开使我母亲感到痛苦。

detailed_translations.english: If a fact or idea pains you, it makes you feel upset and disappointed
the feeling you have when part of your body hurts

sentences.english: The ceiling needs painting.
sentences.chinese: 天花板需要粉刷了。

sentences.english: brightly paintedhouses
sentences.chinese: 粉刷得很亮丽的房屋

sentences.english: The living room was painted in pastel shades of pink and blue.
sentences.chinese: 起居室被漆成淡雅的粉色和蓝色。

detailed_translations.chinese: 油漆；绘画；装饰；涂色于；描绘；(用语言，文字等)描写；擦脂粉等
detailed_translations.english: to put paint on a surface

detailed_translations.chinese: 油漆；颜料，涂料；绘画作品；胭脂等化妆品；色彩，装饰
detailed_translations.english: a liquid that you put on a surface, using a brush to make the surface a particular colour

sentences.english: The trainees will then be paired with experienced managers.
sentences.chinese: 这些实习生之后将被配给有经验的经理们。

detailed_translations.english: to put people or things into groups of two, or to form groups of two

detailed_translations.chinese: 一双，一对，一副；一对夫妇，一对情侣
detailed_translations.english: an object that is made from two similar parts that are joined together

sentences.english: He is a true pal who always supports me.
sentences.chinese: 他是我真正的朋友，总是支持我。

sentences.english: They've been pals since they were kids.
sentences.chinese: 他们从小就是好朋友。

sentences.english: I can always count on my pal for help.
sentences.chinese: 我总能指望我的朋友帮忙。

detailed_translations.english: a close friend
a relationship of close friendship

sentences.english: Buckingham Palace
sentences.chinese: 白金汉宫

detailed_translations.english: the official home of a person of very high rank, especially a king or queen – often used in names

sentences.english: The sky turned pale as the sun set.
sentences.chinese: 随着太阳落山，天空变得苍白。

sentences.english: Her face looked pale after the long journey.

sentences.chinese: 我百分之百同意你的看法。

sentences.chinese: 他的英语很地道。

sentences.chinese: 车尼尔和乐队明天将在银宫演出。

sentences.english: A recent poll found that 80% of Californians support the governor.

sentences.chinese: 他开始猛敲电脑键盘。

sentences.chinese: 把糖碾成粉末。

sentences.chinese: 他们在一场军事政变中夺取了政权。

sentences.chinese: 学习弹吉他需要长时间的练习。

sentences.chinese: 简受到了老师的表扬。

sentences.chinese: 他们去清真寺祷告。

sentences.english: Vets took precautions to prevent the spread of the disease.
sentences.chinese: 兽医们为防止疾病蔓延采取了预防措施。

sentences.english: planes delivering precious supplies of medicine and food
sentences.chinese: 运送药品、食品等宝贵物资的飞机

sentences.english: our planet’s precious resources

detailed_translations.english: something that is precious is valuable and important and should not be wasted or used without care

sentences.english: She answered the question precisely.
sentences.chinese: 她精确地回答了这个问题。

sentences.chinese: 测量结果精确无误。

detailed_translations.english: exactly; accurately; precisely

sentences.chinese: 销售额比预期低5%。

sentences.chinese: 正如利兹所预料的，流言很快就被淡忘了。

sentences.chinese: 这种猫头鹰更喜欢沙漠的生活环境。

sentences.chinese: 她更喜欢喝黑咖啡。

sentences.chinese: 政府倾向的选择

sentences.chinese: 员工们说他们希望有更具弹性的工作时间。

sentences.chinese: 女性在职场中仍然面临歧视。

sentences.english: He reacted angrily to the suggestion that he had lied.
sentences.chinese: 说他撒谎，他非常生气。

sentences.english: She reacted very badly (= was very upset ) when her parents split up.
sentences.chinese: 父母离婚的时候，她非常难过。

sentences.english: You have to react quickly to circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 你必须对形势迅速作出反应。

detailed_translations.english: to behave in a particular way or show a particular emotion because of something that has happened or been said

sentences.english: I can’t read your writing.
sentences.chinese: 我看不懂你写的东西。

sentences.english: She picked up the letter and read it.
sentences.chinese: 她拿起信读了起来。

sentences.english: Read the instructions carefully before you start.
sentences.chinese: 开始前要仔细阅读说明。

sentences.english: children who are just learning to read and write
sentences.chinese: 刚刚开始学习读和写的儿童

sentences.english: Her books are quite widely read (= read by a lot of people ) .
sentences.chinese: 她的书读者很多。

sentences.english: When I was young, I read every one of his books from cover to cover (= read all of something because you are very interested ) .
sentences.chinese: 我小时候，他的每一本书我都从头到尾一页不落地看过。

detailed_translations.chinese: [read-read]　读， 阅读； 朗读， 宣读； 读懂； 观
detailed_translations.english: to look at written words and understand what they mean

sentences.english: Come on. Aren’t you ready yet?
sentences.chinese: 快点，你还没准备好吗？

sentences.english: When the doorbell rang he was ready and waiting .
sentences.chinese: 门铃响的时候，他已经准备好在等着了。

sentences.english: Why does it take you so long to get ready to go out?
sentences.chinese: 你外出怎么要准备那么长时间？

detailed_translations.english: if you are ready, you are prepared for what you are going to do

sentences.english: Come on. Aren’t you ready yet?
sentences.chinese: 快点，你还没准备好吗？

sentences.english: When the doorbell rang he was ready and waiting .
sentences.chinese: 门铃响的时候，他已经准备好在等着了。

sentences.english: Why does it take you so long to get ready to go out?
sentences.chinese: 你外出怎么要准备那么长时间？

detailed_translations.english: if you are ready, you are prepared for what you are going to do

sentences.english: There is a real danger that the disease might spread.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病确实有蔓延的危险。

sentences.english: We need to tackle the real problems of unemployment and poverty.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要解决失业和贫穷这两个实际问题。

sentences.english: There is no real reason to worry.
sentences.chinese: 没有什么真正的理由需要担心。

detailed_translations.chinese: 真的， 真正的； 真实的， 现实的
detailed_translations.english: something that is real exists and is important

sentences.chinese: 这个目标能够实现吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 现实的； 现实主义的； 逼真的
detailed_translations.english: judging and dealing with situations in a practical way according to what is actually possible rather than what you would like to happen

sentences.english: As soon as we realized something was wrong, we moved the children away.
sentences.chinese: 我们一意识到出了问题，就立即把孩子们转移开了。

sentences.english: People don't realize how serious this recession has actually been.
sentences.chinese: 人们没有意识到这次经济衰退有多么严重。

detailed_translations.chinese: 认识到； 了解； 实现
detailed_translations.english: If you realize that something is true, you become aware of that fact or understand it

sentences.english: the ability to reason
sentences.chinese: 判断能力

detailed_translations.chinese: 推断， 分析； 推论， 推理； 理喻， 劝告
detailed_translations.english: to form a particular judgment about a situation after carefully considering the facts
why something happens, or why someone does something

sentences.english: You don’t happen to recall his name, do you?
sentences.chinese: 你不会恰巧还想得起他的名字吧？

sentences.english: As I recall, it was you who suggested this idea in the first place.
sentences.chinese: 我记得，是你首先提出这个想法的。

detailed_translations.english: to remember a particular fact, event, or situation from the past

sentences.english: All the children will receive a small gift.
sentences.chinese: 每个孩子都会收到一份小礼物。

sentences.english: Lee received 324 votes (= 324 people voted for him ) .
sentences.chinese: 李得到324票。

detailed_translations.chinese: 收到， 接到； 受到， 遭到； 接待； 接见； 欢迎
detailed_translations.english: to be given something

sentences.english: Irving’s most recent book
sentences.chinese: 欧文最新的书

sentences.english: recent research into the causes of cancer
sentences.chinese: 近来对致癌原因的研究

sentences.english: the recent past
sentences.chinese: 不久前

detailed_translations.english: having happened or started only a short time ago

sentences.chinese: 发生了这些事后，她对自己是否还受欢迎没把握。

sentences.english: The plans received a mixed reception from unions (= some people liked them, others did not ) .
sentences.chinese: 各工会对这些计划反响不一。

detailed_translations.english: a particular type of welcome for someone, or a particular type of reaction to their ideas, work etc

sentences.english: a recipe book
sentences.chinese: 一本烹饪书

detailed_translations.english: a set of instructions for cooking a particular type of food

sentences.english: She recited a poem that she had learnt at school.
sentences.chinese: 她背诵了一首学校里学的诗。

sentences.english: We need to recognise the efforts made by the team.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要认识到团队付出的努力。

sentences.english: She recognised him from a distance.
sentences.chinese: 她从远处认出了他。

sentences.chinese: 认识到 burnout 的迹象非常重要。

sentences.chinese: 医生极力建议孩子出生时父亲应该在场。

sentences.chinese: 这种情况下不建议使用安眠药。

sentences.english: It is dangerous to exceed the recommended dose .
sentences.chinese: 超过建议剂量很危险。

sentences.english: According to official records, five people were killed last year near that road junction.
sentences.chinese: 据官方记录，去年有五人在那个路口附近丧生。

detailed_translations.english: information about something that is written down or stored on computer, film etc so that it can be looked at in the future

sentences.english: Four paintings stolen from the gallery have been recovered.
sentences.chinese: 美术馆的四幅被盗画作已经失而复得。

sentences.english: His only recreations are drinking beer and watching football.
sentences.chinese: 他唯一的消遣就是喝啤酒和看足球比赛。

sentences.english: the provision of recreation facilities
sentences.chinese: 提供娱乐设施

detailed_translations.english: an activity that you do for pleasure or amusement

sentences.english: We take all our bottles to be recycled.
sentences.chinese: 我们把我们所有的瓶子都回收利用。

sentences.english: packaging made of recycled paper
sentences.chinese: 再生纸包装材料

detailed_translations.english: to put used objects or materials through a special process so that they can be used again

sentences.english: We painted the door bright red .
sentences.chinese: 我们把门漆成鲜红色。

sentences.english: a red balloon
sentences.chinese: 一个红气球

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of blood
the colour of blood

sentences.chinese: 州长宣布了一项降低犯罪率的新计划。

sentences.english: The helmet law should reduce injuries in motorcycle accidents.
sentences.chinese: 头盔法的实施应该能减少摩托车事故的受伤率。

sentences.english: Small businesses will need to reduce costs in order to survive.
sentences.chinese: 小企业要想生存必须削减成本。

sentences.chinese: 在他的讲话中，他提到了最近的加拿大之行。

sentences.chinese: 消费支出的下降反映出人们对经济的担忧。

sentences.chinese: 彻底改革税收制度的计划

sentences.chinese: 洗个淋浴你就凉快了。

sentences.chinese: 他们拒绝给我退款。

sentences.chinese: 14 天之内退货可以全额退款。

sentences.chinese: 你应该到那里去，要求退款。

sentences.chinese: 她叫他走，但他不肯。

sentences.chinese: 他愿意给那么多钱，我怎么可能拒绝呢？

sentences.chinese: 她退后站着，冷冷地看着他。

detailed_translations.english: to think about someone or something in a particular way

sentences.chinese: 尽管她最近动了手术，她却一直在不顾一切地继续工作。

sentences.english: efforts to bring peace to the region
sentences.chinese: 给这个地区带来和平的努力

detailed_translations.chinese: 地区， 地带， 区域； 范围， 幅度

sentences.chinese: 这艘油轮是在鹿特丹登记的。

sentences.english: Don’t do anything you might regret.
sentences.chinese: 不要做自己会后悔的事。

sentences.chinese: 公司定期召集雇员开会。

sentences.chinese: 他的呼吸缓慢而均匀。

sentences.chinese: 火车从上午11点到下午4点每隔一定时间开行。

sentences.chinese: 我们定期收到他的来信。

sentences.chinese: 固定的工作

detailed_translations.english: happening every hour, every week, every month etc, usually with the same amount of time in between

sentences.english: There seem to be so many rules and regulations these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今好像条条框框很多。

sentences.chinese: 萨拉拒绝了她弟弟的帮助。

sentences.english: Dexter flatly rejected (= completely rejected ) calls for his resignation.
sentences.chinese: 德克斯特断然拒绝让他辞职的要求。

sentences.english: His proposal was rejected outright (= completely rejected ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的建议被彻底否决了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拒绝； 拒纳， 退回

sentences.chinese: 我不明白这两个观点有什么联系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有关， 涉及； 符合； 相处

if two things relate, they are connected in some way

sentences.chinese: 两种方法的相对优点都得考虑在内。

sentences.english: her opponent’s relative lack of experience
sentences.chinese: 她的对手相对来说缺少经验

sentences.chinese: 你可能认为自己很穷，但一切都是相对的。

detailed_translations.english: having a particular quality when compared with something else

sentences.chinese: 我只想坐下来休息一下。

sentences.english: What Robyn needed was a drink to relax her.
sentences.chinese: 萝宾需要的是喝一杯放松放松。

sentences.chinese: 洗个热水澡可以帮助你放松下来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 放松， 松弛； 放宽， 缓和
detailed_translations.english: to rest or do something that is enjoyable, especially after you have been working

sentences.english: the 100 metres relay
sentences.chinese: 一百米接力赛

detailed_translations.english: a relay race

detailed_translations.chinese: 传送， 传达， 转述； 中继转播
detailed_translations.english: to pass a message from one person or place to another

sentences.english: Police arrested several men, who were later released.
sentences.chinese: 警察逮捕了几个人，后来都释放了。

sentences.english: The bears are eventually released into the wild.
sentences.chinese: 这些熊最后被放回野生环境中。

detailed_translations.chinese: 释放， 排放； 解除， 解脱； 放开， 松开； 发布； 发行
detailed_translations.english: to let someone go free, after having kept them somewhere

sentences.english: Relevant documents were presented in court.
sentences.chinese: 法庭上出示了相关的文件。

sentences.english: We received all the relevant information.
sentences.chinese: 我们收到了所有相关信息。

detailed_translations.english: directly relating to the subject or problem being discussed or considered

sentences.english: I felt a huge surge of relief and happiness.
sentences.chinese: 我如释重负，大感欣慰。

sentences.english: No one was hurt, and we all breathed a sigh of relief .
sentences.chinese: 没有人受伤，我们都松了一口气。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of comfort when something frightening, worrying, or painful has ended or has not happened

sentences.english: I don’t share her religious beliefs .
sentences.chinese: 她的宗教信仰和我的不同。

sentences.english: a religious school
sentences.chinese: 宗教学校

sentences.english: the dates of major religious observances such as Easter or Christmas
sentences.chinese: 复活节和圣诞节等重要宗教节日的日期

detailed_translations.chinese: 宗教的； 笃信宗教的， 虔诚的
detailed_translations.english: relating to religion in general or to a particular religion

sentences.english: They relied heavily on the advice of their professional advisers.
sentences.chinese: 他们非常依赖专业顾问的建议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 依靠， 依赖； 信赖， 指望
detailed_translations.english: If you rely on someone or something, you need them and depend on them in order to live or work properly

sentences.english: Please remain seated until all the lights are on.
sentences.chinese: 请留在座位上，直到灯全都亮起。

sentences.english: We remained friends.
sentences.chinese: 我们依然是朋友。

sentences.english: The boy remained silent .
sentences.chinese: 男孩依然默不作声。

detailed_translations.chinese: 仍然是， 依旧是； 留下， 逗留； 剩余， 余留； 留待
detailed_translations.english: to continue to be in the same state or condition

sentences.english: She has made remarkable progress.
sentences.chinese: 她取得了显著的进步。

sentences.english: a remarkable coincidence
sentences.chinese: 不寻常的巧合

sentences.english: He’s a remarkable man .
sentences.chinese: 他是个了不起的人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 值得注意的， 引人注目的； 异常的， 非凡的
detailed_translations.english: unusual or surprising and therefore deserving attention or praise

sentences.english: Do you remember Rosa Davies?
sentences.chinese: 你记得罗莎·戴维斯吗？

sentences.english: I can’t remember her exact words.
sentences.chinese: 我记不得她的原话了。

sentences.english: I remember it well ; I’d never seen my mother so angry.
sentences.chinese: 这件事我记得很清楚；我从未见过母亲这么生气。

sentences.english: She clearly remembers the excitement as they boarded the train.
sentences.chinese: 她清楚地记得他们登上火车时的激动心情。

sentences.english: I vaguely remember reading something about it in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 我隐约记得在报纸上看到过有关情况。

sentences.english: They had three children, if I remember rightly .
sentences.chinese: 如果我没记错，他们有三个孩子。

sentences.english: They’ve lived here for as long as I can remember .
sentences.chinese: 在我记忆中他们一直都住在这儿。

sentences.english: No one got drunk as far as I can remember .
sentences.chinese: 我记得当时没有人喝醉酒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 记得， 记住； 缅怀； 代…问候
detailed_translations.english: to have a picture or idea in your mind of people, events, places etc from the past

sentences.english: Yes, I’ll be there. Thanks for reminding me.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我会去那里的。 谢谢提醒。

sentences.english: He made a few notes to remind himself of what he wanted to say.
sentences.chinese: 他记了几条，提醒自己要说些什么。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone remember something that they must do

sentences.english: a remote border town
sentences.chinese: 一个偏远的边境小镇

sentences.english: a fire in a remote mountain area
sentences.chinese: 偏远山区的火灾

detailed_translations.chinese: 遥远的； 偏僻的； 关系疏远的； 脱离的； 微乎其微的； 孤高的， 冷淡的； 遥控的
detailed_translations.english: far from towns or other places where people live

sentences.english: Remove the old wallpaper and fill any holes in the walls.
sentences.chinese: 撕下旧墙纸，把墙上的洞都填平。

detailed_translations.english: to force someone out of an important position or dismiss them from a job
a distance or amount by which two things are separated

sentences.english: Most students rent rooms in their second year.

detailed_translations.english: containing a lot of something

sentences.chinese: 他骑着一匹灰色的大母马。

sentences.chinese: 两大党之间已经出现了深刻的政治分歧。

sentences.chinese: 我认为你作出了正确的决定。

sentences.chinese: 面对日益增多的汽车罪案，警方似乎无能为力。

detailed_translations.english: to increase in number, amount, or value

sentences.chinese: 小孩子学抽烟的时候并没有意识到这是在拿自己的健康去冒险。

detailed_translations.chinese: 树荫；阴影；阴凉处；遮阳物；(照片等的)明暗度；少量、些微；细微的差别
detailed_translations.english: slight darkness or shelter from the direct light of the sun made by something blocking it

detailed_translations.chinese: 使阴暗；使渐变；为…遮阳；使阴郁；掩盖
detailed_translations.english: to protect something from direct light

sentences.english: the long dark shadow of an old oak tree
sentences.chinese: 一棵老橡树长长的影子

detailed_translations.chinese: 阴影；影子；幽灵；庇护；隐蔽处
detailed_translations.english: the dark shape that someone or something makes on a surface when they are between that surface and the light
to follow someone closely in order to watch what they are doing
the group of politicians in the British parliament who would become ministers if their party was in government

sentences.english: She shook him to wake him up.
sentences.chinese: 她摇摇他，想把他叫醒。

sentences.english: Shake the bottle before you open it.
sentences.chinese: 打开瓶子之前先摇一摇。

sentences.english: The whole house started to shake.
sentences.chinese: 整幢房子摇晃起来。

sentences.english: The car shook as it went over a bump.
sentences.chinese: 汽车驶过一个隆起的地方时颠了一下。

detailed_translations.chinese: [shook-shaken] 摇动， 摇； 颤抖， 震动
detailed_translations.english: to move suddenly from side to side or up and down, usually with a lot of force, or to make something or someone do this

sentences.english: The truth shall make you free.
sentences.chinese: 真理必令你们得自由。

sentences.english: I said you could go, and so you shall.
sentences.chinese: 我说了你可以去，你就一定可以去。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that something will definitely happen, or that you are determined that something should happen

sentences.english: a shallow river
sentences.chinese: 浅河

sentences.english: The lake is quite shallow.
sentences.chinese: 这湖很浅。

sentences.english: the shallow end of the pool
sentences.chinese: 游泳池的浅水区

sentences.english: Place the meat in a shallow dish.
sentences.chinese: 把肉放在一个浅盘里。

detailed_translations.english: measuring only a short distance from the top to the bottom

sentences.english: She had shamed her family name (= done something that made her family lose honour ) .
sentences.chinese: 她玷污了家族的名声。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel they have lost all honour and respect

detailed_translations.chinese: 羞耻，羞愧；可耻的人；遗憾的事，可惜
detailed_translations.english: used when you wish a situation was different, and you feel sad or disappointed

sentences.english: What kind of shampoo do you use?
sentences.chinese: 你用的是哪种洗发水？

sentences.english: a bottle of shampoo
sentences.chinese: 一瓶香波

detailed_translations.english: a liquid soap for washing your hair
to wash something with shampoo

sentences.english: What shape is the table?
sentences.chinese: 那张桌子是什么形状的？

sentences.english: You can recognize a tree by the shape of its leaves.
sentences.chinese: 可以根据树叶的形状辨认出是什么树。

sentences.english: His battered old hat had completely lost its shape.
sentences.chinese: 他那顶破旧的帽子已经完全变形了。

sentences.english: The plants grow in every shape and size .
sentences.chinese: 这些植物有各种形状，各种大小。

sentences.english: The children cut out shapes (= squares, triangles etc ) from the piece of cardboard.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们把卡纸片剪成各种形状。

detailed_translations.chinese: 形状， 体形； 幻象； 状况， 状态
detailed_translations.english: the form that something has, for example round, square,  triangular  etc

sentences.english: As a kid he’d never share his toys.
sentences.chinese: 他小时候从不肯与人分享他的玩具。

detailed_translations.english: to let someone have or use something that belongs to you

detailed_translations.chinese: 一份； 份儿， 股份
detailed_translations.english: one of the equal parts into which the  ownership  of a company is divided

sentences.english: Sharks were circling around our boat.
sentences.chinese: 鲨鱼在我们的小船周围游弋。

detailed_translations.chinese: 鲨鱼； 勒索者， 诈骗者； 放高利贷的人
detailed_translations.english: a large sea fish with several rows of very sharp teeth that is considered to be dangerous to humans

sentences.english: Make sure you use a good sharp knife.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要用锋利的好刀。

sentences.english: Its teeth are razor sharp (= very sharp ) .
sentences.chinese: 它的牙齿非常锋利。

sentences.english: Do not cross the bridge but turn sharp left to go down on to the towpath.
sentences.chinese: 不要过桥，而是向左急转下到纤道上去。

detailed_translations.chinese: 急剧的；锋利的；强烈的；敏捷的；刺耳的
detailed_translations.english: having a very thin edge or point that can cut things easily
Sharp is also an adverb

sentences.english: He hadn’t shaved for days.
sentences.chinese: 他已经好几天没刮脸了。

sentences.english: Brian had cut himself shaving .
sentences.chinese: 布赖恩刮胡子时割破了脸。

detailed_translations.english: to cut off hair very close to the skin, especially from the face, using a  razor
if a man has a shave, he cuts off the hair on his face close to his skin using a  razor

sentences.english: You could always ask Beth – she’s got plenty of money.
sentences.chinese: 你总是可以去问贝丝——她有很多钱。

sentences.english: I saw you talking to that girl. Who is she?
sentences.chinese: 我看见你和那个女孩子说话。 她是谁？

sentences.english: What did she say when you told her?
sentences.chinese: 你告诉她时她怎么说？

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about

sentences.english: Sheep were grazing on the hillside.
sentences.chinese: 羊群在山坡上吃草。

sentences.english: a sheep farmer
sentences.chinese: 养羊的农民

detailed_translations.english: a farm animal that is kept for its wool and its meat

sentences.english: I’ll go and find you some clean sheets and blankets.
sentences.chinese: 我去给你们找些干净的床单和毯子。

sentences.english: white cotton sheets
sentences.chinese: 白色的棉布床单

detailed_translations.english: a large piece of thin cloth that you put on a bed to lie on or lie under

detailed_translations.chinese: 覆盖；盖上被单；使成大片

sentences.english: shelves of books
sentences.chinese: 一层层书架的书

sentences.english: supermarket shelves
sentences.chinese: 超级市场的货架

sentences.english: the amount of shelf space available
sentences.chinese: 可用的货架空间

detailed_translations.english: a long flat narrow board attached to a wall or in a frame or cupboard, used for putting things on

sentences.english: The men took shelter in a bombed-out farmhouse.
sentences.chinese: 那些男人躲在一间被炸毁的农舍里。

sentences.english: All around me, people were running for shelter .
sentences.chinese: 我周围的人都在奔跑着寻找地方躲避。

detailed_translations.chinese: 掩蔽处，躲避处；住所；掩蔽，保护
detailed_translations.english: protection from danger or from wind, rain, hot sun etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 掩蔽， 庇护； 躲避
detailed_translations.english: to stay in or under a place where you are protected from the weather or from danger

sentences.english: He stopped, shifting his cane to his left hand.
sentences.chinese: 他停下来，把手杖移到左手。

detailed_translations.english: to change a situation, discussion etc by giving special attention to one idea or subject instead of to a previous one

detailed_translations.chinese: 转换， 转变； 轮班
detailed_translations.english: a change in the way people think about something, in the way something is done etc

sentences.english: The sun was shining .
sentences.chinese: 阳光照耀。

sentences.english: The moon shone brightly in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 皓月当空。

detailed_translations.chinese: 照耀；发光，发亮；干得出色
detailed_translations.english: to produce bright light
the brightness that something has when light shines on it

sentences.english: We'll ship your order to the address we print on your cheques.
sentences.chinese: 我们将把你预订的货物送到我们印在你单据上的地址。

detailed_translations.chinese: 用船运； 装运， 运送
detailed_translations.english: to send goods somewhere by ship, plane, truck etc
a large boat used for carrying people or goods across the sea

sentences.english: I have to wear a shirt and tie to work.
sentences.chinese: 我上班要穿衬衫打领带。

sentences.english: a check shirt
sentences.chinese: 格子衬衫

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that covers the upper part of your body and your arms, usually has a collar, and is fastened at the front by buttons

sentences.english: She was shaking with shock and humiliation.
sentences.chinese: 她又是震惊，又是羞辱，身体直发抖。

detailed_translations.chinese: 震动， 冲击； 震惊， 惊愕； 电震， 电击， 触电
detailed_translations.english: the feeling of surprise and disbelief you have when something very unexpected happens, especially something bad or frightening

sentences.english: I sat down and took off my shoes and socks.
sentences.chinese: 我坐下来脱掉鞋子和袜子。

sentences.english: What size shoes do you take?
sentences.chinese: 你穿几号的鞋子？

detailed_translations.english: something that you wear to cover your feet, made of leather or some other strong material

sentences.english: Police shot one suspect when he pulled a gun on them.
sentences.chinese: 警方在一名嫌疑人拔枪指着他们时击毙了他。

sentences.english: Smith killed his wife, and then shot himself.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯杀死妻子，然后开枪自杀。

sentences.english: A woman was shot dead in an attempted robbery.
sentences.chinese: 一名女子在一桩未遂抢劫案中中枪身亡。

sentences.english: The guards have orders to shoot intruders on sight (= shoot them as soon as they see them ) .
sentences.chinese: 卫兵们奉命一见到有人闯入就开枪。

detailed_translations.chinese: [shot-shot] 发射， 射击； 投， 射门， 投篮； 拍摄； 射杀， 射伤； 发芽
detailed_translations.english: to deliberately kill or injure someone using a gun

sentences.english: a barber’s shop
sentences.chinese: 理发店

sentences.english: a fish-and-chip shop
sentences.chinese: 炸鱼薯条店

sentences.english: the local shops
sentences.chinese: 当地的商店

sentences.english: Shirley saw her reflection in the shop window.
sentences.chinese: 雪莉在商店橱窗里看到了自己的影像。

sentences.english: I’m just going down to the shops .
sentences.chinese: 我正要去商店。

detailed_translations.chinese: 商店， 店铺； 工厂， 车间
detailed_translations.english: a building or part of a building where you can buy things, food, or services

sentences.english: We could see a boat about a mile from shore.
sentences.chinese: 我们看见离岸边大约一英里的地方有一艘船。

sentences.english: Only a few survivors reached the shore.
sentences.chinese: 仅有几个生还者到达岸边。

sentences.english: She began to swim to shore.
sentences.chinese: 她开始朝岸边游去。

detailed_translations.chinese: 支撑，使稳住；用支柱撑住
detailed_translations.english: to prop or make safe with or as if with a shore
the land along the edge of a large area of water such as an ocean or lake

sentences.english: Seeing her tears, he stopped short.
sentences.chinese: 看到她在流泪，他吃惊地停了下来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 简短地； 突然地， 唐突地
detailed_translations.english: to suddenly stop speaking or stop what you are doing, because something has surprised you or you have just thought of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 短的，矮的；简短的；短缺的，不足的
detailed_translations.english: happening or continuing for only a little time or for less time than usual

sentences.english: What should I do? Should I trust him?
sentences.chinese: 我该怎么办？我应该相信他吗？

sentences.english: You should read his new book.
sentences.chinese: 你应该读一读他的新书。

sentences.english: I should stay in bed if I were you .
sentences.chinese: 我要是你，就卧床休息。

detailed_translations.chinese: 应当，应该 〔用于提供或征求建议〕
detailed_translations.english: used to give or ask for advice

sentences.english: The residents are being asked to shoulder the costs of the repairs.
sentences.chinese: 居民们被要求承担这笔修理费用。

detailed_translations.english: to accept a difficult or unpleasant responsibility, duty etc
one of the two parts of the body at each side of the neck where the arm is connected

sentences.english: There’s no need to shout! I can hear you!
sentences.chinese: 用不着大声喊叫！我听得见！

sentences.english: ‘Watch out!’she shouted, as the car started to move.
sentences.chinese: “小心！”汽车开动时，她大声喊道。

detailed_translations.english: to say something very loudly
a loud call expressing anger, pain, excitement etc

sentences.english: Figures showed a 9% rise in inflation.
sentences.chinese: 数据显示通货膨胀上升了9%。

sentences.english: Gary has shown his faith in the club’s future by agreeing to stay on.
sentences.chinese: 加里同意留下，表明了他对这家俱乐部的未来有信心。

sentences.english: The new treatment has been shown to reduce the number of deaths.
sentences.chinese: 这种新疗法被证明可以减少死亡人数。

sentences.english: The Polish economy began to show signs of recovery.
sentences.chinese: 波兰的经济开始出现复苏的迹象。

sentences.english: It just goes to show (= proves ) how much people judge each other on how they look.
sentences.chinese: 这恰恰证明人们相互之间经常就是以貌取人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 表明， 证明； 显示， 出示； 带领； 教， 告知； 演出， 放映； 显现，
detailed_translations.english: to provide facts or information that make it clear that something is true, that something exists, or that something has happened

sentences.english: Mike shaved and showered.
sentences.chinese: 迈克刮了脸，冲了个淋浴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 洗淋浴； 洒落； 纷纷降落
detailed_translations.english: to wash your whole body while standing under a shower
a piece of equipment that you stand under to wash your whole body

sentences.english: Shut the window, Ellen!
sentences.chinese: 埃伦，把窗关上！

sentences.english: I heard his bedroom door shut.
sentences.chinese: 我听到他的卧室门关上了。

sentences.english: She lay down on her bed and shut her eyes .
sentences.chinese: 她在床上躺下，闭上眼睛。

sentences.english: He shut the drawer and turned the key.
sentences.chinese: 他关上抽屉，转动了钥匙。

detailed_translations.chinese: [shut-shut, shutting]　关闭， 关上； 打烊
detailed_translations.english: to close something, or to become closed

sentences.english: He was a quiet shy man.
sentences.chinese: 他是个话不多、害羞的男人。

sentences.english: a shy smile
sentences.chinese: 羞怯的微笑

sentences.english: As a teenager, I was painfully shy (= extremely shy ) .
sentences.chinese: 我十几岁时害羞得很。

detailed_translations.chinese: 腼腆的， 害羞的； 胆怯的； 有戒心的， 畏缩的
detailed_translations.english: nervous and embarrassed about meeting and speaking to other people, especially people you do not know

sentences.english: His mother’s very sick.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲病得很重。

sentences.english: Maria can’t come in today because she’s sick.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚因为生病今天不能来了。

sentences.english: a sick child
sentences.chinese: 生病的孩子

sentences.english: a sick animal
sentences.chinese: 患病的动物

sentences.english: What will happen to the business if you fall sick (= become ill ) or die?
sentences.chinese: 假如你生病或是去世了，公司怎么办？

sentences.english: He took sick (= became ill ) and died a week later.
sentences.chinese: 他病倒后一周就去世了。

sentences.english: Pete’s at home in bed, sick as a dog (= very sick ) .
sentences.chinese: 皮特卧床在家，病得很重。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有病的， 患病的； 恶心的， 想吐的； 厌恶的； 心烦意乱的， 恼火的
detailed_translations.english: suffering from a disease or illness

sentences.english: Fuel is cheaper on the French side of the border.
sentences.chinese: 燃料在边境那边的法国要便宜些。

sentences.english: A man stood watching me from the other side of the road.
sentences.chinese: 有个男人站在马路的对面看着我。

sentences.english: His friends and family were all on the other side of the world.
sentences.chinese: 他的朋友和家人都在地球的另一边。

sentences.english: The restaurant was empty apart from another couple on the far side of the room (= the area that is furthest away from you ) .
sentences.chinese: 饭店里空空的，只有最那边还有一对夫妇。

detailed_translations.chinese: 面， 侧面， 旁边； 方面； 一方， 一边； 山坡， 坡， 岸
detailed_translations.english: one of the two areas that are on the left or the right of an imaginary line, or on the left or the right of a border, wall, river etc

sentences.english: I like to walk along the sidewalk while listening to music.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢一边听音乐一边沿着人行道散步。

sentences.english: Please keep off the sidewalk; it's for pedestrians.
sentences.chinese: 请勿践踏人行道，那是行人的通道。

detailed_translations.english: a path for pedestrians alongside a road

sentences.english: Anne’s sight is very good for someone of her age.
sentences.chinese: 安妮的视力对于她这个年龄的人来说算是非常好的。

sentences.english: He began to lose his sight six years ago.
sentences.chinese: 六年前他开始视力衰退。

sentences.english: an emergency operation to save his sight
sentences.chinese: 挽救他视力的紧急手术

sentences.english: You will get a free sight test if you are under 16.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不满16岁，可以免费检查视力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 视力，视觉；看见，瞥见；视域，眼界；情景，景象，奇观；
detailed_translations.english: the physical ability to see

sentences.english: She swam and sunbathed, went sightseeing and relaxed.
sentences.chinese: 她游泳，晒日光浴，观光，放松。

detailed_translations.english: when you visit famous or interesting places, especially as tourists

sentences.english: Sign here, please.
sentences.chinese: 请在这里签字。

sentences.english: The artist had signed his name in the corner of the painting.
sentences.chinese: 画家在画的角上落了款。

sentences.english: You forgot to sign the cheque .
sentences.chinese: 你忘记在支票上签名了。

sentences.english: Over a hundred people have sign ed the petition .
sentences.chinese: 已有一百多人在请愿书上签了名。

sentences.english: Serena sign s her autograph every time she’s asked.
sentences.chinese: 每次有人请塞雷娜签名她都会签。

sentences.english: a signed photo of Paul McCartney
sentences.chinese: 一张保罗·麦卡特尼的签名照片

detailed_translations.english: to write your  signature  on something to show that you wrote it, agree with it, or were present

detailed_translations.chinese: 标志，符号；招牌；征兆，迹象
detailed_translations.english: an event, fact etc that shows that something is happening or that something is true or exists

sentences.english: He pressed the red alarm signal to see if it was on or off.
sentences.chinese: 他按了一下红色报警信号钮，检查一下它是开著的还是关著的。

detailed_translations.english: important
a sound or action that you make in order to give information to someone or tell them to do something
to make a sound or action in order to give information or tell someone to do something

sentences.english: Her signature is totally illegible (= cannot be read ) .
sentences.chinese: 她的签字完全无法辨认。

sentences.english: The school collected 4,000 signatures for the petition.
sentences.chinese: 学校为这份请愿书收集到了四千个签名。

sentences.english: The Ukrainians put their signatures to the Lisbon Protocol.
sentences.chinese: 乌克兰签署了《里斯本协议》。

sentences.english: Someone’s forged my signature (= made an illegal copy of my name to deceive people ) on this letter.
sentences.chinese: 有人在这封信中伪造了我的签名。

sentences.english: Each child must obtain the signature of his or her parents.
sentences.chinese: 每个小孩都必须得到父母的签字。

detailed_translations.chinese: 署名， 签字， 签名
detailed_translations.english: your name written in the way you usually write it, for example at the end of a letter, or on a cheque etc, to show that you have written it

sentences.english: His most significant political achievement was the abolition of the death penalty.
sentences.chinese: 他政治上最重大的成就是废除了死刑。

sentences.english: Please inform us if there are any significant changes in your plans.
sentences.chinese: 你们的计划如有重大变动，请通知我们。

detailed_translations.chinese: 相当数量的； 重要的， 意义重大的， 意味深长的
detailed_translations.english: having an important effect or influence, especially on what will happen in the future

sentences.english: The large house was silent and lonely.
sentences.chinese: 这幢大房子寂静荒凉。

sentences.english: At last the guns fell silent .
sentences.chinese: 枪声终于沉寂了下来。

sentences.english: Julie offered up a silent prayer that she would pass her exam.
sentences.chinese: 朱莉默默地祈祷，希望能通过这次考试。

detailed_translations.chinese: 寂静的； 沉默的； 无声的， 不发出声音的
detailed_translations.english: without any sound, or not making any sound

sentences.english: pure silk stockings
sentences.chinese: 生丝面料的漂亮连衣裙

detailed_translations.english: a thin smooth soft cloth made from very thin thread which is produced by a silkworm

sentences.english: Stop asking silly questions.
sentences.chinese: 别再问傻问题了。

sentences.english: You made a lot of silly mistakes .
sentences.chinese: 你犯了许多愚蠢的错误。

sentences.english: The farmhouse appeared, silvered by the moon.
sentences.chinese: 农舍出现了，在月光下泛着银光。

sentences.chinese: 约六千人被逮捕，不过他们中有几百人后来被释放了。

sentences.chinese: 他有长头发.他有一黑色溜冰板.他是谁？

sentences.chinese: 我决定跳过第一章。

sentences.chinese: 用肥皂和水彻底洗一洗。

sentences.english: a bar of soap
sentences.chinese: 一块肥皂

detailed_translations.english: the substance that you use to wash your body

sentences.english: Shall we play soccer?
sentences.chinese: 我们踢足球好吗？

sentences.chinese: 球队队长轮流制--所有的年轻足球运动员都想有一天能成为队长。

sentences.chinese: 但是现在我的爱好是体育，比如足球和游泳。

sentences.chinese: 科技及其对现代社会的影响

sentences.chinese: 我们往上走了四段楼梯。

detailed_translations.english: a set of steps built for going from one level of a building to another

sentences.chinese: 一枚 29 美分的邮票

sentences.english: It looks like we’ll have to stand – there are no seats left.
sentences.chinese: 看来我们只能站着——没有座位了。

sentences.chinese: 她站在门口。

sentences.english: (= do not move ) and listen to me.
sentences.chinese: 站好别动，听我说。

sentences.english: We paid them the standard rate.
sentences.chinese: 我们付给他们标准工资。

sentences.chinese: 这个格式是比较标准的。

detailed_translations.english: accepted as normal or usual
the level that is considered to be acceptable, or the level that someone or something has achieved

sentences.english: I lay on my back and looked up at the stars.
sentences.chinese: 我仰卧着看天上的星星。

sentences.english: The sky was filled with stars.
sentences.chinese: 满天繁星。

sentences.english: The stars were shining .
sentences.chinese: 群星闪烁。

sentences.english: The stars were all out (= they were shining ) .
sentences.chinese: 星耀天空。

sentences.english: The stars were twinkling overhead (= shining and quickly changing from bright to faint ) .

detailed_translations.chinese: 星； 星形； 明星， 名角

sentences.english: She sat there staring into space (= looking for a long time at nothing ) .
sentences.chinese: 她坐在那里，出神地凝视前方。

detailed_translations.english: to look at something or someone for a long time without moving your eyes, for example because you are surprised, angry, or bored

sentences.english: There’s so much to do. I don’t know where to start.
sentences.chinese: 有那么多的事情要做，我都不知道从哪里开始。

sentences.english: I’d better get started (= start doing something ) soon.
sentences.chinese: 我最好马上就开始。

detailed_translations.english: to do something that you were not doing before, and continue doing it

sentences.english: Thousands of people will starve if food doesn’t reach the city.
sentences.chinese: 如果食品不能运到那座城市，成千上万的人就要饿死。

sentences.english: pictures of starving children
sentences.chinese: 饥饿儿童的照片

sentences.english: Please state your name and address.
sentences.chinese: 请说出你的姓名和地址。

sentences.english: Rembert again stated his intention to resign from Parliament.
sentences.chinese: 兰伯特再次表明辞去议员职务的意向。

sentences.english: The government needs to clearly state its policy on UN intervention.
sentences.chinese: 政府需要就联合国的干预清楚地阐明其政策。

sentences.english: Fine, but aren’t you just stating the obvious here?

detailed_translations.english: to formally say or write a piece of information or your opinion

sentences.english: I was stationed overseas at the time.
sentences.chinese: 那时候我被派驻在海外。

sentences.english: She bought a beautiful box of stationery for her sister's birthday.
sentences.chinese: 她为姐姐的生日买了一个漂亮的文具盒。

sentences.english: The office supply store had a wide variety of stationery.
sentences.chinese: 办公用品店里有各种各样的文具。

detailed_translations.english: writing materials such as paper, pens, and envelopes

sentences.english: The statistic comes from a study recently conducted by the British government.
sentences.chinese: 这项统计数据来自英国政府最近进行的一项研究。

detailed_translations.english: a single number which represents a fact or measurement

sentences.english: Churchill’s statue stands outside the parliament building.
sentences.chinese: 丘吉尔的塑像矗立在议会大厦外。

sentences.english: These documents have no legal status in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 这些文件在英国并无法律效力。

sentences.english: They stayed all afternoon chatting.
sentences.chinese: 他们待了整个下午聊天。

sentences.english: She stayed late to finish the report.
sentences.chinese: 为了完成报告，她工作到很晚。

detailed_translations.english: to remain in a place rather than leave

sentences.english: The plane steadied, and the passengers relaxed.
sentences.chinese: 飞机平稳后，乘客们松了一口气。

detailed_translations.chinese: 稳的，平稳的；稳定的，持续的；稳固的
detailed_translations.english: continuing or developing gradually or without stopping, and not likely to change

sentences.english: ...fresh salmon steaks.
sentences.chinese: …新鲜的三文鱼排。

sentences.chinese: 男孩们闯进一家商店，盗走了45英镑现金。

detailed_translations.english: to take something that belongs to someone else

sentences.english: A pot was steaming on top of the cooker.
sentences.chinese: 锅在炉子上冒着热气。

detailed_translations.english: if something steams, steam rises from it, especially because it is hot

sentences.english: a steel bridge
sentences.chinese: 钢铁大桥

sentences.english: (= steel that does not change colour ) knives
sentences.chinese: 不锈钢小刀

detailed_translations.english: strong metal that can be shaped easily, consisting of iron and  carbon

detailed_translations.chinese: 钢制的；钢铁业的；坚强的

sentences.chinese: 一盒婴儿学步的录像带

sentences.chinese: 我来回走了几次才找到那家商店。

sentences.english: Her interest in art was stimulated by her father.
sentences.chinese: 她对艺术的兴趣是她父亲激发的。

sentences.chinese: 我的老板是老一套的回答–“没坏的话就别修了！”

sentences.chinese: 他在吃了太多垃圾食品后胃痛得厉害。

sentences.english: stone steps
sentences.chinese: 石台阶

sentences.chinese: 政府企图阻止这本书出版。

sentences.chinese: 把豆子贮存在密封罐内。

sentences.english: This building has ten storeys.
sentences.chinese: 这座建筑有十层楼。

sentences.chinese: 这家酒店在几层高的楼上提供豪华套房。

sentences.chinese: 愤怒的人群突然袭击大使馆。

sentences.chinese: 我们依偎在一起看睡前故事。

sentences.chinese: 这部影片是根据真实故事改编的。

sentences.english: a long, straight road
sentences.chinese: 一条笔直的长路

sentences.chinese: 尽量把腿伸直。

sentences.chinese: 她又长又直的黑发

sentences.chinese: 他们坐成一直溜儿。

sentences.chinese: 那条路是笔直的。

sentences.chinese: 白令海峡

detailed_translations.english: a narrow passage of water between two areas of land, usually connecting two seas

sentences.english: As a child, she’d been taught never to speak to strange men.
sentences.chinese: 她从小就受到教育绝对不要和陌生男人说话。

sentences.chinese: 我只有20岁，一个小姑娘待在一座陌生的城市里。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is strange is not familiar because you have not seen or met them before

sentences.english: the government’s long-term economic strategy
sentences.chinese: 政府的长期经济策略

sentences.english: a company’s business strategy
sentences.chinese: 公司的经营策略

sentences.english: ...strawberries and cream.
sentences.chinese: …奶油草莓。

detailed_translations.english: a soft red juicy fruit with small seeds on its surface, or the plant that grows this fruit

sentences.chinese: 泪水顺着他们的脸颊流下来。

detailed_translations.english: to flow quickly and in great amounts

detailed_translations.english: a natural flow of water that moves across the land and is narrower than a river

sentences.chinese: 在我小时候，我们搬到了中心大街。

sentences.english: She lives just a few streets away.
sentences.chinese: 她的住处就在几条街外。

sentences.chinese: 我继续沿着马路走。

sentences.english: Someone just moved in across the street .
sentences.chinese: 街对面有人刚刚搬进来。

sentences.chinese: 停在街对面的一辆车

detailed_translations.english: a public road in a city or town that has houses, shops etc on one or both sides

sentences.english: Crawford stressed the need for more housing downtown.
sentences.chinese: 克劳福德强调市中心需要建更多的住宅。

sentences.english: She stressed the importance of a balanced diet.
sentences.chinese: 她强调了均衡饮食的重要性。

detailed_translations.chinese: 强调， 着重； 重读
detailed_translations.english: to emphasize a statement, fact, or idea

detailed_translations.chinese: 压力，紧张；强调，重要性；重音
detailed_translations.english: continuous feelings of worry about your work or personal life, that prevent you from relaxing

sentences.english: Carl sat up in bed, yawned, and stretched.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔从床上坐起来，打了个呵欠，伸了伸懒 腰。

detailed_translations.chinese: 伸展，延续；伸长，拉长；倾注全力；紧张
detailed_translations.english: to straighten your arms, legs, or body to full length

detailed_translations.chinese: 一段时间， 一段路程， 连绵的一片； 伸展， 延伸
detailed_translations.english: a continuous period of time

sentences.english: a strict teacher
sentences.chinese: 严格的老师

detailed_translations.chinese: 严格的， 严厉的； 严谨的， 精确的； 完全的，
detailed_translations.english: expecting people to obey rules or to do what you say

sentences.english: She fell heavily, striking her head against the side of the boat.
sentences.chinese: 她重重地摔倒，头撞在船舷上。

sentences.english: A snowball struck him on the back of the head.
sentences.chinese: 一个雪球打中他的后脑勺。

sentences.english: Several cars were struck by falling trees.
sentences.chinese: 几辆车被倒下的树砸中。

sentences.english: The last rays of the setting sun struck the windows.
sentences.chinese: 落日的最后一缕阳光照在窗户上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 打，打击；罢工；敲，敲击；抓；打动；穿透
detailed_translations.english: to hit or fall against the surface of something

sentences.english: Her key hung on a string around her neck.
sentences.chinese: 她的钥匙穿了根绳子挂在脖子上。

sentences.english: a ball of string
sentences.chinese: 一团细绳

sentences.english: I need a piece of string to tie this package.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一根绳子来捆这个包裹。

detailed_translations.chinese: 弦， 线， 细绳； 一串， 一行
detailed_translations.english: a strong thread made of several threads twisted together, used for tying or fastening things

sentences.english: He was a big strong man.
sentences.chinese: 他高大健壮。

sentences.english: Jack was tall and strong.
sentences.chinese: 杰克又高又壮。

sentences.english: I’m not strong enough to fight him.
sentences.chinese: 和他打我还不够强壮。

detailed_translations.chinese: 强壮的， 强有力的， 强大的； 牢固的； 坚强的， 坚定的； 强烈的， 浓的； 精

sentences.english: challenges to the existing power structure
sentences.chinese: 对现有权力结构的挑战

sentences.english: A new management structure has been introduced.
sentences.chinese: 已推行一种新的管理结构。

sentences.english: molecular structures
sentences.chinese: 分子结构

detailed_translations.english: the way in which the parts of something are connected with each other and form a whole, or the thing that these parts make up

sentences.english: The team has been struggling all season.
sentences.chinese: 整个赛季球队都打得很艰难。

sentences.english: Warren's eldest son is an art student.
sentences.chinese: 沃伦的长子是一名学艺术的学生。

detailed_translations.chinese: 学生， 学者， 大学生； 研究生
detailed_translations.english: someone who is studying at a university, school etc
