detailed_translations.english: a set of questions, exercises, or practical activities to measure someone’s skill, ability, or knowledge

sentences.english: a chemistry text
sentences.chinese: 化学课本

detailed_translations.english: a textbook
to send someone a written message on a  mobile phone

sentences.english: a biology textbook
sentences.chinese: 一本生物教科书

detailed_translations.english: a book that contains information about a subject that people study, especially at school or college

sentences.english: Natalie was prettier than her sister.
sentences.chinese: 纳塔莉比她姐姐漂亮。

sentences.english: You need that money more than I do.
sentences.chinese: 你比我更需要那笔钱。

sentences.english: There were more people there than I expected.
sentences.chinese: 那里的人比我预想的要多。

sentences.english: If it costs more than $60, I won’t buy it.
sentences.chinese: 如果价格超过60美元，我就不买了。

sentences.english: She had woken even earlier than usual.
sentences.chinese: 她甚至比平时醒得更早。

sentences.english: Divorce is more common than it was a generation ago.
sentences.chinese: 现在离婚比上一代人常见了。

detailed_translations.english: used when comparing two things, people, situations etc

sentences.english: I haven’t had a chance to thank him yet.
sentences.chinese: 我还没有机会向他表示谢意。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that you are pleased and grateful for something they have done, or to be polite about it

sentences.english: ‘You never cared about me.’ ‘That’s not true.’
sentences.chinese: “你从不关心我。”“那不是事实。”

sentences.english: I wish you wouldn’t say things like that.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你不要那么说。

sentences.english: What did you do with those sandwiches?
sentences.chinese: 那些三明治你怎么处理了？

sentences.english: Victoria Street? That’s where my sister lives.
sentences.chinese: 维多利亚街？我的姐姐就住在那儿。

sentences.english: Do you remember that nice Mr Hoskins who came to dinner?
sentences.chinese: 你还记得那位来这儿吃过晚饭的好人霍斯金斯先生吗？

sentences.english: I’ve got that pain in my back again.
sentences.chinese: 我的背又疼起来了。

sentences.english: He killed a man once and that’s why he had to leave Ireland.
sentences.chinese: 他曾杀死过一个人，这就是他不得不离开爱尔兰的原因。

sentences.english: ‘We’ve been cheated,’ she said. Those were her exact words.
sentences.chinese: “我们被骗了。”她说。这是她的原话。

sentences.english: ‘I have to go,’ she said, and with that (= after saying that ) she hung up the phone.
sentences.chinese: “我得走了。”说完她就把电话挂了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 那，那个〔指已经提到或已经知道的人、事物、想法等〕
detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a person, thing, idea etc that has already been mentioned or is already known about

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔用于动词、名词或形容词后引导一个从句，表示某人所说或所想，或陈述一个事实或理由〕
detailed_translations.english: used after verbs, nouns, and adjectives to introduce a  clause  which shows what someone says or thinks, or states a fact or reason

detailed_translations.chinese: 那么〔大、多等〕〔尤指通过手势比画来表示大小、数量等〕
detailed_translations.english: used to say how big, how much etc, especially when you are showing the size, amount etc with your hands

sentences.english: What should I do with the token?
sentences.chinese: 我该怎么用这个辅币呢？

sentences.english: What do they do with the coin?
sentences.chinese: 他们是怎样处理这枚硬币的?。

detailed_translations.chinese: 更加(用于比较级，最高级前)
detailed_translations.english: used before two  comparative  adjectives or adverbs to show that the degree of one event or situation is related to the degree of another one

sentences.english: an open-air theatre (= a theatre that is outside )
sentences.chinese: 露天剧场

sentences.english: the Mercury Theater
sentences.chinese: 水星剧院

detailed_translations.chinese: 戏院， 剧场； 影剧院
detailed_translations.english: a building or place with a stage where plays and shows are performed

sentences.english: There have been a number of thefts in the area.
sentences.chinese: 该地区发生了几宗偷窃案。

detailed_translations.english: an act of stealing something

sentences.english: They have their compensations.
sentences.chinese: 他们有他们的报酬。

sentences.english: My pulses, her pulses, their pulses.
sentences.chinese: 我的脉搏，她的脉搏，他们的脉搏。

sentences.english: In America, they go out with their friends.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，他们与他们的朋友出去。

sentences.english: Has anyone seen my keys? I can’t find them anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 有人见到我的钥匙吗？我哪儿都找不到。

sentences.english: The police were very helpful when I spoke to them.
sentences.chinese: 我和警察说了，他们很帮忙。

sentences.english: I lent him several books, but he hasn’t read any of them.
sentences.chinese: 我借给他几本书，但他一本还没看过。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to two or more people or things that have already been mentioned or are already known about

sentences.english: The book’s theme is the conflict between love and duty.
sentences.chinese: 本书的主题是爱与责任之间的冲突。

sentences.english: Nature is a recurrent theme (= a theme that appears repeatedly ) in Frost’s poetry.
sentences.chinese: 大自然是弗罗斯特诗作中反复出现的一个主题。

sentences.english: Most of Kurt’s other pictures were variations on the same theme .
sentences.chinese: 库尔特的其他大部分画作都是同一主题的变奏。

detailed_translations.chinese: 主题， 题目； 【音】主旋律
detailed_translations.english: the main subject or idea in a piece of writing, speech, film etc

sentences.english: This then was the situation facing the government at the end of the war.
sentences.chinese: 这就是战争结束时摆在政府面前的情况。

detailed_translations.chinese: 当时， 在那时； 那么， 因而； 然后， 于是
detailed_translations.english: used to refer back to what you have just been talking about

sentences.english: Freudian theory has had a great influence on psychology.
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德理论对心理学产生过巨大影响。

detailed_translations.chinese: 理论， 原理； 学说； 意见， 看法
detailed_translations.english: an idea or set of ideas that is intended to explain something about life or the world, especially an idea that has not yet been proved to be true

sentences.english: new drug therapies
sentences.chinese: 新的药物疗法

sentences.english: radiation therapy for cancer treatment
sentences.chinese: 治疗癌症的放射疗法

detailed_translations.english: the treatment of an illness or injury over a fairly long period of time

sentences.english: We could go back to my cottage and have lunch there.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以回到我的小屋去吃午饭。

sentences.english: Scotland? I’ve always wanted to go there.
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰？我一直想去那儿。

sentences.english: Hold it right there and don’t move.
sentences.chinese: 就站在那里，不要动。

sentences.english: Can you pass me that wine glass there?
sentences.chinese: 你能把那个葡萄酒杯递给我吗？

sentences.english: Look, there’s that bookshop I was telling you about.
sentences.chinese: 看，那就是我跟你说过的那家书店。

sentences.english: Who’s that man over there ?
sentences.chinese: 那边的那个男人是谁？

sentences.english: It’s too far to drive there and back in one day.
sentences.chinese: 一天开车来回太远了。

sentences.english: Are we going to get there (= arrive ) before the banks close?
sentences.chinese: 银行关门之前，我们到得了吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 在那里， 往那里； 在那方面， 在那点上
detailed_translations.english: in or to a particular place that is not where you are

sentences.english: Their car was bigger and therefore more comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 他们的车大些，所以更舒适些。

sentences.english: Progress so far has been very good. We are, therefore, confident that the work will be completed on time.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止进展十分顺利，所以我们有把握按时完成工作。

detailed_translations.english: as a result of something that has just been mentioned

sentences.english: I like these and he likes those.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢这些，他喜欢那些。

sentences.english: I have no answer of these at all.
sentences.chinese: 对于这些，我也不知道答案。

sentences.english: I like these but she likes those.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢这些，而她喜欢那些。

sentences.english: Bob and Sue said they wouldn’t be able to come.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃和休说他们来不了。

sentences.english: Ken gave me some flowers. Aren’t they beautiful?
sentences.chinese: 肯送给我一些花。很漂亮吧？

sentences.english: They all want to come to the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 他们都想来参加婚礼。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to two or more people or things that have already been mentioned or are already known about

sentences.english: a thick oak door
sentences.chinese: 一扇厚实的橡木门

sentences.english: a thick slice of homemade bread
sentences.chinese: 一片厚厚的自制面包

sentences.english: He was wearing thick glasses.
sentences.chinese: 他戴着厚厚的眼镜。

sentences.english: short thick fingers
sentences.chinese: 短粗的手指

sentences.english: thick wool socks (= socks that are heavy and warm )
sentences.chinese: 厚厚的羊毛袜子

sentences.english: If you want a thicker blanket, there are more here in the closet.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想要更厚的毯子，这个柜子里还有。

sentences.english: The meat is done when the thickest part turns from pink to white.
sentences.chinese: 肉最厚的部分从粉红色变成白色，就说明熟了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 厚的， 粗的； 笨的， 迟钝的； 稠的， 浓的； 密的， 密集的
detailed_translations.english: if something is thick, there is a large distance or a larger distance than usual between its two opposite surfaces or sides

sentences.english: Thieves broke into the offices and stole $150,000’s worth of computer equipment.
sentences.chinese: 小偷破门进入办公室，偷走了价值15万美元的电脑设备。

sentences.english: They were nothing but petty thieves (= thieves who steal small things ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们只不过是小毛贼。

detailed_translations.english: someone who steals things from another person or place

sentences.english: Don’t cut the bread so thin.
sentences.chinese: 别把面包切得这么薄。

detailed_translations.english: thinly. Many teachers think this is not correct English.

detailed_translations.chinese: 薄的；细的；瘦的；稀薄的；淡薄的
detailed_translations.english: if something is thin, there is only a small distance between its two opposite sides or surfaces
thinly. Many teachers think this is not correct English.

sentences.english: What’s that red thing?
sentences.chinese: 那个红色的东西是什么？

sentences.english: I’ll just switch this thing off.
sentences.chinese: 我把这东西关一下。

sentences.english: There was a round metal thing on the path.
sentences.chinese: 小路上有一个圆圆的金属物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 事， 事情， 事件； 物， 东西； 局面， 情况， 事态； 所有物， 用品
detailed_translations.english: an object that you are talking about without saying its name, or whose name you do not know

sentences.english: I thought I heard something.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我听到了什么声音。

sentences.english: He didn’t think anyone would believe him.
sentences.chinese: 他觉得没人会相信他。

sentences.english: Do you think I should call him?
sentences.chinese: 你认为我应该打电话给他吗？

sentences.english: For some reason, I keep thinking it’s Friday today.
sentences.chinese: 不知为什么，我总觉得今天是周五。

sentences.english: The recession lasted longer than anyone thought it would.
sentences.chinese: 谁也没有想到这次经济萧条会持续这么久。

sentences.english: Am I right in thinking that you have a brother?
sentences.chinese: 我想你是有个兄弟的，对吗？

sentences.english: I can’t help thinking that he’s made a mistake.
sentences.chinese: 我总觉得他弄错了。

sentences.english: Do you honestly think I would do something so stupid?
sentences.chinese: 你真认为我会做这么愚蠢的事吗？

sentences.english: We must start thinking in terms of reducing costs.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须开始考虑降低成本了。

detailed_translations.english: to have a particular opinion or to believe that something is true

sentences.english: Divide it into thirds.
sentences.chinese: 把它分成三等份。

detailed_translations.english: one of three equal parts of something
one of three equal parts of something

sentences.english: Can I have a glass of water? I’m really thirsty.
sentences.chinese: 我能喝一杯水吗？ 我太渴了。

sentences.english: He’d been working in the garden and was very hot and thirsty.
sentences.chinese: 他一直在花园里干活，又热又渴。

sentences.english: All this digging is thirsty work (= work that makes you want a drink ) .
sentences.chinese: 这种挖地的活干了让人口渴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 口渴的； 渴望的， 渴求的
detailed_translations.english: feeling that you want or need a drink

sentences.english: The table’s about this high and this wide.
sentences.chinese: 那桌子大约有这么高，这么宽。

sentences.english: You need to cut about this much off the end of the pipe.
sentences.chinese: 你要从管子头上切下大约这么多。

sentences.english: The doctor gave him a thorough check-up.
sentences.chinese: 医生给他做了一次全面的体检。

sentences.english: a thorough and detailed biography
sentences.chinese: 详尽的传记

sentences.english: The police investigation was very thorough.
sentences.chinese: 警方的调查十分彻底。

sentences.english: thorough notes of the meeting
sentences.chinese: 详尽的会议记录

detailed_translations.english: including every possible detail

sentences.english: I like these and he likes those.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢这些，他喜欢那些。

sentences.english: I like these but she likes those.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢这些，而她喜欢那些。

sentences.english: Two heart attacks in a year. It hasn’t stopped him smoking, though.
sentences.chinese: 一年里心脏病发作了两次，可是那也没让他把烟戒掉。

sentences.english: It sounds like a lot of fun. Isn’t it rather risky though?
sentences.chinese: 听上去很有趣。可是这不是也很危险吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 可是， 不过， 然而
detailed_translations.english: used after adding a fact, opinion, or question which seems surprising after what you have just said, or which makes what you have just said seem less true
used to introduce a statement that makes the main statement coming after it seem surprising, unlikely, or unexpected

sentences.english: It’s an interesting thought.
sentences.chinese: 这想法很有趣。

sentences.english: The thought that I might not have a job next year is a bit troubling.
sentences.chinese: 想到明年可能失业我有点心烦。

detailed_translations.chinese: 想法， 见解； 思考， 思维； 关心， 注意； 思想，
detailed_translations.english: something that you think of, remember, or realize

sentences.english: a journey of almost a thousand miles
sentences.chinese: 将近1,000英里的旅程

detailed_translations.english: the number 1,000

sentences.english: I’m looking for a needle and thread.
sentences.chinese: 我在找针线。

sentences.english: hand-sewn with gold and silver thread
sentences.chinese: 用金线和银线手工缝制的

sentences.english: a spool of thread (= small object that thread is wound around )
sentences.chinese: 一卷线

detailed_translations.chinese: 线；螺纹；思路；衣服；线状物；玻璃纤维；路线
detailed_translations.english: a long thin string of cotton, silk etc used to sew or weave cloth
to put a thread, string, rope etc through a hole

sentences.english: Your threats don’t scare me.
sentences.chinese: 你的那些威胁吓不倒我。

sentences.english: threats made against his wife and children
sentences.chinese: 对他妻儿的威胁

sentences.english: Nichols never carried out his threat to resign.
sentences.chinese: 尼科尔斯威胁过要辞职，但从未付诸行动。

sentences.english: The government will not give in to terrorist threats .
sentences.chinese: 政府不会屈服于恐怖分子的威胁。

sentences.english: She dismissed the statement as an empty threat .
sentences.chinese: 她无视这项声明，认为是个空口威胁。

sentences.english: They warned him with veiled threats not to mention anything he had witnessed.
sentences.chinese: 他们话中有话地威胁他不要提及他所目睹的事。

sentences.english: The police are investigating death threats made against the two men.
sentences.chinese: 警方正在调查针对这两名男子的死亡恐吓。

sentences.english: Officials at the school say they received a bomb threat at approximately 11:30 a.m. today.
sentences.chinese: 学校的官员说他们在今天上午11点半左右收到过炸弹恐吓。

detailed_translations.chinese: 威胁， 恐吓； 凶兆， 征兆
detailed_translations.english: a statement in which you tell someone that you will cause them harm or trouble if they do not do what you want

sentences.english: The singer complained of a sore throat after Wednesday’s show.
sentences.chinese: 星期三演出后，这位歌手说喉咙痛。

detailed_translations.english: the passage from the back of your mouth to the top of the tubes that go down to your lungs and stomach

sentences.english: Score lightly at first and then repeat, scoring deeper each time until the board is cut through.
sentences.chinese: 先轻轻地划一下，然后反复划，一次比一次划得深些，直到木板被完全割开。

detailed_translations.chinese: 穿过，通过；在整个…期间，从头到尾；凭借，经由
detailed_translations.english: into one side or end of an entrance, passage, hole etc and out of the other side or end

sentences.english: The first song, "Blue Moon," didn't go too badly except that everyone talked throughout.
sentences.chinese: 第一首歌《蓝月亮》效果还不算太差，只是所有的人自始至终都在说话。

detailed_translations.english: Throughout is also an adverb
in every part of a particular area, place etc

sentences.english: The bus stopped suddenly and we were all thrown forwards.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车猛地停住，我们都往前栽。

detailed_translations.chinese: [threw-thrown] 投， 扔， 抛； 使突然陷入； 使困惑， 使吃惊
detailed_translations.english: to make an object such as a ball move quickly through the air by pushing your hand forward quickly and letting the object go

sentences.english: The children came thundering downstairs.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们噔噔噔地走下楼梯。

detailed_translations.chinese: 打雷， 轰隆响； 大声喊， 吼
detailed_translations.english: if it thunders, there is a loud noise in the sky, usually after a flash of lightning

detailed_translations.chinese: 雷，雷声；擂鼓般的响声，轰隆声
detailed_translations.english: the loud noise that you hear during a storm, usually after a flash of lightning

sentences.english: The thunderstorm caused a power outage in the entire neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 雷雨导致了整个社区停电。

sentences.english: We sought shelter under a large tree during the thunderstorm.
sentences.chinese: 我们在雷雨期间躲在了一棵大树下。

sentences.english: The thunderstorm brought heavy rain and strong winds.
sentences.chinese: 雷雨带来了大雨和强风。

detailed_translations.chinese: [气象] 雷暴；雷暴雨；大雷雨
detailed_translations.english: a storm with thunder and lightning

sentences.english: Most of the evidence was destroyed in the fire. Thus it would be almost impossible to prove him guilty.
sentences.chinese: 大多数证据已在大火中烧毁，因而要证明他有罪几乎是不可能的。

detailed_translations.english: as a result of something that you have just mentioned

sentences.english: The old clock ticked noisily.
sentences.chinese: 那只古老的钟大声地嘀嗒着。

detailed_translations.english: if a clock or watch ticks, it makes a short repeated sound
A tick is a written mark like a V. It is used to show that something is correct or has been selected or dealt with.
to mark a test, list of questions etc with a tick, in order to show that something is correct, to choose something etc

sentences.english: He ran for governor on the Republican ticket.
sentences.chinese: 他作为共和党的候选人竞选州长。

detailed_translations.chinese: 票， 入场券， 车票； 罚款传票； 候选
detailed_translations.english: a printed piece of paper which shows that you have paid to enter a cinema, travel on a bus, plane etc

sentences.english: Is the tide going out or coming in ?
sentences.chinese: 现在是退潮还是涨潮？

sentences.english: We went for a walk and got cut off by the tide .
sentences.chinese: 我们去散步，结果被潮水困住了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 潮， 潮汐； 潮流， 趋势
detailed_translations.english: the regular rising and falling of the level of the sea

sentences.english: a tidy desk
sentences.chinese: 整洁的书桌

sentences.english: I try to keep the garden tidy .
sentences.chinese: 我尽量保持花园整洁。

sentences.english: Ellen’s room is always neat and tidy .
sentences.chinese: 埃伦的房间总是非常整洁。

detailed_translations.english: a room, house, desk etc that is tidy is neatly arranged with everything in the right place
to make a place look tidy

sentences.english: He tied the ends of the plastic bag together.
sentences.chinese: 他把塑料袋的两头系在一起。

detailed_translations.chinese: [tying]　拴， 扎， 捆； 把…打结， 系上； 连接， 使有关联； 不分胜负
detailed_translations.english: to get married

sentences.english: He came at me like a tiger.
sentences.chinese: 他像老虎一般地向我冲过来。

sentences.english: Or tiger ?
sentences.chinese: 或者老虎？

detailed_translations.english: a large wild animal that has yellow and black lines on its body and is a member of the cat family

sentences.english: tight jeans

something special that you give someone or do for them because you know they will enjoy it

sentences.english: As a kid, I loved to climb trees.
sentences.chinese: 小时候，我喜欢爬树。

sentences.english: the trunk of an old oak tree (= the main central part, from which the branches grow )
sentences.chinese: 一棵老橡树的树干

detailed_translations.english: a very tall plant that has branches and leaves, and lives for many years

sentences.english: The current trend is towards more part-time employment.
sentences.chinese: 当前的趋势是雇用更多的兼职人员。

sentences.english: the general trend towards the centralization of political power
sentences.chinese: 政治权力集中化的普遍趋势

sentences.english: A disturbing trend is that victims of violence are getting younger.
sentences.chinese: 一个令人担心的趋势是，暴力行为的受害者越来越年轻。

sentences.english: The growing trend is for single mothers to bring up children by themselves.
sentences.chinese: 单身母亲独自抚养孩子的趋势在上升。

sentences.english: Even so, the underlying trend is positive.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，基本趋势仍是乐观的。

sentences.english: national and international economic trends
sentences.chinese: 国内和国际的经济趋势

sentences.english: the downward trend in the price of gold
sentences.chinese: 黄金价格的下滑势头

sentences.english: Successive presidents have tried to reverse this trend , but without success.
sentences.chinese: 连续几任总统都试图扭转这一趋势，但均未成功。

detailed_translations.english: a general tendency in the way a situation is changing or developing

sentences.english: Pretending he doesn’t remember is an old trick of his.
sentences.chinese: 假装不记得是他的老花招了。

sentences.english: He didn’t really lose his wallet - that’s just a trick.
sentences.chinese: 他并没有真的丢了钱包——这只是一个骗局。

detailed_translations.chinese: 诡计；恶作剧；窍门；花招；骗局；欺诈
detailed_translations.english: something you do in order to deceive someone
to deceive someone in order to get something from them or to make them do something

detailed_translations.chinese: 特技的；欺诈的；有决窍的
detailed_translations.english: when a photograph or picture has been changed so that it looks different from what was really there

sentences.english: Two lucky employees won a round-the-world trip.
sentences.chinese: 两名幸运的雇员赢得一次环游世界的机会。

sentences.english: It’s an 80-mile round trip (= a journey to a place and back again ) to Exeter.
sentences.chinese: 到埃克塞特往返有80英里。

sentences.english: I’m afraid you’ve had a wasted trip (= a trip in which you do not achieve your purpose ) . Mr Burgess has already left.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕你是白来一趟了，伯吉斯先生已经走了。

sentences.english: He was unable to make the trip to accept the award.
sentences.chinese: 他无法前去领奖。

detailed_translations.english: a visit to a place that involves a journey, for pleasure or a particular purpose
to hit something with your foot by accident so that you fall or almost fall

sentences.english: They all trooped back to the house for a rest.
sentences.chinese: 他们都成群结队地回房子里休息。

detailed_translations.english: if a group of people troop somewhere, they walk there together in a way that shows they are tired or bored
soldiers in an organized group

sentences.english: Recent stock market losses point to trouble ahead.
sentences.chinese: 最近股市的下跌预示着未来将有麻烦。

detailed_translations.chinese: 麻烦， 苦恼， 困难； 疾病； 故障； 纠纷， 动乱
detailed_translations.english: problems or difficulties

sentences.english: His trousers were slightly too short.
sentences.chinese: 他的裤子有点短。

sentences.english: I need a new pair of trousers for work.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一条上班穿的新裤子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that covers the lower half of your body, with a separate part fitting over each leg

sentences.english: He left his bicycle leaning against a tree trunk .
sentences.chinese: 他把他的自行车斜靠在树干上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 树干； 大衣箱， 皮箱； 汽车后备箱； 象鼻
detailed_translations.english: the thick central woody stem of a tree

sentences.english: I just don’t trust him.
sentences.chinese: 我就是不信任他。

detailed_translations.chinese: 信任， 信赖； 希望， 想； 确信； 托付； 对…放心
detailed_translations.english: to believe that someone is honest or will not do anything bad or wrong
a strong belief in the honesty, goodness etc of someone or something

sentences.english: How do we know you’re telling us the truth?
sentences.chinese: 我们怎么知道你告诉我们的是真话？

detailed_translations.chinese: 事实， 真相； 真实性； 真理
detailed_translations.english: the true facts about something, rather than what is untrue, imagined, or guessed

sentences.english: Let’s have a rest and then we’ll try again.
sentences.chinese: 我们休息一下，然后再试。

sentences.english: I tried everything to lose weight with no success.
sentences.chinese: 我试了各种方法减肥，但都没有成功。

sentences.english: I tried and tried (= kept making an effort ) and eventually I was offered a job.
sentences.chinese: 我一次次地尝试，终于有人给了我一份工作。

sentences.english: Try as he might (= as hard as he could ) , he could not get the incident out of his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他想尽办法，但脑子里仍摆脱不掉那件事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 试图， 努力； 试验， 试用； 审讯， 审理； 考验， 磨炼
detailed_translations.english: to take action in order to do something that you may not be able to do

sentences.english: I'm wearing a blue T-shirt today.
sentences.chinese: 我今天穿着一件蓝色的T恤。

sentences.english: She bought a new T-shirt at the store.
sentences.chinese: 她在商店买了一件新的T恤。

sentences.english: This T-shirt is very comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 这件T恤非常舒适。

detailed_translations.english: a short-sleeved, usually loose-fitting shirt made of cotton or synthetic fiber

sentences.english: a tube of toothpaste
sentences.chinese: 一管牙膏

detailed_translations.chinese: 管， 电子管， 显像管
detailed_translations.english: a round pipe made of metal, glass, rubber etc, especially for liquids or gases to go through

sentences.english: That’s a nice tune.
sentences.chinese: 那曲调很美。

sentences.english: She sang some old classics and a few new tunes.
sentences.chinese: 她唱了几首经典老歌和一些新曲。

detailed_translations.english: a series of musical notes that are played or sung and are nice to listen to

detailed_translations.chinese: 调整， 调节； 为调音
detailed_translations.english: to make a musical instrument play at the right  pitch

sentences.english: The thieves tunnelled under all the security devices.
sentences.chinese: 小偷们在所有的那些安全装置下面都挖了地道。

detailed_translations.english: to dig a long passage under the ground
a passage that has been dug under the ground for cars, trains etc to go through

sentences.english: roast turkey
sentences.chinese: 烤火鸡

detailed_translations.english: a bird that looks like a large chicken and is often eaten at Christmas and at Thanksgiving

sentences.english: Ricky turned and walked away.
sentences.chinese: 里基转身走了。

sentences.english: She turned her head in surprise.
sentences.chinese: 她惊讶地转过头来。

sentences.english: Brigitte glared at him, turned on her heel (= turned away suddenly because of anger ) , and stomped out of the room.
sentences.chinese: 布丽吉特瞪了他一眼，猛地一转身，噔噔噔地走出了房间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 转动， 旋转； 扭转， 转向； 变化， 变成
detailed_translations.english: to move your body so that you are looking in a different direction

sentences.english: He was privately tutored.
sentences.chinese: 他是由家庭教师教的。

detailed_translations.english: to teach someone as a tutor
someone who gives private lessons to one student or a small group, and is paid directly by them

sentences.english: He was questioned by police twice yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 他昨天被警察审问了两次。

sentences.english: None of our dinner menus are exactly the same twice over .
sentences.chinese: 我们的晚餐菜单从没有完全重样的。

detailed_translations.english: two times

sentences.english: the twin problems of poverty and unemployment
sentences.chinese: 贫穷和失业这对孪生问题

detailed_translations.english: used to describe one of two children who are twins

detailed_translations.chinese: 孪生儿之一，双胞胎之一
detailed_translations.english: one of two children born at the same time to the same mother

sentences.english: He types with two fingers.
sentences.chinese: 他用两个手指打字。

sentences.english: Type your password, then press ‘Return’.
sentences.chinese: 输入密码，然后按“回车”键。

detailed_translations.english: to write something using a computer or a  typewriter
one member of a group of people or things that have similar features or qualities

sentences.english: The typhoon had spent its fury.
sentences.chinese: 台风的势头已经减弱了。

sentences.english: The football match have to stand over next week for the typhoon storm.
sentences.chinese: 由于台风风暴，这场足球赛延期到下个星期举行。

detailed_translations.english: a very violent tropical storm

sentences.english: typical British weather
sentences.chinese: 典型的英国天气

sentences.english: This advertisement is a typical example of their marketing strategy.
sentences.chinese: 这则广告是他们营销策略的一个典型例子。

detailed_translations.english: having the usual features or qualities of a particular group or thing

sentences.english: I had a flat tyre (= all the air went out of it ) on the way home.
sentences.chinese: 回家的路上我的轮胎瘪了。

sentences.english: The spare tyre ’s in the boot.
sentences.chinese: 备用轮胎在行李箱里。

detailed_translations.english: a thick rubber ring that fits around the wheel of a car, bicycle etc

sentences.english: a very ugly man
sentences.chinese: 非常丑陋的男子

sentences.english: the ugliest building in town
sentences.chinese: 城里最难看的建筑

sentences.english: Nick’s dog is as ugly as sin (= very ugly ).
sentences.chinese: 尼克的狗难看得要命。

detailed_translations.chinese: 难看的， 丑陋的； 有敌意的
detailed_translations.english: extremely unattractive and unpleasant to look at

sentences.english: Ultimately, success depends on your effort and determination.
sentences.chinese: 最终，成功取决于你的努力和决心。

sentences.english: After much consideration, she ultimately decided to accept the job offer.
sentences.chinese: 经过深思熟虑，她最终决定接受工作邀请。

detailed_translations.english: in the end; finally; ultimately

sentences.english: It started to rain, so Tricia stopped to put up her umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 开始下雨了，所以特里西娅停下来撑起雨伞。

sentences.english: I spent the day on the beach, lying under a beach umbrella, reading.
sentences.chinese: 那天我就在海滩上度过，躺在海滩遮阳伞下面看书。

detailed_translations.english: an object that you use to protect yourself against rain or hot sun. It consists of a circular folding frame covered in cloth.

sentences.english: The military may feel unable to hand over power to a civilian president next year.
sentences.chinese: 军方可能觉得无法在明年把政权移交给一位民选总统。

detailed_translations.english: not able to do something

sentences.english: I went to stay with my uncle and aunt for a few days.
sentences.chinese: 我去和叔叔婶婶住了几天。

sentences.english: Uncle Philip
sentences.chinese: 菲利普叔叔

sentences.english: I was very excited about becoming an uncle(= your sister or your brother’s wife has a child ).
sentences.chinese: 要做舅舅了，我很激动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 伯父， 叔父， 舅父， 姑父， 姨父
detailed_translations.english: the brother of your mother or father, or the husband of your aunt

sentences.english: Wendy had hidden the box under her bed.
sentences.chinese: 温迪把盒子藏在了自己的床底下。

sentences.english: We sailed under the Golden Gate Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 我们在金门大桥下航行。

sentences.english: Write your name under your picture.
sentences.chinese: 在你的照片下面写上名字。

sentences.english: I could see something glittering under the water.
sentences.chinese: 我看到水下有东西在闪闪发光。

sentences.english: He was wearing a jacket under his coat.
sentences.chinese: 他在大衣里面穿了件夹克。

sentences.english: Under her arm, she carried a large portfolio.
sentences.chinese: 她腋下夹了个大公文包。

sentences.english: In summer, we often slept under the stars.
sentences.chinese: 夏天，我们经常露宿星空之下。

sentences.english: I’d scare my mom by diving in and staying under (= staying under the water ) for as long as I could.
sentences.chinese: 我会跳进水里，在水下待到憋不住为止，以此来吓唬我妈妈。

sentences.english: The bench collapsed under the weight of(= unable to support the weight of ) so many people.
sentences.chinese: 长椅承受不住这么多人的重量塌了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在…下面， 在…底下； 少于； 低于； 在…管辖下， 在…影响下
detailed_translations.english: below or at a lower level than something, or covered by something

sentences.english: an underground passage
sentences.chinese: 地下通道

sentences.english: The car park is underground.
sentences.chinese: 停车场在地下。

sentences.english: I don't travel on the underground late at night.
sentences.chinese: 我深夜不坐地铁。

detailed_translations.chinese: 地下的；秘密的，不公开的
detailed_translations.english: below the surface of the earth
Theunderground in a city is the railway system in which electric trains travel below the ground in tunnels

sentences.english: This tragic incident underlines the need for immediate action.
sentences.chinese: 这一悲剧事件突显了立即采取行动的必要性。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在…下面画线； 强调， 使…突出
detailed_translations.english: to draw a line under a word to show that it is important

sentences.english: She doesn’t understand English.
sentences.chinese: 她不懂英语。

sentences.english: I’m sorry, I don’t understand. Can yon explain that again?
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我不明白。你能再解释一遍吗？

sentences.english: The woman had a strong accent, and I couldn’t understand what she was saying.
sentences.chinese: 那女人口音很重，我听不懂她在说些什么。

detailed_translations.chinese: [understood-understood] 理解， 懂； 了解， 意识到； 认为， 以为
detailed_translations.english: to know the meaning of what someone is telling you, or the language that they speak

sentences.english: an unfair advantage
sentences.chinese: 不公平的优势

sentences.english: laws aimed at preventing unfair competition
sentences.chinese: 旨在防止不公平竞争的法令

sentences.english: Many employers have recognized that age discrimination is unfair.
sentences.chinese: 许多雇主已经认识到年龄歧视是不公平的。

sentences.english: She won £20,000 for unfair dismissal(= being illegally made to leave your job ).
sentences.chinese: 她因被不公平解雇而得到两万英镑的赔偿。

detailed_translations.english: not right or fair, especially because not everyone has an equal opportunity

sentences.english: The trip to the Great Wall was an unforgettable experience.
sentences.chinese: 去长城的旅行是一次难忘的经历。

sentences.english: Her unforgettable performance left the audience in awe.
sentences.chinese: 她那令人难忘的表演让观众惊叹不已。

sentences.english: The memorable wedding was filled with unforgettable moments.
sentences.chinese: 那场难忘的婚礼充满了令人难忘的时刻。

detailed_translations.english: too good or interesting to be forgotten

sentences.english: Unfortunately, you were out when we called.
sentences.chinese: 很遗憾，我们来的时候你出去了。

detailed_translations.english: used when you are mentioning a fact that you wish was not true

sentences.english: If you’re so unhappy, why don’t you change jobs?
sentences.chinese: 你要是那么不开心，为什么不换个工作呢？

sentences.english: Leslie had an unhappy childhood.
sentences.chinese: 莱斯利的童年很不幸。

sentences.english: an unhappy marriage
sentences.chinese: 不幸的婚姻

sentences.english: I was desperately unhappy.
sentences.chinese: 我非常不快乐。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不快乐的； 不幸的， 悲惨的
detailed_translations.english: not happy

sentences.english: Grade A eggs must be of uniform size.
sentences.chinese: A 级鸡蛋必须大小相同。

detailed_translations.english: being the same in all its parts or among all its members
a particular type of clothing worn by all the members of a group or organization such as the police, the army etc

sentences.english: Are you planning to join the union?
sentences.chinese: 你打算加入工会吗？

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["union members"]}
sentences.chinese: 工会会员

detailed_translations.chinese: 工会， 联盟； 联合， 团结； 一致
detailed_translations.english: an organization formed by workers to protect their rights

sentences.english: a unique opportunity to study these rare creatures
sentences.chinese: 研究这些珍稀动物的难得机会

detailed_translations.chinese: 唯一的， 独一无二的； 极不寻常的， 极好的
detailed_translations.english: unusually good and special

sentences.english: The man is in the hospital’s intensive care unit.
sentences.chinese: 那名男子在医院的重症监护室。

detailed_translations.chinese: 单位； 单位； 部件， 元件， 装置； 单元
detailed_translations.english: an amount of something used as a standard of measurement

sentences.english: The United States is a country made up of 50 states.
sentences.chinese: 美国是由50个州组成的联邦制国家。

sentences.english: They are working together to keep their friendship united.
sentences.chinese: 他们正努力维持他们团结的友谊。

sentences.english: The union of these two companies created a giant corporation.
sentences.chinese: 这两家公司的合并创造了一个巨型企业。

detailed_translations.english: joined together in purpose or feeling
to bring together into a single group or unit

sentences.english: Einstein's equations showed the universe to be expanding.
sentences.chinese: 爱因斯坦的方程式表明宇宙正在扩大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 宇宙， 世界； 领域， 范围
detailed_translations.english: a world or an area of space that is different from the one we are in

sentences.english: Why do you go to university?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么上大学呢？

sentences.english: In comparison, in university, no one cares what you do.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在大学，基本上没有人在意你的表现。

detailed_translations.english: an educational institution at the highest level, where you study for a degree

sentences.english: The murderer’s identity remains unknown.
sentences.chinese: 杀人凶手身份仍然不明。

sentences.english: For some unknown reason, Mark quit his job and moved to Greece.
sentences.chinese: 不知何故，马克辞掉工作移居希腊了。

sentences.english: a voyage through unknown territory
sentences.chinese: 穿越未知海域的航行

sentences.english: An unknown number of people were killed.
sentences.chinese: 丧生人数不详。

detailed_translations.chinese: 未知的；陌生的，默默无闻的
detailed_translations.english: not known about

detailed_translations.chinese: 未知数；未知的事物，默默无闻的人
detailed_translations.english: things that you do not know or understand

sentences.english: Unless some extra money is found, the theatre will close.
sentences.chinese: 要是不能找到更多资金，剧院将要关闭。

sentences.english: I think you should complain – unless, of course, you are happy with the way things are.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得你应该发发牢骚——当然，除非你对现状很满意。

sentences.english: He won’t go to sleep unless you tell him a story.
sentences.chinese: 要是你不给他讲故事他就不睡觉。

sentences.english: I can’t leave her unless I know she’s all right.
sentences.chinese: 除非我知道她没事，否则我不能离开她。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that something will happen or be true if something else does not happen or is not true

sentences.english: Now I see that, unlike her, they were my positive models.
sentences.chinese: 现在我知道了，那些人不像她，他们是我的正面的表率。

detailed_translations.english: not alike
completely different from a particular person or thing

sentences.english: We will wait here until or till the rain stops.
sentences.chinese: 我们将在这里等到雨停。

sentences.english: She didn't leave until or till the meeting ended.
sentences.chinese: 她直到会议结束才离开。

sentences.english: He worked until or till midnight every day.
sentences.chinese: 他每天工作到深夜。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that something continues for a period of time up to a particular point in the future or past

sentences.english: an unusual feature
sentences.chinese: 不寻常的特点

sentences.english: unusual circumstances
sentences.chinese: 异常状况

sentences.english: It’s unusual for Dave to be late.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫迟到是很少见的。

sentences.english: (= it is quite common ) to feel very angry in a situation like this.
sentences.chinese: 遇到这样的情况觉得非常生气是很正常的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不平常的， 少有的； 独特的， 与众不同的
detailed_translations.english: different from what is usual or normal

sentences.english: We walked slowly up the hill.
sentences.chinese: 我们慢慢地爬上山。

sentences.english: She picked her jacket up off the floor.
sentences.chinese: 她从地板上捡起外套。

sentences.english: paths leading up into the mountains
sentences.chinese: 通往山里的小径

sentences.english: Tim had climbed up a tree to get a better view.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆爬到了树上，以便看得更清楚。

sentences.english: Put up your hand if you know the answer.
sentences.chinese: 如果知道答案就举手。

sentences.english: The water was getting up my nose.
sentences.chinese: 水已经没到了我的鼻子。

sentences.english: Karen lay on her back, staring up at the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 卡伦仰卧着，盯着天花板。

sentences.chinese: 他从钱包里拿出一张信用卡。

sentences.chinese: 越南战争

sentences.chinese: 你介意我看着吗？

sentences.chinese: 有关减肥和健康饮食的更多信息，请访问我们的网站。

sentences.chinese: 我这星期不能见你。

sentences.chinese: 昨晚发生了一件非常奇怪的事。

sentences.chinese: 他是个古怪的家伙。

sentences.chinese: 我必须在那里迎接我的客人。

sentences.chinese: 他们热烈欢迎我们。

sentences.english: Our only concern is the children’s welfare.
sentences.chinese: 我们唯一关心的是孩子们的幸福。

sentences.chinese: 就詹姆斯的年龄来说，他的阅读能力算不错了。

sentences.chinese: 今天所有队员都打得很不错。

sentences.english: This is probably their best-known song.
sentences.chinese: 这可能是他们最有名的歌曲。

sentences.chinese: 著名的电视节目主持人

sentences.english: I’ve washed your shirt but it’s still wet.
sentences.chinese: 我把你的衬衫洗过了，不过现在还是湿的。

sentences.chinese: 船上的那人浑身湿透。

detailed_translations.chinese: 湿的，潮的；多雨的，雨天的
detailed_translations.english: covered in or full of water or another liquid

sentences.english: The whale nearest to the photographer is releasing air to aid its descent.
sentences.chinese: 这只离摄影师最近的白鲸正呼出空气以帮助其下潜。

sentences.chinese: 这种鲸因其瘦长的喙而闻名。它能够潜入深度超过500米的海中寻找食物。

sentences.english: They do not have a set migration pattern, unlike some other whale species - which raises questions about how they may adapt in future, if the projected declines in summer Arctic sea ice materialise.
sentences.chinese: 它们没有一套迁徙的模式，不像其他的鲸类――假如夏季北极海冰像预计那样减少而成为现实的话，这就引起了关于它们如何适应未来的问题。

detailed_translations.english: a very large animal that lives in the sea and looks like a fish, but is actually a mammal

sentences.english: What are you doing?
sentences.chinese: 你在做什么？

sentences.chinese: 你最喜欢什么学科？

sentences.chinese: 新地毯是什么颜色的？

sentences.chinese: 你的新老板怎么样？

sentences.chinese: 你觉得我的画怎样？

sentences.english: The action of the crank turns the wheel.
sentences.chinese: 这根曲轴的作用是使轮子转动。

sentences.chinese: 我们什么时候走？

sentences.chinese: 你要到哪儿去？

sentences.english: Where do they live?
sentences.chinese: 他们住在哪里？

sentences.english: Do you know where my glasses are?
sentences.chinese: 你知道我的眼镜在哪儿吗？

sentences.english: Where would you like to sit?
sentences.chinese: 你想坐在哪里？

detailed_translations.english: in or to which place

sentences.english: Maurice asked me whether I needed any help.
sentences.chinese: 莫里斯问我是否需要帮助。

sentences.english: There were times when I wondered whether or not we would get there.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我也想知道我们能不能做得到。

sentences.english: I didn’t know whether to believe him or not.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道该不该相信他。

sentences.english: The question arose as to whether this behaviour was unlawful.
sentences.chinese: 问题出现了: 这种行为是否不合法？

detailed_translations.chinese: 是否， 会不会； 不管， 无论
detailed_translations.english: used when talking about a choice you have to make or about something that is not certain

sentences.english: Which book are you reading?
sentences.chinese: 你在读哪本书？

sentences.english: She decided which option to choose.
sentences.chinese: 她决定选择哪个选项。

sentences.english: Which of the two paths should we take?
sentences.chinese: 我们应该选择哪条路？

detailed_translations.chinese: 哪一个， 哪一些； …的那个， …的那些； 那个， 那些

sentences.english: They arrived while we were having dinner.
sentences.chinese: 他们来时我们正在吃饭。

sentences.english: While she was asleep, thieves broke in and stole her handbag.
sentences.chinese: 她睡着的时候，小偷闯进来偷走了她的手提包。

sentences.english: She met Andy while working on a production of Carmen.
sentences.chinese: 排练《卡门》时，她认识了安迪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 当…的时候，和…同时；而，然而；虽然，尽管
detailed_translations.english: during the time that something is happening

sentences.english: You don’t have to whisper, no one can hear us.
sentences.chinese: 你不必轻声轻语，没人听得到我们说话。

sentences.english: ‘I’ve missed you,’ he whispered in her ear.
sentences.chinese: “我想你了。”他在她耳边低语道。

detailed_translations.english: to speak or say something very quietly, using your breath rather than your voice
a very quiet voice you make using your breath and no sound

sentences.english: a white dress
sentences.chinese: 白色连衣裙

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of milk, salt, or snow

detailed_translations.chinese: 白色； 蛋白； 眼白
detailed_translations.english: the colour of milk, salt, and snow

sentences.english: Who locked the door?
sentences.chinese: 谁锁的门？

sentences.english: Who do you work for?
sentences.chinese: 你为谁工作？

sentences.english: Who’s that guy with your wife?
sentences.chinese: 和你妻子在一起的那个人是谁？

sentences.english: They never found out who the murderer was.
sentences.chinese: 他们一直未查出谁是凶犯。

sentences.english: She wondered who had sent the flowers.
sentences.chinese: 她不知道是谁送的花。

detailed_translations.chinese: 谁， 什么人； …的人； 他， 她， 他们
detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about which person is involved, or what the name of a person is

sentences.english: You have your whole life ahead of you!
sentences.chinese: 你有一辈子要过呢！

sentences.english: His whole attitude bugs me.
sentences.chinese: 他的整个态度都让我讨厌。

sentences.english: We ate the whole cake in about ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 大约十分钟的时间，我们就把整个蛋糕都给吃完了。

sentences.english: The whole thing (= everything about the situation ) just makes me sick.
sentences.chinese: 这一切简直让我恶心。

sentences.english: We just sat around and watched TV the whole time (= the only thing we did was watch television ).
sentences.chinese: 我们一直都只是坐着看看电视。

sentences.english: I don’t believe she’s telling us the whole story (= all the facts ).
sentences.chinese: 我认为她没有告诉我们全部实情。

sentences.english: It was months before the whole truth came out.
sentences.chinese: 几个月以后才真相大白。

detailed_translations.chinese: 全部的，全体的；完整的，无缺的
detailed_translations.english: all of something
something that consists of a number of parts, but is considered as a single unit

sentences.english: Do any other family members reside with you? Yes/No If yes, whom?
sentences.chinese: 是否有其他家庭成员和你住一起？如果是，谁？

sentences.english: The word “dentist”denotes a doctor whose work is the care of teeth.
sentences.chinese: “牙科医生”一词意谓其工作是医治牙齿的医生。

detailed_translations.chinese: 谁的； 那个的， 那些的

sentences.english: Why are you crying?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么哭？

sentences.english: Why do we have to take all these tests?
sentences.chinese: 我们为什么一定要参加这些测验？

sentences.english: ‘She wants to meet you.’ ‘Why?’
sentences.chinese: “她想认识你。”“为什么？”

sentences.english: ‘I won’t be able to come into work tomorrow.’ ‘Why not?’
sentences.chinese: “我明天不能来上班。”“为什么？”

sentences.english: I have no idea why the television isn’t working.
sentences.chinese: 我不明白电视机为什么坏了。

sentences.english: Simon loves you – that’s why he wants to be with you.
sentences.chinese: 西蒙爱你——所以他想和你在一起。

sentences.english: He’s angry with me and I don’t know why.
sentences.chinese: 他生我气了，我不知道为什么。

sentences.english: There’s no reason why we shouldn’t be friends.
sentences.chinese: 我们没有理由不成为朋友。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about the reason for something
used when you are surprised or have suddenly realized something

sentences.english: Leonora’s eyes opened wide in horror.
sentences.chinese: 莉奥诺拉惊恐地睁大双眼。

sentences.english: The windows had been opened wide and she could feel a slight breeze.
sentences.chinese: 窗户大开，她感觉到一丝微风。

detailed_translations.english: opening or spreading as much as possible

detailed_translations.chinese: 宽阔的；广泛的；远离目标的，偏离的
detailed_translations.english: including or involving a large variety of different people, things, or situations

sentences.english: the widespread use of chemicals in agriculture
sentences.chinese: 化学品在农业中的广泛使用

detailed_translations.english: existing or happening in many places or situations, or among many people

sentences.english: Have you met my wife?
sentences.chinese: 你见过我的妻子吗？

sentences.english: a refuge for battered wives
sentences.chinese: 受虐待妻子庇护所

sentences.english: his second wife
sentences.chinese: 他的第二任妻子

detailed_translations.english: the woman that a man is married to

sentences.english: Make sure your device is connected to a Wi-Fi network before starting the download.
sentences.chinese: 在开始下载之前，请确保您的设备已连接到Wi-Fi网络。

sentences.english: Wi-Fi hotspots are widely available in coffee shops and public libraries.
sentences.chinese: Wi-Fi热点在咖啡馆和公共图书馆中很普遍。

sentences.english: Some older devices may not support the latest Wi-Fi standards.
sentences.chinese: 一些较旧的设备可能不支持最新的Wi-Fi标准。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无线网络；无线保真技术
detailed_translations.english: a wireless local area network that uses radio waves to provide high-speed internet and network connections

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["wild animals"]}
sentences.chinese: 野生动物

sentences.english: a field full of wild flowers
sentences.chinese: 遍地野花的田野

sentences.english: animals both wild and domesticated
sentences.chinese: 野生动物和家养动物

detailed_translations.chinese: 野生的， 未驯化的； 荒凉的， 荒芜的； 狂热的， 疯狂的； 野蛮的，
detailed_translations.english: living in a natural state, not changed or controlled by people

sentences.english: A meeting will be held next Tuesday at 3 p.m.
sentences.chinese: 下星期二下午3点将召开一个会议。

sentences.english: What time will she arrive?
sentences.chinese: 她什么时候到达？

sentences.english: I hope they won’t be late.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他们不会迟到。

sentences.english: Maybe by then you will have changed your mind.
sentences.chinese: 也许到那时你已经改变主意了。

sentences.english: All right, I'll forgive you.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我愿意原谅你。

detailed_translations.chinese: 将，会，要〔用于构成将来时〕
detailed_translations.english: used to make future tenses
determination to do something that you have decided to do, even if this is difficult

detailed_translations.chinese: 设法用意志力驱使〔某事发生〕
detailed_translations.english: You use will to say that someone is willing to do something. You use will not or won't to indicate that someone refuses to do something.

sentences.english: Who’s winning (= who is most successful at this point in the game )?
sentences.chinese: 现在谁领先？

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔在竞赛、游戏、选举等中〕获胜，赢
detailed_translations.english: to be the best or most successful in a competition, game, election etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔尤指在体育比赛中的〕胜利，赢
detailed_translations.english: a success or victory, especially in sport

sentences.english: The wind blew from the northeast.
sentences.chinese: 风从东北方向吹来。

sentences.english: Planes were unable to take off because of high winds.
sentences.chinese: 飞机因大风无法起飞。

detailed_translations.english: moving air, especially when it moves strongly or quickly in a current

detailed_translations.chinese: 缠绕；上发条；使弯曲；吹号角；绕住或缠住某人
detailed_translations.english: to turn or twist something several times around something else

sentences.english: Television provides us with a useful window on the world.
sentences.chinese: 电视为我们提供了了解世界的有用渠道。

detailed_translations.english: a space or an area of glass in the wall of a building or vehicle that lets in light

sentences.english: a glass of wine
sentences.chinese: 一杯葡萄酒

detailed_translations.english: an alcoholic drink made from grapes, or a type of this drink

sentences.english: The bird flapped its wings furiously.
sentences.chinese: 那只鸟使劲地拍打着翅膀。

detailed_translations.chinese: 翼；翅膀；飞翔；派别；侧厅，耳房，厢房
detailed_translations.english: one of the large flat parts that stick out from the side of a plane and help to keep it in the air

detailed_translations.chinese: 使飞；飞过；空运；增加…速度；装以翼
detailed_translations.english: to fly somewhere

sentences.english: I like winter because we play soccer!
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢冬天因为我们踢足球！

sentences.english: Well, the worst of the winter should be over.
sentences.chinese: 不过，冬天最糟糕的一段日子总该过去了。

sentences.english: Do you like summer? Yes, but I like winter better.
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢夏天吗？是的，但是我更喜欢冬天。

detailed_translations.english: the season after autumn and before spring, when the weather is coldest

sentences.english: I'll just wipe the table.
sentences.chinese: 我只擦擦桌子。

detailed_translations.english: to remove liquid, dirt, or marks by wiping
a wiping movement with a cloth

sentences.english: copper wire
sentences.chinese: 铜丝

sentences.english: a wire fence
sentences.chinese: 铁丝网

detailed_translations.english: thin metal in the form of a thread, or a piece of this
to send money electronically

sentences.english: a wise precaution
sentences.chinese: 明智的预防措施

sentences.english: I don’t think that would be a very wise move (= not be a sensible thing to do ).
sentences.chinese: 我认为那样做不是很明智。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有智慧的， 聪明的； 英明的， 明智的； 博学的， 贤明的
detailed_translations.english: wise decisions and actions are sensible and based on good judgment

sentences.english: If you wish to discuss this matter further please do not hesitate to contact me.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想进一步讨论此事，请尽管和我联系。

sentences.english: You may leave now, if you wish.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想走，现在就可以走了。

sentences.english: The cook will prepare whatever you wish.
sentences.chinese: 你想吃什么厨师就会给你做什么。

detailed_translations.chinese: 希望， 想要； 但愿； 祝， 祝愿； 盼望， 企求
detailed_translations.english: if you wish to do something or you wish to have it done for you, you want to do it or want to have it done

sentences.english: I saw Bob in town with his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 我看到鲍勃与他的女朋友一起在镇上。

sentences.english: Put this bag with the others.
sentences.chinese: 把这个包和其他的包放在一起。

sentences.english: I always wear these shoes with this dress.
sentences.chinese: 这双鞋子我总是和这条裙子一起穿。

sentences.english: Mix the powder with boiling water.
sentences.chinese: 用开水把粉调和。

sentences.english: You’d better bring your passport with you.
sentences.chinese: 你最好把护照带着。

detailed_translations.chinese: 和…一起， 跟， 同； 具有， 带有； 用， 以， 藉； 对…， 关于； 随着

sentences.english: calls for Britain to withdraw from the European Union
sentences.chinese: 要求英国退出欧盟的呼声

detailed_translations.chinese: 收回， 撤回； 撤退
detailed_translations.english: to stop taking part in an activity, belonging to an organization etc, or to make someone do this

sentences.english: We should have the test results back within 24 hours.
sentences.chinese: 我们24小时之内应该可以拿到化验结果。

sentences.english: He fell sick and died within a matter of weeks.
sentences.chinese: 他病倒了，不出几星期就死了。

sentences.english: Within an hour of our arrival Caroline was starting to complain.
sentences.chinese: 我们到达还没有一小时，卡罗琳就开始抱怨了。

sentences.english: The real dangers to these rebels came from within.
sentences.chinese: 对于这些叛乱分子真正的危险来自内部。

detailed_translations.english: before a certain period of time has passed
Within is also an adverb

sentences.english: After the storm we were without electricity for five days.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨之后我们断电了五天。

sentences.english: a house without a garden
sentences.chinese: 不带花园的房子

sentences.english: We passed two ruined abbeys, one with a tower and one without.
sentences.chinese: 我们路过两座破落的寺院，一座有塔楼，另一座没有。

sentences.english: I’m getting used to managing without a car.
sentences.chinese: 我已经习惯没有汽车了。

detailed_translations.english: not having something, especially something that is basic or necessary

sentences.english: Police have appealed for witnesses to come forward.
sentences.chinese: 警方呼吁目击者站出来。

sentences.english: an eye witness (= someone who sees an event ) to the robbery
sentences.chinese: 抢劫案的一名目击者

detailed_translations.english: someone who sees a crime or an accident and can describe what happened

detailed_translations.chinese: 目击； 为…作证， 证明
detailed_translations.english: used to introduce an example that proves something you have just mentioned

sentences.english: I was talking to a woman I met on the flight.
sentences.chinese: 我正和一个在飞机上认识的女子交谈。

sentences.english: married women
sentences.chinese: 已婚妇女

sentences.english: a popular women’s magazine
sentences.chinese: 一本受欢迎的女性杂志

sentences.english: When a woman is pregnant, the levels of hormones in her body change.
sentences.chinese: 女人怀孕时，体内的荷尔蒙水平会发生变化。

detailed_translations.english: an adult female person

sentences.english: What are they going to do now, I wonder ?
sentences.chinese: 我想知道，他们现在打算怎么办呢？

sentences.english: He’s been leaving work early a lot – it makes you wonder , doesn’t it?
sentences.chinese: 他最近经常提早下班——让人觉得奇怪，是不是？

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…感到疑惑， 想知道； 感到惊讶
detailed_translations.english: to think about something that you are not sure about and try to guess what is true, what will happen etc

sentences.english: Put some more wood on the fire.
sentences.chinese: 往火上再添些木柴。

sentences.english: a polished wood floor
sentences.chinese: 擦得锃亮的木地板

sentences.english: Her house was made of wood .
sentences.chinese: 她家的房子是木头盖的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 木材， 木头， 木料； 树林， 林地
detailed_translations.english: the material that trees are made of

sentences.english: a ball of wool
sentences.chinese: 一团毛线

detailed_translations.chinese: 羊毛； 毛线， 绒线
detailed_translations.english: the soft thick hair that sheep and some goats have on their body

sentences.english: Write an essay of about five hundred words.
sentences.chinese: 写一篇约500字的文章。

sentences.english: What does that word mean?
sentences.chinese: 那个单词是什么意思？

sentences.english: ‘Vater’ is the German word for (= that means ) ‘father’.
sentences.chinese: vater在德语中是“父亲”的意思。

sentences.english: Perhaps ‘lucky’ is not exactly the right word .
sentences.chinese: 也许“幸运”一词还不够贴切。

detailed_translations.chinese: 词， 单词； 言语， 话； 消息， 传说； 诺言， 保证
detailed_translations.english: a single group of letters that are used together with a particular meaning

sentences.english: Sally isn’t working tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 萨莉明天不上班。

sentences.english: Staff will have to get used to a new way of working.
sentences.chinese: 员工必须适应新的工作方式。

sentences.english: We’re sometimes expected to work twelve-hour days.
sentences.chinese: 我们有时候需要一天工作12小时。

sentences.english: Are you working late (= working after the time you usually finish ) again tonight?
sentences.chinese: 你今晚又要加班吗？

sentences.english: Forty police officers are working round the clock (= working day and night without stopping ) to find Murray’s killer.
sentences.chinese: 为了找出杀害默里的凶手，40名警察正日夜工作。

sentences.english: Nowadays, many people are able to work from home.
sentences.chinese: 如今，很多人可以在家工作。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作， 劳动； 运转； 起作用， 有效； 生产， 经营
detailed_translations.english: to do the activities and duties that are part of your job

sentences.english: Trumpeter Marcus Belgrave ran a jazz workshop for young artists.
sentences.chinese: 鼓手马库斯马贝尔格瑞夫为年轻艺术家们举办了一场爵士乐研讨会。

detailed_translations.chinese: 车间， 作坊， 创作室； 研讨会， 讲习班
detailed_translations.english: a room or building where tools and machines are used for making or repairing things

sentences.english: the reigning Formula One world champion
sentences.chinese: 一级方程式赛车现任世界冠军

detailed_translations.chinese: 世界的， 世界范围的
detailed_translations.english: existing in, involving, or affecting all or most countries in the world
the  planet  we live on, and all the people, cities, and countries on it

sentences.english: You’ve really got no need to worry about your weight.
sentences.chinese: 你真的不必担心你的体重。

sentences.english: Don’t tell Mum about this – she’s got enough to worry about (= she already has a lot of problems or is very busy ) .
sentences.chinese: 别把这件事告诉妈妈——她已经够操心的了。

detailed_translations.english: to be anxious or unhappy about someone or something, so that you think about them a lot

detailed_translations.chinese: 担心， 发愁， 忧虑
detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being anxious about something

sentences.english: The traffic is much worse after five o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 5点以后交通拥堵严重得多。

sentences.english: The weather was a lot worse this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年天气糟糕得多。

sentences.english: Conditions will get worse as the winter continues.
sentences.chinese: 随着冬天持续下去，情况会更糟。

sentences.english: High inflation will make unemployment worse.
sentences.chinese: 高通货膨胀率将使失业状况更加严重。

sentences.english: Don’t say anything, you’ll only make matters worse.
sentences.chinese: 什么也别说，说了只会火上浇油。

sentences.english: The bullying got worse and worse until finally he had to leave the school.
sentences.chinese: 他所受的欺侮越来越过分，最后只得离开了学校。

sentences.english: There’s nothing worse than being robbed while you’re on holiday.
sentences.chinese: 没有比度假时被抢劫更糟的了。

sentences.english: The school’s not perfect, but I suppose it could be worse.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校不是十全十美，不过我想还不算太糟吧。

detailed_translations.english: more unpleasant, bad, or severe
something worse
in a more severe or serious way than before

sentences.english: This is the worst recession for fifty years.
sentences.chinese: 这是50年来最严重的一次经济衰退。

sentences.english: My worst fear was that we would run out of food.
sentences.chinese: 我最大的担忧是我们会把食物吃光。

sentences.english: What is the worst possible thing that can happen?
sentences.chinese: 最糟可能会发生什么事？

detailed_translations.chinese: 最坏， 最差， 最糟
detailed_translations.english: worse than anything or anyone else

sentences.english: The worth of our lives comes, not in what we do or who we know, but by WHO WE ARE.
sentences.chinese: 我们生活的价值不在于我们做了什么，或者我们认识谁，生活的价值在于我们是谁。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of something worth ten pounds, $500 etc

sentences.english: He wanted to do a worthwhile job.
sentences.chinese: 他想做有意义的工作。

sentences.english: We decided to give the money to a worthwhile cause (= one that helps people ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们决定把这笔钱投入到慈善事业中。

detailed_translations.chinese: 值得花时间的， 值得做的
detailed_translations.english: if something is worthwhile, it is important or useful, or you gain something from it

sentences.english: Leeds United were worthy winners of the competition.
sentences.chinese: 利兹联队是比赛当之无愧的获胜者。

sentences.english: a worthy opponent
sentences.chinese: 值得钦佩的对手

detailed_translations.english: deserving respect from people

sentences.english: Would you shut the window, please?
sentences.chinese: 请把窗户关上，好吗？

sentences.english: Would you mind waiting outside?
sentences.chinese: 您在外面等好吗？

sentences.english: Would someone please tell me what is going on?
sentences.chinese: 请问谁能告诉我发生什么事了？

detailed_translations.english: used to ask someone politely to do something

sentences.english: A nurse cleaned and bandaged the wound.
sentences.chinese: 护士把伤口清洗包扎好。

sentences.english: It took several months for his wounds to heal .
sentences.chinese: 他的伤口几个月后才愈合。

sentences.english: The doctor said it was only a flesh wound (= one that does not cut the skin very deeply ) .
sentences.chinese: 医生说那只是皮肉伤。

sentences.english: a gaping wound (= one that is wide and open ) on his thigh
sentences.chinese: 他大腿上裂开的伤口

detailed_translations.english: an injury to your body that is made by a weapon such as a knife or a bullet

sentences.english: I’ve still got a few Christmas presents to wrap up.
sentences.chinese: 我还有一些圣诞礼物要包起来。

detailed_translations.english: to put paper or cloth over something to cover it
a piece of thick cloth that a woman wears around her shoulders

sentences.english: They run races; they wrestle; and sometimes they have mock fights together.
sentences.chinese: 蚂蚁参加各种赛跑，摔跤，有时还在一起模拟战斗。

detailed_translations.chinese: 摔跤； 斗争， 搏斗

sentences.english: Alex wrinkled up her nose at the smell.
sentences.chinese: 闻到那股味道，亚历克丝皱起了鼻子。

sentences.english: Carter wrinkled his forehead in concentration.
sentences.chinese: 卡特全神贯注，眉头紧锁。

sentences.english: His brow wrinkled when he saw us.
sentences.chinese: 他一看见我们就皱起了眉头。

detailed_translations.english: if you wrinkle a part of your face, or if it wrinkles, small lines appear on it
wrinkles are lines on your face and skin that you get when you are old

sentences.english: He broke his wrist climbing rocks for a cigarette ad.
sentences.chinese: 他为了一个香烟广告攀岩折断了手腕。

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body where your hand joins your arm

sentences.english: I wrote her several letters , but she didn’t reply.
sentences.chinese: 我给她写了几封信，可是她没有回复。

detailed_translations.chinese: [wrote-written] 写， 书写， 写字； 写作， 作曲； 写
detailed_translations.english: to put words in a letter to someone

sentences.english: Your calculations must be wrong.
sentences.chinese: 你肯定算错了。

sentences.english: I think I got question 3 wrong .
sentences.chinese: 我想第三题我做错了。

sentences.english: I wish you’d stop trying to prove me wrong (= show that I am wrong ) all the time.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你不要总是想证明我错了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 错误的，不正确的；不道德的，不正当的，不合法的
detailed_translations.english: not correct, and not based on true facts

detailed_translations.chinese: 错误； 坏事； 不公
detailed_translations.english: behaviour that is not morally right

sentences.english: The X-ray showed that her leg was not broken.
sentences.chinese: X光片显示她的腿没有骨折。

detailed_translations.english: a beam of radiation1 that can go through solid objects and is used for photographing the inside of the body

sentences.english: a hundred yards away
sentences.chinese: 100码外

sentences.english: an area of 9,000 square yards
sentences.chinese: 面积为9,000平方码的一片区域

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring length, equal to three feet or 0.91 metres

sentences.english: Yeah, I agree with you.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我同意你的看法。

sentences.english: Yeah, that sounds good.
sentences.chinese: 是的，那听起来不错。

sentences.english: Yeah, I'll be there.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我会到场的。

detailed_translations.english: yes

sentences.english: I arrived here two years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我两年前来到这里。

sentences.english: We’ve known each other for over a year.
sentences.chinese: 我们相识一年多了。

sentences.english: It’s almost a year since Sue died.
sentences.chinese: 休去世快一年了。

sentences.english: Jodi is 15 years old.
sentences.chinese: 约迪15岁。

sentences.english: a three-year business plan
sentences.chinese: 三年的业务发展计划

sentences.english: a four-year-old child
sentences.chinese: 四岁的孩子

detailed_translations.english: a period of about 365 days or 12 months, measured from any particular time

sentences.english: yellow flowers
sentences.chinese: 黄花

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of butter or the middle part of an egg
the colour of butter or the middle part of an egg

sentences.english: ‘Would you like a sandwich?’ ‘Yes, please.’
sentences.chinese: “你想来个三明治吗？”“好的，谢谢。”

sentences.english: ‘Would you like to come with us?’ ‘Yes, I’d love to.’
sentences.chinese: “你想和我们一起去吗？”“好的，我很乐意。”

detailed_translations.english: used as an answer to say that you want something or want to do something

sentences.english: What did you do yesterday?
sentences.chinese: 昨天你做了什么？

detailed_translations.english: on or during the day before today

sentences.english: You can’t give up yet!
sentences.chinese: 你还不能放弃！

sentences.english: Don’t go yet. I like talking to you.
sentences.chinese: 别这就走啊，我喜欢跟你说话。

detailed_translations.english: used in negative sentences to say that someone should not or need not do something now, although they may have to do it later
used to introduce a fact, situation, or quality that is surprising after what you have just said

sentences.english: a pot of strawberry yogurt
sentences.chinese: 一罐草莓酸奶

sentences.english: Hi, Kelly. How are you?
sentences.chinese: 嗨，凯利，你好吗？

sentences.english: You must all listen carefully.
sentences.chinese: 你们大家都必须仔细听着。

sentences.english: I have some news for you.
sentences.chinese: 我有一些消息要告诉你们。

sentences.english: The letter is addressed to both of you.
sentences.chinese: 信是寄给你们俩的。

sentences.english: Did Robin give you the money?
sentences.chinese: 罗宾把钱给你了吗？

sentences.english: Only you can make this decision.
sentences.chinese: 只有你才能作这个决定。

sentences.english: You idiot!
sentences.chinese: 你这个白痴！

sentences.english: You boys have got to learn to behave yourselves.
sentences.chinese: 你们这些男孩子必须学着规矩点。

sentences.english: Hey, you over there! Get out of the way!
sentences.chinese: 嘿，说你呢，让开！

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a person or group of people when speaking or writing to them

sentences.english: a young child
sentences.chinese: 幼儿

sentences.english: He’s younger than me.
sentences.chinese: 他比我小。

sentences.english: You’re too young to get married.
sentences.chinese: 你还太小，不能结婚。

sentences.english: young trees
sentences.chinese: 小树

sentences.english: When I was young, I wanted to be a model.
sentences.chinese: 我年轻时候想当模特。

sentences.english: John was a great footballer in his younger days(= when he was younger ).
sentences.chinese: 约翰年轻时是个很棒的足球运动员。

detailed_translations.chinese: 年轻的，青年的；没有经验的；初期的
detailed_translations.english: a young person, plant, or animal has not lived for very long
young people

sentences.english: Why do you like your major?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么喜欢你的主修科目?。

sentences.english: I like it. Do they have your size?
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢。他们有你的号码吗？

sentences.english: This is our room, and yours is just across the hall.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们的房间，你们的在走廊那边。

sentences.english: A lot of people have money problems, but yours are more serious than most people’s.
sentences.chinese: 许多人有财务问题，不过你的问题比大多数人的要严重。

sentences.english: A cash prize of £10,000 or a new car – the choice is yours.
sentences.chinese: 一万英镑的奖金或一辆新车——随你选择。

detailed_translations.english: used when speaking or writing to one or more people to refer to something that belongs to them or is connected with them

sentences.english: Look at yourself in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 照照镜子吧。

sentences.english: Come and warm yourselves by the fire.
sentences.chinese: 到火边来暖暖身子。

sentences.english: Have you hurt yourself?
sentences.chinese: 你伤到自己了吗？

sentences.english: Go and buy yourself an ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 去给你自己买个冰激凌吧。

detailed_translations.english: used when talking to someone to show that they are affected by their own action

sentences.english: a gang of youths
sentences.chinese: 一伙少年

detailed_translations.chinese: 青年；青春；年轻；青少年时期
detailed_translations.english: the period of time when someone is young, especially the period when someone is a teenager

sentences.english: Make x greater than or equal to zero.
sentences.chinese: 设x大于或等于零。

detailed_translations.english: the number 0
the number 0

sentences.english: San Francisco and Tokyo are both located in earthquake zones.
sentences.chinese: 旧金山和东京都位于地震带。

sentences.english: The government has set up a special economic zone to promote private enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 政府设立了一个经济特区来推动私营企业的发展。

detailed_translations.chinese: 地区， 区域， 范围
detailed_translations.english: a large area that is different from other areas around it in some way

sentences.english: After that we went to the zoo.
sentences.chinese: 之后我们一起去了动物园。

sentences.english: On Sunday I go to the zoo.
sentences.chinese: 星期日的时候我去了动物园。

sentences.english: I like to go to zoo.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢去动物园。

detailed_translations.english: a place, usually in a city, where animals of many kinds are kept so that people can go to look at them

sentences.english: We need to zoom out to see the bigger picture.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要拉远一点来看全局。

sentences.english: She quickly zoomed through the document, highlighting key points.
sentences.chinese: 她迅速地浏览了这份文件，标出了要点。

sentences.english: The camera can zoom in for a close-up shot.
sentences.chinese: 这台相机可以变焦拍摄特写镜头。

sentences.english: He zoomed ahead in the book, eager to reach the end.
sentences.chinese: 他快速地翻阅着书，急切地想读到结尾。

sentences.english: The internet connection is so slow; I can't zoom videos without buffering.
sentences.chinese: 网络连接太慢了，我无法在不缓冲的情况下观看视频。

detailed_translations.chinese: 急速上升；嗡嗡声；[摄] 变焦摄影
detailed_translations.english: a sound made by a vehicle that is travelling fast
